description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technology and application on the power engineering via seminar. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name.zh: 研究討論 - 電力工程

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 研究討論 - 電力電子工程

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technology in the area of control engineering.  Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion.  Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

name.zh: 研究討論 - 控制工程

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

description.zh: 1. 機率空間 2. 隨機變數、向量、程序 3. 期望值，隨機序列的收斂性和大數法則 4. 穩定性隨機程序 5. 有用的隨機程序
description.en: 1. probability space2. Random variable, vectors and processes3. Expectation ,converges of random sequence and Law of large number4. Stationary processes and ergodic propertis5. Useful random processes

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種常用之進階影像處理理論，課程內容含蓋：１. 空間域影像強化２. 頻域影像強化３. 影像還原４. 彩色影像處理５. 型態學影像處理６. 影像分割 7. 物件辨認 8. 小波理論
description.en: This course contains the advanced topics in digital image compression. It includes １Image Enhancement in Spatial Domain ２. Image Enhancement in Frequency Domain ３. Image Restoration ４.Color Image Processing ５. Morphological Image Processing ６. Image Segmentation 7. Object Recognition 8. Wavelet and Multiresolution Processing

description.zh: 1. 電力電子電路簡介 2. 電路規劃與設計 3. 動態分析與控制 4. 諧波分析與切換技術 5. 功率積體電路 6. 電力電子電路系統
description.en: 1. Introduction of Power Electronic Circuit 2.Circuit Planning and Design 3. Dynamic Analysis and Control 4. Harmonic Analysis and Switching Technique 5. Power Integrated Circuit 6. Power Electronic Circuit System.

name.zh: 電力電子電路分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and Design of Power Electronics Circuit

description.zh: 本課程旨在全面介紹網絡和分佈式計算技術。 與傳統課程不同，它採用自上而下的主題方法，從應用層開始，然後描述傳輸層和網路層，最後涵蓋實體層。課程從應用層向下延伸到實體層，讓學生在學習網路的早期就接觸重要概念來激發他們的興趣。 本課程專注於互聯網和網路的基本重要問題，對計算機科學和電氣工程感興趣的學生提供良好的基礎，而無需廣泛的程式或數學知識。
description.en: The course aims to provide a comprehensive introduction to networking and distributed computing technologies. Unlike traditional course, it pursues a top-down approach to the topic, starting with the application layer and then describing the transport and network layers, finally covering the physical layer. The course works its way from the application layer down toward the physical layer, motivating readers by exposing them to important concepts early in their study of networking. Focusing on the Internet and the fundamentally important issues of networking, this course provides an excellent foundation for students interested in computer science and electrical engineering, without requiring extensive knowledge of programming or mathematics.

description.zh: 電腦視覺簡介及其應用影像形成偵測與配對影像分割以特徵為基礎的定位運動推論結構運動估計影像縫合計算攝影學立體對應三維重建影像辨識
description.en: Introduction and Applications of Computer VisionImage FormationDetection and MatchingSegmentationFeature-Based AlignmentStructure from MotionMotion EstimationImage StitchingComputational PhotographyStereo Correspondence3D ReconstructionRecognition

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎 2. Lyapunov 穩定度 3. Lyapunov 方法 4. LaSalle 定理與 Barbalat 引理 5. Lagrange 系統之穩定分析 6. 時間延遲系統之穩定分析
description.en: 1. Mathematical background2. Lyapunov stability3. Lyapunov method4. LaSalle's theorem and Barbalat's lemma5. Stability analysis of Lagrange systems6. Stability analysis of time-delay systems

description.zh: 1. 人工智慧簡介 2. 陳述式邏輯 3. 確定模型之學習 4. 非確定型知識之表示 5. 貝式網路 6. 機率式模型之參數學習 7. 機率式模型之結構學習 8. 非監督式學習 9. 基因法則 10. 基因規劃法 11. 粒子群最佳化演算法
description.en: 1. Introduction to Artificial Intelligence2. Propositional Logic3. Learning of Deterministic Models4. Representation of Uncertain Knowledge5. Bayesian Networks6. Parameter Learning of Probabilistic Models7. Structure Learning of Probabilistic Models8. Unsupervised Learning 9. Genetic Algorithm10. Genetic Programming11. Particle Swarm Optimization

notes: 電機所、電資外生班和 AI 學位學程合開

description.zh: 課程由基礎的雷達訊號特性和數位訊號處理出發，透過訊號模型推演分析，介紹合成孔徑雷達成像方式。如何在訊號模型的基礎上，搭配不同成像方式的理論與實務，為課程重點。為連結真實合成孔徑雷達訊號場景，除學習基礎成像幾何外，也將介紹真實合成孔徑雷達回波訊號資料。透過不同的成像方式，比較各種成像後的影像品質，並討論各成像法的差異與優劣。修習課程後，學生能了解合成孔徑雷達影像特性，包含：合成孔徑雷達成像的基礎理論、訊號模型、取向幾何、成像方法及其優劣比較等。
description.en: This course introduces the synthetic aperture radar (SAR) imaging through the derivation of signal models, based on the basic radar signal characteristics and digital signal processing. The theory and practice of employing SAR focusing algorithms on the basis of the signal models are highlights of this course. In order to link the real synthetic aperture radar signal scenarios, the real SAR echo signal data will also be used in this course, in addition to introducing the basic imaging geometry. The image quality after imaging with different focusing algorithms will be compared, and the differences between the focusing algorithms will also be discussed. After the course, students can understand the characteristics of SAR images, including the principle of SAR signals, signal model, data acquisition modes, focusing algorithms and their advantages and disadvantages.

notes: 電機所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程希望協助學生瞭解如何以標準積體電路系統設計流程來設計超大型積體電路系統，旨在採用多種數位與類比電腦輔助設計軟體來訓練學生，使其能熟悉並使用超大型積體電路系統的設計軟體，培育學生具備超大型積體電路系統設計實務與經驗。本課程的主要內容包括：1. 超大型積體電路簡介；2. 晶片製程介紹；3.MOSFET 元件；4. MOSFET 走線；5.Hspice 軟體介紹 ；6. Hspice 電路模擬；7. 類比電路佈局與實作；8.Verilog HDL (硬體描述語言)；9. 電路合成 ；10. 自動測試圖樣產生；11. 時脈靜態分析；12. 電路佈局與佈線；13.DRC 與 LVS 檢測；14. 寄生參數萃取與佈局後模擬；15. 設計功能驗證 16. 設計方案報告
description.en: Students will learn how to design VLSI circuits and systems based on a standard VLSI system design flow, where various electronic design automation (EDA) tools will be used extensively in the semester. Those EDA tools includes analog and digital circuits and systems. The main purpose of this course includes the following:1.	VLSI Introduction.2.	Manufacturing Process.3.	MOSFET Devices.4.	MOSFET Wires.5.	Hspice Software.6.	Hspice Simulation.7.	Analog IC Layout and Practice.8.	Verilog-HDL.9.	Synthesis.10.	Design for Testability and Automatic Test Pattern Generation.11.	Static Timing Analysis.12.	Placement and Routing.13.	Design Rule Check, Layout Versus Schematic.14.	Layout Parasitic Extraction and Simulation.15.	Design Verification.16.	Project Presentation.

name.zh: 電腦輔助積體電路系統設計實務
name.en: Computer-Aided VLSI System Design and Practice

notes: 電機所、半導體和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程以鋰電池為例，將深入探討鋰電池的電網與電動車領域與相關領域之主要研究課題，並應用控制理論實現電池系統鑑別、電池電量狀態與電池健康狀態量測。本課程針對研究所學生開設，藉由理論探討與模擬實作，加強學生的理論知識與實作能力，並透過定期期刊文章研討，加強學生的閱讀與簡報專業論文之能力。
description.en: This course takes lithium-ion batteries as an example. It introduces current research challenges of lithium-ion batteries’ applications (i.e., electrical vehicles (EVs) and power grids). It then investigates battery system identification approaches, battery state-of-charge (SOC) estimation algorithms, battery state-of-health (SOH) prognosis algorithms, and related control theories. This course is set targeting to institute students, where the goal of this course is to help them gain necessary domain knowledge, develop simulation and implementation skills, and improve capabilities of reading and reporting journal papers.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: C 語言為開發作業系統、嵌入式系統、通訊協定等程式最常使用的程式語言，本課程主要教導 C 程式語言於實務上之應用，課程內容主要包括：進階指標使用、指標與陣列、指標與資料結構、Pointer-to-pointer、指標函式、Callback function、Bitwise operation 應用等，除了於 PC 上撰寫程式練習之外，亦會有 case study 來輔助教學以及了解 C 語言的使用技巧，期末亦會要求學生利用所學習到之技巧來模擬 CPU 排程與記憶體管理等相關作業系統底層程式。
description.en: The C programming language is commonly used to implement operation systems, embedded systems, and communication protocols. The object of this course is to teach how to apply the C programming language to develop real application systems. The contents of this course include advanced pointer usage, pointer and array, pointer and data structure, pointer-to-pointer, function pointer, callback functions, bitwise operations, and so on. In addition to practice on PC, this course also offers case studies for better understanding. Students will also be required to implement emulators to simulate OS lower level operations, e.g., CPU scheduling and memory management.

name.zh: 進階 C 語言實務

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 數學基礎	- 機率	- 隨機程序：自相關函數與功率密度函數，高斯程序、白雜訊	- 正交開展與線性濾波	- 取樣與量化 3. 最佳接收器設計	- 信號的幾何表示	- 最大事後機率與最大可能接收原理	- 相配濾波器	- 錯誤機率 4. 數位調變與多工技術	- 數位調變：振幅移鍵調變、相位移鍵調變、四相振幅調變、頻率移鍵調變	- 數位調變的取捨條件：錯誤機率、功率、頻寬與複雜度	- 多工技術：分頻多工、分時多工、分碼多工 5. 消息理論簡介	- 源編碼與熵	- 通道編碼與通訊容量
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Mathematical Preliminaries- Probability- Random processes: autocorrelation function and power spectral density, Gaussian processes, white noise- Orthonormal expansions and linear filtering	- Sampling and quantization3. Optimal Receiver Design	- Geometric interpretation of signals	- MAP and ML receiver principles	- Matched filters	- Probability of error 4. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing- Digital modulation: ASK, PSK, QAM, FSK- Digital modulation tradeoffs: error probability, power, bandwidth and complexity- Multiplexing: FDMA, TDMA and CDMA5. Introduction to Information Theory	- Source coding and entropy	- Channel coding and capacity

description.zh: 1. 寬頻和超寬頻通道模型 2.CDMA 3. 多使用者偵測 4.MIMO 5. 時空傳輸技術 6. 標準中其他無線傳輸技術
description.en: 1.wideband and ultrawideband channel modeling2.code-division multiple access (CDMA)3.multiuser detection4.multiple-input multiple output (MIMO)5.spatial multiplexing/space-time coding and in between6.other transmission technology in standards: OFDMA, UWB, etc.

description.zh: 1. 高頻介質材料特性 2. 介質共振器簡介 3. 圓柱型介電波導理論 4. 簡易共振模型分析法 5. 精密分析法 6. 介質共振器耦合特性 7. 介質共振器之高頻電路應用
description.en: 1.The Characteristics of High-frequency Dielectric Materials2.The Introduction of Dielectric Resonators3.Theory of Cylindrical Dielectric Waveguides4.Simple Resonate Model for Analysis5.Rigorous Analysis Methods6.The Characteristis of Coupling7.The DR's Practical applications at High Frequencies

description.zh: 一、射頻網路分析 二、射頻集總元件 三、射頻耦合線圈與變壓器 四、射頻集總元件阻抗匹配 五、射頻分佈元件 六、射頻傳輸線變壓器 七、射頻分佈元件阻抗匹配  八、射頻放大器阻抗匹配
description.en: 1.RF Network Analysis 2.RF Lumped Elements 3.RF Coupled Coils and Transformers 4.RF Impedance Matching Using Lumped Ellements 5.RF Distributed Elements 6.RF Traansmission Line Transformers 7.RF Impedance Matching Using Distributed Elements 8.RF Amplifier Impedance Matching

description.zh: 1. 射頻向量網路分析儀校準 2. 射頻頻譜分析儀操作 3. 單埠射頻網路散射參數量測 4. 雙埠射頻網路散射參數量測 5. 射頻變壓器耦合係數量測 6. 射頻基板參數量測 7. 射頻傳輸線參數量測 8. 射頻放大器穩定性量測 9. 射頻放大器參數量測 10. 射頻放大器雜音指數量測 11. 射頻振盪器參數量測 12. 射頻天線參數量測
description.en: 1.Calibration of RF Vector Network Analyzer2.Operation of RF Spectrum Analyzer3.S-Parameter Measurements of 1-Port RF Networks4.S-Parameter Measurements of 2-Port RF Networks5.Coupling Coefficient Measurements of RF Transformers6.Parameter Measurements of RF Substrates7.Parameter Measurements of RF Transmission Lines8.Stability Measurements of RF Amplifiers9.Parameter Measurements of RF Amplifiers10.Noise Figure Measurements of RF Amplifiers11.Parameter Measurements of RF Oscillators12.Parameter Measurements of RF Antennas

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting..

description.zh: 為取得工學碩士必修課程，3 至 6 個學分需先經系所核可。
description.en: For the degree of Master of Engineering 3 to 6 credits with department approval.

description.zh: 本課程主要透過論文報告、團體討論、演講等活動，使學生熟悉特定研究領域相關之工程技術及應用。
description.en: This course mainly aims to familiarize students with engineering techniques and applications related to specific research field through activities such as research reports, group discussions, and speeches.

name.zh: 工業工程與管理專題研討 (一)

notes: 專題課程，詳洽系所承辦人

description.zh: 排程主要在規劃與排定活動執行的優先順序，以使各項資源得到最佳的運用。本課程除了介紹排程的基本理論外，對排程於各種問題的應用亦有闡述。課程的主要目的在使學生學習排程的基本概念與法則，並瞭解排程於各種生產型態的應用。
description.en: Scheduling consists of planning and prioritizing activities that need to be performed in an orderly sequence of operation. It is a tool that optimizes use of available resources. This course focuses on theoretical as well as applied aspects of scheduling of resources. The purpose of this course is to guide the students to learn the basic concept and rules of sequencing and scheduling, and to understand the different scheduling application aspects for various shop floors.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅 B2C 市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。在台灣，擁有十個以上員工的公司有 86% 有自屬的企業網站，而擁有自屬網站的頁有近七成聘僱網頁設計師進駐公司任職，面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來 DIY 速成個人事業及就業的能力
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

description.zh: 本課程引入生活性的學習方法來誘發學生學習動機，並培養可在社會與職場運用的四項英文基本技能。課程目標在幫助學生在生活實境習得英文，為他們裝備可溝通表達於日常、社交活動，並提升職涯的整合性英文技能。每堂課程都注重在以學生為中心的學習活動中帶入全真、應用性高的英文技巧。課程設計涵蓋的功能包括課堂分享與作業、日常互動英文以及專業英文練習。主要課題包括溝通，簡報與談判技巧，應用閱讀與寫作，聽力技巧運用，語言與文化。
description.en: This course introduces real-world based learning approaches for students to raise their learning aspirations and to develop four essential English skills that are applicable in social and professional encounters. This course aims to help students practice English in most real-life settings and to equip them with integrated skills to advance their careers. Every class session focuses on bringing authentic and applied English in student-centered leaning activities. The class design covers the functions like information sharing and task-based activities, social interactions, and professional English practices. Essential topics include communication, techniques of negotiation and presentation, applied reading and writing, strategies for developing listening skills and language learning across cultures.

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解認知人因工程理論與研究方法，並使學生能應用這些理論與研究方法來探討與解決實際問題，提升整體系統之績效。
description.en: The purpose of the course is for students to learn about theories and research methods of cognitive human factors, and to learn how to apply these theories and methods for investigating and solving practical problems, and improving overall system performance.

description.zh: 由於網路的發展迅速，電子商務已經是必然的趨勢。本課程中介紹經營電子商務所需的各種重點技巧，包括產品規劃，通路規劃，商業網站設計、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google 管理工具的應用、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學對經營電子商務有一個整體的了解。
description.en: This course will teach how to management the e-commerce.

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1. 簡介；2. 電子商店的行銷策略；3. 電子商店的建 置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6. 案例介紹；7. 結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion。

description.zh: 本課程提供供應鏈中協同管理的重要多面向，探討供應商、零售商及終端消費者間腳色互動及運作，以及能促使供應鏈鄭和及協同之機制。課程目標在使 (1) 在現今高度競合產業環境中，提供對整合及協同供應鏈的理解、專業管理及未來願景。(2) 提供學生具高階供應鏈管理者之必要認知及知識。
description.en: The course takes a broad view of the critical facets of supply chain coordination and management, expanding beyond internal company operations to include the suppliers, the retailers and the end consumers. Aligning supply chain management with integrated strategies and policies. The goal of the course is (a) to provide professionals with the vision and skill set necessary to understand and manage the integration and coordination of activities within today's increasingly complicated supply chains and (b) to equip students with the knowledge and perceptions demanded for supply chain management leaders today.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高等應用統計的相關原理方法與應用案例，包括一般資料分析、信度效度、迴歸分析、主成分分析、多元尺度分析、區別分析、抽樣調查等。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students understand the data analysis and applications. The major contents include reliability and effectiveness of data, regression analysis, principle component analysis, multi-dimensional scaling, logistic analysis and sampling analysis. The course will also include some practical example discussions.

notes: 工管博和管理博合開 / 預計英語授課

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生學習如何做財務投資決策，使得商業或工業的投資專案得到最大投資效益或最經濟的成本，課程主題包含：投資環境的定義、投資專案評估方法、利率及通膨率、資產折舊、所得稅、專案現金流量分析、專案投資風險與不確定性、實質選擇權、商業及工業投資案例研討。本課程中將考量專案投資分析的各種影響因素，使得決策者可以更有效地做出投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach students how to make smart financial decisions in an effort to create economical products. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, depreciation, income taxes, developing project cash flows, uncertainty and risk, real options, special topics of business and engineering decision. Various factors that affect the investment project decision problems are discussed to help decision maker properly resolves investment decision.

description.zh: 隨工業物聯網的快速發展，越來越多的感測數據得以被記錄，除了依賴專家的經驗判斷，更可藉由數據分析的結果提供決策上的輔助。本課程將介紹資料科學的基本分析架構，從問題定義、數據前處理、特徵工程、模型建立、結果解釋與評估等，除課堂講授資料科學工具與方法外，並利用作業、個案研究、案例資料，以訓練同學資料分析的能力與解決問題的經驗。
description.en: With the advanced technology in Industrial Internet of Things, amount of sensors are installed to collect data during manufacturing production and service process. In addition to rely on domain knowledge, we can also construct a data-driven model and extract useful information and rule for decision support and management.. This course will introduce analytics framework of data science including problem definition, data preprocessing, feature engineering, model construction, and result evaluation and interpretation. In addition to lecture, this course also training students how to analyze the data and problem solving through homework, term project and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 本課程教授數值分析之基本理論，使學生能夠 (1) 撰寫運算程式 (2) 應用數值方法求解各類型數學問題內容包括誤差分析、非線性方程式求解（二分法、牛頓法、截線法）、泰勒展開式與 Lagrange 內差法、高斯消去與 LU 分解法、非線性系統求解、曲線擬合與富利葉逼近、數值微分與積分、微分方程式求解、最佳化問題求解等
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce basic methods of numerical analysis and to provide the groundwork for the research in the Institute of Industrial Engineering and Management. The objectives guide students to: (1) Write simple program for numerical calculations. (2) Find approximate solutions of various mathematical problems. Course content includes error analysis, solving a nonlinear equation (e.g. bracketing methods for locating a root, Newton-Raphson and secant methods), Taylor series and Lagrange approximation, Gaussian elimination, LU decomposition, Solving nonlinear system, Curve Fitting, Interpolation by spline function, Fourier series and expansion, numerical differentiation & integration, solving differential equations, Minimization of a function, etc.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的除介紹基本之類神經理論外，更在於運用現有之類神經網路於工業工程領域內之相關運用，將以現有之資料庫實地解決分類、分群、預測、監控等實際問題，使學生能夠了解類神經網路之基礎理論外，更可深入運用此工具。
description.en: The objective of this course is not only to explore the basic theoretical basis of Neural Networks, but also further introduce the versatility the applications of artificial neural networks.  This course will briefly review the essence of Perceptron, Backpropagation, ART, Hopfield NN, and Fuzzy Neural Networks, and then adopts the data (offered by public database such as UCI) to on-hand practice in applying ANN in classification, clustering, prediction and diagnostics.

description.zh: 作業研究是用來處理將有限資源分配於許多競爭性活動的問題上之一種有用的技術，它已經變成眾多企業工業機構的一種標準工具。基於線性規劃的基本知識高等作為研究提供一些有及可靠的運等方法來所決非線性規劃問題及機率模式。一些與實際應用有關的課題諸如有貨理論、等程理論、可靠度及決策理論等將在本課程中以討論。
description.en: This course discusses linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, (non) integer programming, Markov chains (Markovian decision process), queuing theory, inventory models, forecasting models, decision analysis and simulation.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文.
description.en: Thesis for master degree's partially requirement.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 電腦基本知識，中英文文書處理系統的基本設計理念與現有系統實習，電腦工作底稿功能架構說明及應用實習，資料庫管理系統基本觀念，工程資訊管理系統基本觀念，資料庫設計及資料庫軟體系統使用練習，簡易型之統計繪圖軟體及工程應用實例，其他現代電腦科技發展與其在結構上之應用個案。
description.en: Applications of Structures Engineering by Numerical AnalysisThe application of computer about civil engineering, such as officials Dispatch to handle in Chinese and English, the software of drawings and using software of data base etc.

name.zh: 數值分析在結構工程上之應用
name.en: Applications of Structures Engineering by Numerical Analysis

description.zh: 本課程將介紹 1. 變分法        2. 線性彈性力學       3. 變分法應用到彈性力學 4.Euler 梁與 Timoshenko 梁      5. 扭力    6. 古典板理論 7. 彈性穩定.
description.en: This course will introduces:1.Calculus of Variations2.Linear Elasticity3.Variational Principles of Elasticity4.Euler Beam and Timoshenko Beam5.Torsion6.Classical Theory of Plates7.Elastic Stability

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於提供方法，用來分析任何型式的結構物受任意動荷重所產生的應力與變化。
description.en: The primary purpose of this course is to present methods for analyzing the stresses and deflections developed in any given type of structure whenit is subjected to an arbitary dynamic loading.

description.zh: 本課程將針對如何從土壤動力試驗評估土壤的動態力學參考數導入，作為理論解或者數值解的輸入值，以預測土壤在震動下的變形行為，以及分析土壤與結構物的動態互制行為。內容包括：波傳遞理論，土壤的動力性質，土壤的液化，基礎的振動問題，等等..
description.en: This course will teach how to evaluate the soil's dynamic material properties by means of dynamic laboratory testing.Based on the analytical and numerical solution,the behaviour of soil-structure dynamic interaction can be predicted.

description.zh: 本課程適合碩士論文及大學專題報告實務應用。針對環境中的危害因子之認識、測定方法、採樣技術、分析方法，做一完整的解說，並讓學生能熟悉環境測定的進行，取得正確的量測數據。無進行實驗時，亦可使用模式數值解析方式，解決問題。無論是實驗或模式，最後仍應回歸數據統計分析，及專業圖表繪製。
description.en: This course is suitable for the practical application of master's thesis and university report. Give a complete explanation of the knowledge, measurement methods, sampling techniques, and analysis methods of environmental hazards, and enable students to be familiar with environmental measurement and obtain correct measurement data. When there is no experiment, the model analysis can also be used to solve the problem. Whether it is an experiment or a model, the final regression data should be statistical analysis, and professional figure/table drawing.

description.zh: 資料研析方法，水文統計與迴歸分析，小流域洪水推估 (含基本水文系統實驗), 基本水文系統實驗，頻率分析 (2), 水文演算，水力演算，降雨逕流模擬，地理資訊系統 (GIS) 結合地文單位歷線，序率水文模式，HEC-2,6 講解與實習，專題討論.
description.en: Introduction,Data error analysis,Hydrological statistics,Frequency analysis,Stochastic analysis,Hydrological routing,Hydraulic routing,GIUH plus GIS,Small watershed flood prediction(including Lab.experiment),Seminar.

description.zh: 本課程是較大學部的「岩石力學」課程為之深入探討岩石行為的課程，將針對岩石的指數性質、透水性、強度及變形性做更詳細的研究，並將比較岩石和土壤的不同，以及介紹機率概念在岩石力學上的應用。上課時將以研究論文為主，，書籍、報告為輔，其涵蓋的課程內容大致如下：1、岩石的指數性質 2、岩石和土壤的不同 3、岩體分類法 4、岩石的透水性 5、立體投影圖 6、岩石的強度 7、岩石的破壤準則 8、岩石的變形性 9、弱面的分析 10、機率在岩石力學上的應用
description.en: Compared to the undergraduate Rock Mechanics course, this is a more advanced course to examine the behaviors of rocks under different stress conditions。 It will focus on the index properties, the permeability properties, the strength properties, and the deformation properties of rocks。 In addition, it will address the difference between rocks and soils by contrast。 Finally, this course will introduce students to the concept of probability, and how it can be applied to the Rock Mechanics。 The students taking this course will have plenty of reading assignments, and are required to participate in the classroom discussions。

description.zh: 地下水為地球上可資利用且蘊藏最豐富之淡水資源，本課程以介紹地下水文相關理論及實務為主，有助於學生了解地下水之開發利用與經營管理。課程內容包括地下水之來源、流動及開發應用，以及各項天然或人為化學汙染對地下水系統質與量之影響評估 。
description.en: This course is concerned with the theory and practice of hydrology, the science of water in subsurface environments which are helpful for groundwater resource exploitation and management. It is divided into two main parts: (1) basic concepts dealing with the origin, movement of groundwater, and its recovery from wells, and (2) a qualitative and quantitative assessment of the chemistry of natural and contaminated systems.

description.zh: 1. 混凝土結構概述與支撐結構混凝土材料特性，2. 支撐結構設計載重與材料強度規定，3. 離岸風機地震載重設計，4. 離岸風機風載重設計，5. 離岸風機波浪載重設計，6. 支撐結構之疲勞設計，7. 支撐結構之鋼結構設計與案例，8. 支撐結構之混凝土結構設計與案例，9. 離岸風機基礎設計
description.en: 1. Concepts of concrete structures and concrete material properties, 2. Loads and material strength required for designing supporting structures, 3. Seismic design of offshore wind turbines, 4. Wind resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 5. Wave resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 6. Fatigue design of supporting structures, 7. Case studies of steel structure design for supporting structures, 8. Case studies of concrete structure design for supporting structures, 9. Footing design of offshore wind turbines

name.zh: 離岸風機支撐結構分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and design of supporting structures for offshore wind turbines

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論 Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 碩士論文寫作
description.en: A Student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程著重於中英文口頭報告能力之培養，在模擬發表過程中，培養學生使用正確的表達用法，並建立適當之應對方式。
description.en: This course offers opportunities for students to develop their oral presentation skills in both Chinese and English languages via simulated presentations in class.  Students will learn how to present their papers precisely and how to engage a conversation properly.

description.zh: 本課程主要是針對研究所學生所開設，課程目標為介紹學生電力電子學的基本電路及分析切換式電源的操作原理。課程章節內容包含了電力電子系統介紹，二極體整流器，直流至直流切換式轉換器，切換式直流至交流變流器，零電壓及零電流切換，切換式直流電源供應器，電力調節器與不斷電系統，馬達驅動器介紹，家庭及工業之應用及 公用電力之應用。
description.en: This course is mainly designed for graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce fundamental circuits of power electronics and analyze operation principles of switching mode power. This course includes Introduce to power electronic system, Diode Rectifiers, DC-DC Switch-Mode Converters, Switch-Mode DC-AC Inverters, Zero-Voltage or Zero-Current Switchings, Switching DC Power Supplies, Power Conditioners and Uninterruptible Power Supplies, Introduction to Motor Drives, Residential and Industrial Applications and Electric Utility Applications.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數 (邊界層) 流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 本課程使學生充分瞭解燃料電池專業學科基礎知識，並進一步啟發及增進學生未來能源科技發展知能。燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：燃料電池系統簡介、燃料電池效率及開迴路電壓、燃料電池工作電壓、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池電力傳輸、燃料電池系統分析。
description.en: This course enables students to fully understand the basics of professional disciplines of the fuel cell, and to further inspire and enhance the knowledge of students about future energy technology. Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:Introduction to fuel cell system, Efficiency and open voltage, Operational fuel cell voltages, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Delivering fuel cell power, Analysis of fuel cell system.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題 1. 空氣清淨機構理論。2. 無塵室構造、建造及確效。3. 空氣過濾理論。4. 無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 本課程適合修過工程數學及基礎熱流的碩博士班學生選修。授課內容主要是應用 Matlab 及 CFD 套裝軟體分析能源與熱流科學領域的相關問題，並著重於案例分析。課程內容主要包括利用數值分析解析邊界層問題、有限差分法求解穩態與暫態熱傳導以及二維強制驅動流問題，案例分析包括室內氣流運動、潔淨室氣流分佈、熱交換器性能分析、儲冰系統分析、電子散熱以及氫能系統等。
description.en: This course is suitable for the graduate students who have taken fundamental courses of engineering mathematics and thermofluid sciences. The objective of this course is to apply Matlab and CFD packages to analyze the problems related to energy and thermofluid sciences. Case study is the focus of this course. Course contents mainly include the application of numerical methods on solving boundary-layer problems, analyzing steady and transient heat conduction problems, and 2-D lid-driven flow problems by finite difference method. Case study covers room air flow motion, clean room simulation, heat exchanger performance, electronic cooling, thermal ice storage system and hydrogen energy, etc.

name.zh: 電腦輔助能源與熱流科學分析
name.en: Computer-Aided Analysis on Energy ad Thermofluid Sciences

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 探討網路教學與學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、平台、教材、教師角色與管理、學生角色與任務、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore theories and practical application Web-based instruction and learning including WBL advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, platforms, materials, teacher roles and management, student roles and tasks, practical cases, and future trends etc..

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 探討網路學習社群之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習社群之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、環境、形成要素、成員角色與任務、線上討論與知識分享、成功因素、經營管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore advnced issues on Web-based learning community (WBCL)including WBCL theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, environment, formed factors, member roles and tasks, online discussion, successful factors, operation and management, practical cases, and future trrnds etc..

name.zh: 網路學習社群專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on Web-Based Learning Community

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 本課程將針對數位學習教學設計的相關研究進行探討以及對現行數位教學設計實例分析、未來趨勢、及對未來研究的方向探討。
description.en: The course is designed to research on instructional design of e-learning and related issues including systematic design and special topics related to instructional design of e-learning and discussion for the future trends.

name.zh: 數位教學設計專題研究
name.en: Special topics of the instructional design of e-learning

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 學生與教授討論擬定之研究題目，在教授個別指導下，進行實驗之研究，以培養學生尋找相關資料，文獻及獨立研究的訓練，並將其研究成果撰寫成碩士論文。
description.en: To make students able to carry out independent study in master level.  Students will be assigned a research topic.  An independent experimental design, data analysis, and final master thesis are necessary for this course.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括輔 G 熱力學？高分子的微結構及定性。輔 G 熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin 理論、Flory-Krigbaum 理論、相分離、θ- 溫度、滲透壓、GPC 測分子量、高分子膠體。? 高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x - 射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質 (DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA) 和材料機械性質 (伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 此課程屬於高等無機化學特論，針對研究所學生有志於從事應用研究或投入化學工業而開設，有機金屬不只是化學家重要的研究工具也是化學工程師在設計反應的利器。課程內容包括：主族有機金屬、過渡元素之有機金屬化合物、硼族有機金屬、銅銀金之有機金屬、18 價電子原理、s, p 受體予體、有機錫
description.en: The advanced course for inorganic chemistry is designed for graduates who plan to initiate their academic research in the chemical field or work in chemical plants. Organometallics provides not only the powerful tools for chemist in their research but also for chemical engineers in the design of their reactors.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Main-group organometallics (2) Organometallic compounds of the transition elements (3) Organometallics of the boron group (4) Organometallics of Copper, Silver and Gold (5) The 18-Valence-Electron (18-VE) Rule (6) s, p donors and acceptors (7) Organotin

description.zh: 課程內容主要介紹無機化學研究過程中﹐所使用的各種物理方法。首先介紹光譜學之基本原理。隨後將較深入的探討應用在無機化學與固體材料上的各種光譜技術。包括：各種吸收光譜、核磁共振光譜、電子順磁共振光譜、Ｘ光吸收光譜及Ｘ光繞射等應用於化學之常用分析技術﹐也都包括在課程討論範圍之內。
description.en: I.                  General Introduction to SpectroscopyII.                 Group Theory III.               Absorption Spectroscopies --- UV-Vis, IR, Raman IV.               X-ray crystallography V.                 Bonding models in inorganic chemistryVI.               The structure and reactivity of moleculesVII.                    solid state

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 介紹新興生醫產業的趨勢與其跨領域之特性。課程內容含：生醫產業簡介，新世紀人類基因體大計畫，微生物工程新應用，新型蛋白質藥劑之開發，分子醫療診斷之革新，生醫產業之電腦新科技，遠距醫療服務新模式，創新健康管理與保險制度的創新，生醫產業與科技法律，生醫產業與社會倫理，幹細胞新產業，組織再生新產業，超級老鼠的誕生，美美的生醫美容，抗癌症研究之新科技，抗傳染疾病之新科技。評分的方式以學生報告為主。
description.en: The course is to introduce the trends and the characteristics of biomedical industries in the new millennium. The course covers areas such as human genome project, biotechnology application with microbes, new protein drug, innovative medical technology, computation biology in biomedical industries, new business models in telemedicine, health care management and innovative insurance trends, technology laws in biomedical industries, social responsibility and biomedical industries, stem cell technology, new industries from tissue engineering and so on. The grading method of the course is based on the oral and written reports.

name.zh: 新世紀生醫產業創新科技
name.en: Innovative biomedical industries in the new millennium

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於建築與都市設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into architecture and urban design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

description.zh: 總課程目標： 在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非 實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研一課程目標： 了解理論與實踐之理性關係，其對象應包含自實質至非實質環 境。 課程概要： 利用不同設計課題就學員原有專長實際操作其自理論至實踐之 因果關係。此階段較偏向對目標之了解，就各學員所選定課題 完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程書面資料，以接受目 標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course : Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. 1st GradeThrough manipulation of different design topics, the disciples learn to understand the relational relationship between theory and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete presentation which includes design result and a report of the process of the ascertainment will be required for evaluation.

name.en: A Briefing on Architecture Design Course (I)

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一) 大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二) 都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三) 都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四) 新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken depend on when and how it is appropriate:(1) Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(2) Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(3) Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design (4) Exercise on urban design for new development area

description.zh: 本課程為工程技術組必修，分為綠建築、建築構法、數位媒體、建築生產、建築在利用、環境控制等專題，每學期視任課老師專長輪流開設兩至三個專題，採用分組方式個別指導，每位學生必須修習兩個不同專題。本課程將針對建築實務中所面對之技術課題進行個案研究並模擬操作其設計至細部設計階段。
description.en: This is a design studio class, focused on the technical side for topics as Green Building, Building Systems, Digital Design Media, Building Production, Building Reuse, Environment Control, and others were be included. There will have only two or three topics in each semester, depends on the teacher's specialty, and each student needs take two topics in one year.

description.zh: 台灣傳統建築史的研究已歷多年發展，累積了相當豐富的研究成果。本課程擬由傳統閩客建築類型所屬之空間文化進行研討，透過 "環境與構造"、"儀式與空間"、"政治與建築" 等進階專題研討，期待引領修課同學進入並體驗台灣傳統建築的深層特色與意涵，過程中除了相關文獻的閱讀，案例調查報告外，並由田野實地參觀，帶領同學感受台灣傳統閩客建築的獨特環境與空間文化。
description.en: The research of the history of Taiwanese traditional architecture has got a great achievement after many years of development. This course is focus on the spatial culture of different types of traditional Hakka and Fujian architecture. I hopes that every students could understand and experience the deep social cultural meanings and features through the study of following three issues :"environment and construction", "rite and space" and "politics and architecture".  This course would not only be proceeded by the reading of related documents and the reporting of different case, it also combined the field visiting and investment to lead students to enjoy the very special cultural heritage.

name.en: Special topics in Taiwan Traditional Architecture

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括： 一、 研究的特性 二、 智慧收集 -「什麼」的問題 三、 研究 -「何故」的問題 四、 良好研究的特質 五、 研究的基本類型 六、 從事研究的技能 七、 研究倫理 八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Characteristics of research 2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions 3. Research-the "why" questions 4. Characteristics of good research 5. Basic types of research 6. The craft of doing research 7. Research ethics 8. Research design practice

description.zh: 本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content.

description.zh: 施工歷史可以被視為了解建築理論的關鍵基礎。按照慣例，建築學院提供建築歷史方面的研究方面，包括建築風格和哲學的發展，或者建築材料和建築技術的最新進展。此外，關於建築的理論辯論也更加關注哲學的討論，而不是物理建築的表現。但是，建築理論主要討論材料和建築系統的表示。因此，材料的構造方法實際上會極大地影響建築理論的解釋。因此，該課程可以分為兩個部分：首先，將回顧東西方世界的建設歷史以及現代時期。其次，將討論結構論和相對論的爭論。本課程的目的是發展與會學生的能力，使他們能夠回顧自己論點的要點，並運用適當的理論來支持或爭論他們對建築理論的理解。
description.en: Construction history could be considered as the key foundation to understand architectonic theories. Conventionally, architectural academies provide study aspects either in architectural histories in terms of development of architectural style and philosophy or in the latest progress of architectural materials and construction techniques. Moreover, theoretical debates of architecture also pay more attentions to philosophical discussions instead of physical construction presentation.Nevertheless, architectonic theories mainly discuss the presentation of materials and construction systems. Therefore, construction methods of materials in fact affect the interpretation of architectonic theories significantly. As a result, this course can be divided into two sections: firstly the construction history of Eastern and Western worlds as well as modern period of time will be reviewed. Secondly the architectonic and relative theoretic debates will be discussed. The purpose of the course is to d

description.zh: 自 20 世紀中葉以來，建築論證的核心及與其他學門之間的關係開始出現清楚的變化，而這些變動是具有證據性地邁向與文化研究和哲學領域的連結。如此關係並非單向性發展，而是一種建立在互惠性過程中的擴張擾動。不僅是建築師和建築理論家越發接近文化理論的觀念，相當多數的文化研究學者、哲學家和社會學家正逐步涉入建築和建築環境的議題甚而提問。在承襲如此能動的知識轉換脈絡下，卻也呈現出建築師和建築專業學生在面對理解甚至運用此些思想家的論述上， 遇見相當程度的艱難挑戰，從而導致學門之間非預期的距離與迷霧。基於此，本課程將由兩項核心意圖所構成。首先，承襲跨學門能動脈絡，試圖將建築引入更廣泛的文化背景，並思考文化理論辯證如何對於建築討論提供擴充性的訊息。其次，提供建築在文化研究論述中的閱讀錨定點；一方面有助解碼文化研究專詞，另一方面為閱讀關鍵思想家的論述提供一條較清晰的認知途徑。本課程將以幾位重要文化研究學者與哲學家為核心，透過其本身直接書寫建築，或其關鍵性影響當代建築師與建築評論家的重要著作為課程內容架構，進而以更活潑豐富的路徑反思何為建築之內涵。
description.en: Since the mid-twentieth century, there is evidence of a strong shift in the center of debates within architecture and in its relationship with other academic disciplines, in particular with cultural studies and philosophy. It, however, was a reciprocal process. Not only are architects and architectural theorists becoming more close to ideas of cultural theory, but in great numbers of cultural theorists, philosophers and sociologists are to be found highly engaged with questions of architecture and the built environment. Yet, in recent, it is found that architects and students of architecture may confront struggling to deeply navigate those thinkers’ work resulting in unexpected distances and hazes between disciplines. Therefore, there are two intentions to form this module. Firstly, it attempts to introduce architecture to a broader cultural context, and to consider how debates from cultural theory might begin to inform a discussion about architecture (Leach 1997). Secondly, it tries

name.zh: 批判性建築與文化研究

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務 - 都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務 - 都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務 - 容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 「媒介與環境」作為近年逐漸開始發展的學術領域，其論述原點通常可追溯自 1960 年代，藉由 Marshall McLuhan 對於媒體（Media）與媒介（Medium）的哲學性討論與實驗性創作，首先打開後世電影與媒體學者對於相關學術主題的探討。但這個概念卻要一直到近年，伴隨著科技的進步與媒體研究的發展，例如 Anne Friedberg 針對當代可以出現在各種人造與非人造環境中的螢幕（Screen）的分析，才被廣泛地作為媒介（Medium）與環境（environment）研究仰賴的分析架構，並奠定後續此學術領域的發展方向。此課程將於都市文化研究的固有知識基礎上，引入媒介與環境領域的新興論述，探究各類「觸媒」對於當代文化發展與都市設計的影響。探討子題包含有數位全球化、文創嘉年華、智慧城市、網飛經濟等當前重要都市發展議題，並透過課堂討論、方法學作業，與期末短論培養學生連結理論與實務、深度反思、和獨立探索新興學術領域的能力。
description.en: The scholarship of “Medium and Environment” was first explored by Marshall McLuhan in the 1960s with a series of academic and practical works. However, this field was not gaining much attention until the past decade when technology has brought novel challenges and scholars in film and media have been shifting their focuses to this aspect. Because of these, the studies of medium and environment has recently been an emerging field that intends to examine the phenomena intertwining the two aspects through interdisciplinary approach. Based on this background, this course will introduce cutting-edge scholarships of medium and environment studies to the traditional field of urban cultural studies, pursuing effective perspectives to unfold today’s critical urban issues, for instance globalization in digital era, carnival and creative industry, smart city, Netflix economy (Harvey, 2020), and so forth. Student will be expected to learn how to bridge theories and practices, to develop critica

name.zh: 文化觸媒介入都市設計
name.en: Cultural Medium Intervening into Urban Design

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；2. 探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；3. 探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；4. 學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.Contents：1. The indoor environment of different types of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.

notes: 日職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一。健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二。建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三。生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四。診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

description.zh: 本課程將介紹國內外的房屋生產系統和裝修技術案例。該課程將在以下主題中進行。A. 規劃審查施工生產的總體方向，包括施工合同，項目預算，生命週期，  風險管理和資金分配方法。B. 設計物流和裝貨的程度，施工方法。 設計系統，建築設計智能，建築材  料和性能。 建築生產對社會的影響。C. 施工現場調查，施工計劃，施工前時間表，施工管理，方法及其演變。D. 裝修建築拆除或裝修的評估標準，裝修計劃，設計，項目，法令和系統。E. 拆除：建築拆除的機械和方法，以及建築廢料的再利用。
description.en: This course will introduce the domestic and foreign housing production system and renovation technology cases.The course will be conducted in the following topics.A.	Planning A review of the overall direction of construction production, including construction contract, project budget,life cycle, risk management and method of fund dispatch.B.	Design The degree of logistics and loading, construction method. Design system, building design intelligence,building materials and performance. The influence of construction production to society.C.	Construction The site investigation, construction plan, time schedule before construction, construction management,methods and their evolutions.D.	Renovation The assessment criteria of building demolition or renovation, the renovation plan, design, project, decree and system.E.	Demolition：The building demolition machinery and methods, and the reuse of building waste materials.

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉質與量研究方法的設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬；主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、行動研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with qualitative and quantitative research procedures and the statistical design involved in education and applied linguistics research. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

notes: 「應用語言實務研究」及「文學文化應用寫作」二擇一

description.zh: 本課程將引領學生將閱讀及寫作技巧運用到課堂中的文字研究。學生可藉本課程獨力完成知識性創意、評論式及論證式的文體，並可藉此學習其中批判式閱讀及思考的應用及價值。
description.en: In this course students will learn to apply their reading and writing skills to the study of texts from a variety of sources. The course is geared to teach the student the use and value of critical reading and thinking in the production their own independent, intellectually creative, and critically structured and argued essays intended for an educated audience.

name.en: Writing Application in Literature and Culture Studies

notes: 「應用語言實務研究」及「文學文化應用寫作」二擇一

description.zh: 本課程為任職於英語教育之教師所設計，主旨在於分析數位教材於英語教學中的角色。藉由電腦 / 科技輔助語言教學、電腦媒介溝通、以及線上教學相關理論、研究與應用的研討來瞭解數位教材如何輔助英語學習。因應數位教材與學習者特性所採用之評量、評估、以及施測方法亦將是本課程重點。
description.en: This course is designed for in-service English teachers to analyze the pedagogical role of electronic courseware in the language classroom. Theories and studies of CALL (computer-assisted language learning), TELL (technology-enhanced language learning), CMC (computer-mediated communication), and online learning will be discussed to understand the utilization of electronic courseware in assisting English learning. Assessment, evaluation, and testing measurements in responding to electronic courseware and to learner characteristics will also be discussed.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項・
description.en: This course has provided: money and capital market、Investments 、How to obtaining and using funds、Maximize the value o their firms、How to maximize stockholders' stock、To know agency problem 、To know the price of the firm's stock, use of debt and dividend policy.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助高階管理階層作決策。一般而言，這門課為商學課程中的課程主要協助學員們具有整合能力。學員不只是在策略管理中應活學活用，也融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課將幫助您學習、研讀個案和討論，這是此門課的目標。 1. 瞭解組織所處環境 2. 分析外部環境之時機和危機 3. 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 4. 探討企業不同層次之應對策略。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making at the top management level. Traditionally, this course has been the capstone course in the business program and is taught at the last year of study so that students can integrate functional area knowledge into a coherent one. Students are expected not only to learn a body of knowledge on strategic management, but also to synthesize economics, accounting, and marketing as an aid top management level decisions. We will use a combination of readings, case studies, and lectures to achieve the goals of the course.

description.zh: 資訊科技是整合策略，使用者和組織系統，幫助高階主管達成組織目標，以及了解資訊科技。本課程學習主題：透過資訊系統獲取策略優勢，透過資訊系統應用，支援管理和執行資訊科技應用，獲得競爭優勢。全課程以哈佛個案研討方式進行。
description.en: The need for information-based support for managers is increasing as the modern management imperatives of reach and to meet their organization's goals. Information management function provides information to support operations, management analysis, and decision- making functions in an organization. We will also look at the role in formation play in helping managers meet goals by examining the characteristics of information systems that make managers' job easier. Topic of learning: Acquiring strategic advantage through information systems. Supporting managers and executives through IS applications. Managing the risk inherent in developing and using IS applications. Attaining and practicing technological leadership. This course is taught by HBS cases.

description.zh: 公司治理在商業的過程中扮演核心角色，提供公司目標及策略上的協助並助其達成期望。也提供讓員工共事的價值觀即確保企業永續經營的收支平衡。在現階段競爭時代當中，本課程除提供同事專業知識外，並以此讓學生瞭解企業運作之道。 ◆公司治理定義與演進 ◆公司治理關鍵議題 ◆公司治理演進 ◆公司治理模式 ◆公司治理架構 ◆公司治理應用 ◆公司治理維持與發展。
description.en: Corporate governance is the combination of legal and political governance mechanisms external to the firm, along with monitoring and incentive governance mechanisms internal to the firm, linked and driven by the forces of investment markets, to produce value-increasing outcomes for firms' owners and, ultimately, society at large. In this course, we will survey corporate governance, taking the investor's point of view. By the end of the course, you should have a well-informed understanding of the basic corporate governance problem and the major issues in corporate governance, prominent proposed solutions to the corporate governance problem, the way the problem is actually addressed in a variety of companies and countries, and evidence on the prospects for and drawbacks of the various solutions. This course is therefore comprised of distinct intellectual components-the practice and the science-which are intertwined throughout the semester's activities.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於讓同學們瞭解經營績效評估的方法，強調理論與實作並重。首先會介紹資料包絡分析法 (DEA) 的基本概念，讓同學們對於 DEA 理論有基本的瞭解，接下來再讓同學們學習如何使用電腦套裝軟體進行實際運算，並探討各種企業經營效率分析上的應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students understand the methods of business performance evaluation, emphasizing both theory and practice. Firstly, this course will introduce the basic concept of Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA) so that students can understand DEA theory. Then students will learn how to use computer-packaged software for actual calculations and discuss the application of various business efficiency analyses.

name.zh: 企業經營效率分析實作
name.en: Implementation of Business Operation Efficiency Analysis

notes: 上限 10 人，密集授課 6 週

description.zh: 本課程藉由探討組織理論之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計之傳統及現代理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織之能力。本課程包含下列四大要綱：第一部份：組織與組織理論基礎 ；第二部分：組織結構與設計；第三部分：網際網路環境下，當代與未來的組織設計趨勢；第四部份：組織理論個案探討。本課程藉由探討組織理論之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計之傳統及現代理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織之能力。本課程包含下列四大要綱：第一部份：組織與組織理論基礎 ；第二部分：組織結構與設計；第三部分：網際網路環境下，當代與未來的組織設計趨勢；第四部份：組織理論個案探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to integrate the most resent thinking about organization design with classic and traditional ideas and theories. This course covers the following three major parts: Part 1: organization and organization theories Part 2: organization structure and design Part 3: new thinking of organization design in the Internet era, Part IV case study.

description.zh: 本課程介紹許多有關於組織中的個人、團隊與組織交互作用的研究。明確地說，本課程內容主要在探討如何改善員工績效與利社會行為，降低缺勤與離職率，以及提高工作滿足與組織承諾等員工態度。
description.en: This course introduces a variety of researches that investigates the interactions between individuals, groups, and organization. Specifically, it focuses on how to improve employee performance and prosocial behaviors, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and enhance job attitudes such as job satisfaction and organizational commitment.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類資料探勘技術與理論的基礎觀念及架構，以奠定學生日後從事資料探勘分析與研究工作時之需。相關的分析技術將包括應用在分類 (classification)、推估 (estimation)、預測 (prediction)、關聯式分組 (affinity grouping)、同質分組 (clustering) 等功能中的決策樹、(decision tree) 多變量分析 (multivariate analysis) 及類神經網路 (neural network) 等方法。此外為了讓學生對相關技術有更深的瞭解，課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解在商業智慧分析上資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: Several fundamental theories of data mining techniques are included in this course. For examples, decision tree, multivariate analysis and neural network. All these techniques will be applied in different areas, such as classification, association rule, forecasting, and pattern recognition. And various applications in different enterprises are also included.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用量化的管理決策模型來解析管理上的各種問題，主要決策模型求解方法有：線性規劃、整數規劃、非線性規劃、層級分析法與網路分析法等。課程內容主要以案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，故課程中會用工程與管理上之各種實際應用問題做說明，最佳化求解軟體與決策工具軟體會用來進行問題求解與輔助說明所得數據之管理意涵，並進行模型成本效益分析。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss how to use quantitative management decision-making models to analyze various management problems. The methods for solving the decision-making models include: linear programming, integer programming, nonlinear programming, hierarchical analysis process and network process etc. The course content is mainly based on case illustrations such that students can understand how the theory is combined with practical problems. Therefore, various practical application problems in engineering and management will be used to explain the models. Optimization software and decision-making tools will be used to solve the problems and assist in explaining the management implications of the obtained data, and perform model cost-benefit analysis.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行設計發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further design presentation. Efficient experience exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 圖像數位畫技術已然成熟，並朝多向度發展，深入各個應用領域。本課程重點是針對藝術與設計應用的相關技術，介紹相關的電腦圖像技術原理，並探討未來的發展趨勢。透過藝術創作與設計案例，協助學生建立對各類型數位圖像科技之整合能力。
description.en: This course is directed to discuss the theories and applications of computer graphics and the future development of the technology. The students will be provided with integrating the related technologies of computer graphics through the real design cases in digital environment.

description.zh: 設計是造就其所處時代和文化下的產物。它是社會共有的價值觀體現，但設計的思考過程也用於代表特定的概念，鼓勵某些活動，從而影響社會和文化。本課程介紹現代和後現代設計的時代精神，涉及的重要發展包括建築、平面設計、產品設計、家具設計、室內設計、數字設計，甚至商業設計。本課程提供理解設計史上的精彩作品，透過政治、宗教、技術、文化、氣候和地理因素影響下的背景梳理。
description.en: Design is a product of the period and culture in which it is created. It is a representation of values shared by society but also used to represent specific ideals, encourage certain activities, and thus influence society and culture. This course provides an introduction to the zeitgeist of Modern and Postmodern Design. It deals with the most important developments including architecture, graphic design, product design, furniture design, interior design, digital design, and even business design. This course provides the background needed for understanding the rich heritage of historical design in the arts, as influenced by political, religious, technological, cultural, climatic and geographic factors.

description.zh: Brundtland 報告在 1987 年將永續發展定義為「在不損害後代子孫滿足其自身需求的能力的前提下滿足當前需求的發展。」17 個永續發展目標依循千禧年共同訂定發展目標的成功基礎上延展，其中包括諸如氣候變化，經濟不平等，創新，可持續消費，和平與正義等新領域。17 個永續發展目標更於 2016 年 1 月成為聯合國致力發展推動政策及生效直至 2030 年。本課程旨在探討研究「永續發展」新概念和理論基礎。課程論述著重於工業化國家（尤其是台灣地區）的永續性問題，例如人口老齡化，可持續消費等。課程中透過創新產品設計與開發方法來系統化引導學生探索有關可持續性，經濟和技術層面以及相關知識社會學，並嘗試帶領學生提出具可行性的新產品、系統及服務概念，為當前狀態下提供更好的友善環境解決方案。課程期待學生透過修習該課程，應可以掌握跨學科永續發展的設計原理，並教導如何藉由創新產品設計和開發方法來引導不同永續相關背景和設計背景的專業人員合作以瞭解開發市場上成功之環境友善產品之關鍵課題，針對環境需求，提出創新友善環境解決方案並進而產生創新環境友善產品。
description.en: Sustainable development is defined by Brundtland Report (1987) as “development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.” There are 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) build on the successes of the Millennium Development Goals, while including new areas such as climate change, economic inequality, innovation, sustainable consumption, peace and justice, among other priorities. The 17 SDGs came into effect in January 2016, and they will continue to guide UNDP policy and funding until 2030. This course aims to explore alternative conceptions and theoretical underpinnings of the notion of “sustainable development.” It focuses on the sustainability problems of industrial countries, especially in Taiwan such as aging of populations, sustainable consumption, etc. It intends to use IPDD approach systematically to explore the sociology of knowledge around sustainability, the economic and technological dimensions a

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 物件導向程式語言已成為當前軟體發展主流語言，利用抽象、封裝、委任、繼承、多形等特性達成軟體設計的彈性、重複使用性等。隨著軟體規模日漸龐大，軟體工程師需更進一步具備更有效的抽象化與重覆使用設計技術，而設計樣式為當前滿足此目標主要的設計方法。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標。學生須於課後投入約 150~200 小時完成一個樣式導向軟體設計專題。    本課程涵蓋下列主題：1	物件導向式程式設計原理 2	單元測試 3	設計樣式 4	樣式導向設計原理 5	樣式導向設計個案研究 6	樣式語言 7	樣式語言個案研究 8	樣式導向軟體設計專題
description.en: Object-oriented programming languages such as C++ and Java have become the main stream in modern software development. Object-orientation makes flexibility and reuse possible through its characteristics of abstraction, encapsulation, delegation, inheritance, and polymorphism. However, as the scale of software increases, software engineers need an even more powerful tool of abstraction and reuse. Design patterns have been established as the main design techniques to achieve reusable object-oriented design. This course aims to establish this core capability. The student is expected to complete a term project that involves 150 to 200 hours of work off class.     The following topics are covered: 1	Principles of object-oriented programming 2	Unit testing3	Design patterns4	Principles of pattern-oriented design5	Case studies in pattern-oriented design6	Pattern languages7	Case studies in Pattern languages8	Term project in pattern-oriented design

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋電腦科學的理論基礎。其內容包含自動機理論，電腦語言學，以及計算形式等。電腦相關的基本數學也將涵蓋在課程範圍之中。包括集合論，基本關係及及操作，以及理論證明工具與技術。課程大綱：基礎理論介紹，有限狀態自動機 / 一般敘述語法，Regular 集合的基本性質，前後文無相關文法， Pushdown 自動機，杜林機（turning machines），Chomsky 層次結構，基本關係及操作，理論證明技術及工具。
description.en: This course will look the theoretical foundation in computer science.  Automata theory, languages, and computation formalism will be examined in details.  Various fundamental computer-related mathematics will also be covered.  They include, sets/subsets, basic relations and operations and tools/techniques for proving theorems. Course Outline: Introduction to Theoretical Foundations, Finite Automata / Regular Expression, Properties of Regular Sets, Context-Free Grammars, Pushdown Automata, Turing Machines, The Chomsky Hierarchy (tentative), Basic Relations and Operations, Tools/Techniques for Proving Theorems.

notes: 資工所、資安學程和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5. 分散式同作控制   6. 電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1. Process synchronization 2. Concurrency Mechanisms 3. Virtual memory 4. Distributed Systems 5. Distributed Concurrency Control 6. Queuing Models

notes: 資工四、資工所、資安學位學程和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹密碼學的理論與實際，其主要內容如下：簡介；背景知識；DES 保密系統；RSA 保密系統；其他公開金匙系統；數位簽章；網路安全
description.en: Principles and practice of cryptography are covered in this course. It contains the following material:  Introduction；Background Theory；Data Encryption Standard (DES)；RSA Cryptosystem；Other Public-key Cryptosystems；Digital Signatures；Internet Security

notes: 資工所、資安學位學程和電資外生班合開，優先先大樓

description.zh: 本課程是研究所程度進階的巨量資料探勘與應用課程，主要介紹巨量資料探勘概念和原理、分散式計算基本架構、及各種應用包括: Link Analysis、Social Network Graph Mining、推薦系統等，並且將介紹在處理巨量資料時常用的機器學習方法，如：類神經網路、SVM 等，除了觀念的介紹外，透過平行化程式設計的練習以及期末專題，能讓學生認識實際巨量資料探勘的程式設計以及機器學習等工具的應用方式。
description.en: This course introduces the concepts in big data mining and advanced applications in machine learning. Topics include big data concepts, distributed computing infrastructure, and machine learning methods commonly used in processing big data, such as neural networks, support vector machines. In addition to concept introduction, parallel programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the processing steps and practical tools in big data anlaytics.

notes: 資工四、資工所、AI 和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 本課程主要內容為：1. 嵌入式智慧計算系統、2. 嵌入式影像處理技術、3. 影像辨識技術、4. 人工智慧辨識技術、5. 實境互動界面技術，並整合實務議題之專案開發。
description.en: The course contents include: 1. Embedded Computing Systems; 2. Embedded image processing techniques; 3. Image recognition techniques; 4. Artificial intelligence techniques for image analytics; 5. AR-based interactive systems; 6. Practical Projects

name.zh: 嵌入式智慧影像分析與實境界面
name.en: Embedded Computing Systems for Intelligent Image Analytics and Interactive Systems

notes: 資工四、資工所和 AI 學位學程合開

description.zh: 本課程除了介紹技術的原理之外，更著重在實際資安檢測工具的使用，例如：網路封包監聽工具 (packet sniffer)、網路稽核紀錄分析 (network audit log analysis) 等，在 CDX 雲端資安攻防平台上實際進行實作分析與演練，讓學生能更了解技術原理的真實應用情境。課程內容包含：●計算機網路回顧●網路封包監聽工具●網路稽核紀錄分析 ●CDX 雲端資安攻防平台介紹●網頁安全●滲透測試●弱點評估及測試工具●入侵偵測工具
description.en: This course aims to provide practical training on security tools, such as network packet sniffer, network audit log analysis, etc. Operations on Cyber Defense Exercises (CDX) platform for practical attack/defense exercises are trained in classes. Students can better understand the real application scenarios on information security techniques. Course contents including:●TCP/IP protocols●Packet sniffer●Network audit log analysis●CDX cloud security attack/defense platform●Web security: SQL injection, XSS attack, etc.●Penetration test●Intrusion detection: snort tools

notes: 新進謝文彬老師、資工四所資安學程和電資外班合開

description.zh: 本課程除了介紹軟體開發架構及安全保護的原理之外，更著重在軟體開發平台的實際操作使用，例如:iOS 或 Android 的開發平台等，並以國網中心所建置的 CDX 雲端資安攻防平台進行實作分析與演練，讓學生能更了解技術原理的實際應用情境。課程內容包含：軟體開發流程 ●軟體潛在威脅 ●惡意軟體偵測 (malware detection)●網頁程式安全 (Web application security)●行動應用軟體安全 (Mobile App security): iOS, Android●App 漏洞與弱點 (Vulnerabilities in Apps)●App 安全檢測 (Security testing of Apps): static, dynamic●逆向工程 (reverse engineering)
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	The course aims to introduce principles of software development architecture and associated security technologies. The course also focuses on discussing security issues of actual operations on software development platforms, such as iOS or Android platforms, etc. Students will use CDX cloud platform to exercise practical analysis regarding security attack and defense events, and students are expected to possess better understand of practical applications of security issues for software development. Course contents including:●Software developing procedure●Potential threats for software development ●Malware detection●Web application security●Mobile App security: iOS, Android●Vulnerabilities in Apps●App Security testing: static, dynamic●Reverse engineering

notes: 資工四、資工所、資安學程和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 在各指導教授的指導下，從事環境規劃與管理等相關領域的論文寫作，其宜包括研究方法或實驗方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。
description.en: A thesis of Ms. Degree should be proposed by all students associated with the agreement of their instructor professor. The thesis focuses on the fields in "Environmental Planning and Management", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC 及 O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括 PSI 指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 政策研究能檢視理論和實務的切合程度。本課程將帶領大家認識環境政策的經濟分析方法，學習經濟的思維觀點，以及如何運用經濟方法瞭解解決環境問題。除此之外上課內容並與法律結合，探討環境法的經濟分析觀點和傳統思維有何不同，尤其是對環境行為上之改變效果。希望學生能夠具體瞭解經濟分析方法幫助政府解決環境問題及規劃環境政策時所扮演的角色。
description.en: There is a significant trade-off between economic growth and environmental quality.  From this course, students will learn fundamental concepts in Environmental Economics and how to analyze environmental policy issues by using economic tools.  In additions, this course combines economic analysis to law, especially shows students how regulations affect people's behavior.  After this class, students not only know how economic approaches help the government deal with environmental issues and the differences between theory and practices.

name.en: Environmental Economics and Environmental Policies Analysis

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對水質化學之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括高等平衡化學、高等複合化學、高等氧化還原化學在於薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序之應用
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of water chemistry, water quality and water quality control.  The topic will include the applications of Chemical equilibrium, Redox reaction and coordination chemistry on water treatment processes such as CSF, membrane, GAC, Ion exchange and disinfection processes.

description.zh: 本課程目的為使學生認識資源處理之各種物理選別及濕式冶金技術，包括破碎、粉碎、篩分、比重選別、浮游選別、磁力選別等物理選別技術，以及吸附、離子交換、溶媒萃取、晶析、沉澱分離等濕式冶金技術，並熟悉其理論基礎與使用時機，進而活用各種技術於實際之資源回收再生工作上。
description.en: This course will introduce the theory and application of various resources processing technologies, including the physical separation technologies such as crushing, grinding, sieving, gravitation separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc., as well as the hydrometallurgy technologies such as adsorption, ion exchange, solvent extraction, crystallization, precipitation, etc.

description.zh: 全球暖化與氣候變遷已對人類社會造成面臨前所未有的挑戰。不論是哪個國家，都遭受其帶來的影響。並且在 IPCC 發布的報告中，諸多科學證據證實氣候變遷已是不可改變的事實，因此為了謀求世界各地環境的永續發展，「減緩」與「調適」是現階段全球順應氣候變遷積極採取的方式。在聯合國報告中曾經指出我國臺灣舉凡環境及氣候條件隸屬於氣候變遷高危險群，極端氣候事件，例如熱浪、颱風、洪水… 等皆逐漸嚴重影響我們的家園，因此，防減災與氣候變遷調適相對更加重要。其中氣候變遷調適更是能夠面對未來氣候可能產生的衝擊，透過周延的規畫以適應充滿挑戰與變化的新環境。因此本課程針對國際與我國減少災害風險與氣候變遷調適介紹，並探討其各中因應方式與困境等課題，期藉培養與提高對氣候變遷防減災與氣候變遷調適的認識。
description.en: Global warming and climate change are the biggest challenges to human society. With current warming trend proceeds at an unprecedented rate, climate change poses a threat to all countries.
