In the IPCC assessment reports, much of scientific evidence indicates climate change an unalterable fact, so in order to meet the needs of present generations without jeopardizing the ability of futures generations to meet their own need, approaches on "mitigation" and "adaptation" needed to be adopted in response to climate change. Taiwan is vulnerable and at high risk to climate change because of geographic exposure and climatic conditions. Extreme weather events, such as heat wave, typhoon, and flood, bring catastrophic damages in Taiwan. Hence, proper climate change adaptation and disaster risk reduction measures needed to be taken proactively to reduce many of the adverse impacts and to enhance beneficial impacts. Through this course, students will increase their awareness and understanding to

name.zh: 防減災與氣候變遷調適
name.en: Disaster Prevention and Reduction, Climate Change Adaptation

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作。
description.en: Master  thesis  studying  and  writing .

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 自動化機械簡介，規劃及設計，驅動器，感測器可程式控制，氣液壓迴路控制，電腦介面控制，自動化系統實例介紹及應用。
description.en: Introduction ， design  and  planning  for  Automatic  machine ， Actuators  sensors ， PLC ， pneumatic  control ， PC - based  control ， Examples  for  Automatic  system  and  its  application .

notes: 計中電腦教室，自動化所。鐵道和半導體合開

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解數位影像之觀念及相關技術，並學習實際用高階語言實現數位影像處理之技術。內容包含：(1) 介紹，(2) 數位影像基礎，(3) 空間域影像強化，(4) 頻域影像強化，(5) 影像還原，(6) 彩色影像處理，(7) 形態學影像處理，(8) 影像分割，(9) 小波與多解析處理，(10) 影像壓縮。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing. In addition, students will be using the high level language (C++, Java, Matlab etc.) to complete the programming of the corresponding techniques. The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Digital Image Fundamentals, (3) Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain, (4) Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain, (5) Image Restoration, (6) Color Image Processing, (7) Morphological Image Processing, (8) Image Segmentation, (9) Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, (10) Image Compression.

notes: 自動化所和 AI、半導體學位學程合開

description.zh: 本課程主要探討多輸入多輸出系統 (MIMO) 其系統行為之描述，內容包括 MIMO 系統之穩定性分析、觀察性分析及其控制器設計，並探討 MIMO 系統的物理觀念及其數學描述的各種方法，是線性系統之進階課程，適合碩士班以上之學生學習。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to explore the behaviors of multivariable systems. The contents includes: stability analysis, observability analysis, and controller designs for MIMO linear systems. Besides, we will introduce the physical concept of MMIO linear systems and various methods of describing MIMO linear systems via mathematical model. This is an advanced course to linear system theory, and is especially for graduate students.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討非線性系統與線性系統之間的不同，並介紹 Lyapunov stability 及其相關觀念。除此之外，將介紹如何利用各種穩定性分析的觀念及各種方法探討非線性系統的穩定性，最後並介紹如何設計控制器使非線性系統穩定。
description.en: This course mainly explores the different between the nonlinear system and linear system, and introduces the concept Lyapunov stability. Besides, one wants to introduce how to utilize the concept and method of stability analysis to explore the stability of nonlinear system. Finally, the designs of nonlinear controllers are introduced to stabilize the nonlinear systems.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 課程主要內容介紹自動化科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，並側重在自動化科技相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental theories and advanced technologies in the field of automatic and advanced technologies. The topics covered mainly in the areas of automation technologies, and related research areas.

description.zh: 本課程以講授工業用計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到目前廣泛於工業上使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。媒體存取控制也包含目前廣泛於各類控制器上使用的控制區域網路 (CAN Bus)。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器使用的路由協定與路由演算法。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer. Popular physical layer medium are discussed first. Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion. The contents of the media access control also include CAN bus which is widely used in various controllers. Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1. 簡介 2. 二維線性系統分析 3. 繞射理論 4. 近場及遠場繞射 5. 透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6. 影像系統之頻域分析 7. 空間濾波與光資訊處理 8. 全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 1. 光纖通訊系統介紹 2. 光纖種類及特性 3. 訊號的退化 4. 發光器 5. 接收器 6. 中繼站及光放大器 7. 數位傳輸系統 8. 光固子及 DWDM 系統
description.en: 1.Introduction to optical fiber communications.2.Optical fibers-losses and fabrications3.Signal degradation4.Light emitters5.Optical receivers6.Repeaters and optical amplifier7.Digital communications8.Solitions and dense wavelength-division multiplexing   tgdi systems

description.zh: 本課程介紹固體，尤其是半導體的光學性質，目的在了解光學檢測及光電元件的基礎原理。 藉由學習電磁波與半導體的交互作用，一方面可了解光在半導體中的產生、傳播、吸收、散射、及在界面的透射與反射等現象的規律，另一方面亦可認識光學特性與能帶結構、聲子結構、束縛與自由電子、及各種激發態之間的關係。課程內容包含固態物理複習、光學特性簡介、古典模型、帶間躍遷、激子、螢光現象、半導體低維系統的光學性質、自由載子及缺陷的光學性質、聲子相關特性、非線性光學性質等。
description.en: This course introduces the optical properties of solids, mainly semiconductors. The fundamental principles of absorption, reflection, luminescence and light scattering will be illustrated in terms of classical and quantum theories as appropriate. It mainly includes (1) Introduction (2) Classical propagation (3) Interband absorption (4) Excitons (5) Luminescence (6) Low-dimensional systems of semiconductors (7) Free electrons (8) Luminescence centers (9) Phonons (10)Nonlinear properties.

description.zh: 1. FPD 技術背景簡介 2.FPD 製程原理 3. 偏極化: Jones 矩陣 4. 液晶顯示器的 Jones 矩陣模型 5. 主動式液晶顯示面板設計初步
description.en: 1. FPD General 2. Vacuum and Vacuum System 3. Kinetic Theory of Gas4. Physical Vapor Deposition 5. Light-Solid Interaction6. AMLCD: Polarization 7. AMLCD: Panel Design

name.en: The Principle and Practice of Display Technologies

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 限生化碩選課；和博班生化組合開

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋以下幾項範圍：染色体結構，DNA 複製與轉錄，蛋白質結構、功能、輸送、合成與分解、真核與原核細胞基因調控、分子發育學、跳躍基因、癌症與免疫生物學等。並引導學生探討幾個相關分子生物化學較深入的知識。包括：蛋白質接受器、生物膜、生物代謝和基因調控、人類疾病的生物化學及分子生物和生物技術。
description.en: Lectures are concerned with number of selected topics in molecular biochemistry.: structure and coding capacity of DNA chromosomes; DNA replication; transcription, protein synthesis; protein structure and function; protein transport; protein degradation; receptors; biological membranes; prokaryotic and eukaryotic regulation; metabolic and genetic regulation; transposable elements and genetic engineering; cancer and immunobiology, biochemistry of human diseases and the techniques that underpin the developments of molecular biology and biotechnology.

description.zh: 此課程包含幾大方向： 1.	醫工簡介 2.	常用之醫學材料 甲、	金屬 乙、	高分子 丙、	陶瓷 3.	奈米技術 4.	材料測試 甲、	物理 / 機械測試 乙、	細胞測試
description.en: The content of the lecture includes:1.Introduction to biomedical engineering2.commonly used medical materials: metals, polymers, ceramic3.nano-technology4.materials testing: physical/mechanical tests,iocompatibility tests

description.zh: 本課程是介紹基因工程學之基礎知識。內容包括寄主細胞的選擇：細菌、酵母菌、真菌等微生物或昆蟲細胞、哺乳類動物細胞等動物細胞或者是植物細胞。聚合連鎖反應、基因轉殖、質體轉型、病毒轉換、基因槍等常用的基因工程學之方法。
description.en: This course is to introduce basic knowledge of genetic engineering, including the selection of host cells, bacterial, yeast, fungi, insect cell, mammalian cell, or plant cell. The powerful methods of genetic engineering, including polymerase chain reaction (PCR), gene clone, plasmid transformation, virus transduction, and biolistics are also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 限化工碩選課；和博班化工組合開

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

notes: 化工所和 EOMP 合開，網路預選限 80 人；核心七選二

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

notes: 網路預選限 60 人；化工生化合開

description.zh: 奈米科技在近年來有極快的進展，因此在本課程將介紹最新的奈米材料，包含有量子點、奈米碳材 (富勒烯、奈米碳管、石墨烯)、二維奈米材料 (二硫化鉬與金屬化) 等，對於這些奈米材料的物理、化學與光電特性以及製程方法做進一步的介紹，以期許可以帶給同學當今最新的奈米化技術與科技知識。
description.en: Nanotechnology has a great progress in recent years. This class will introduce the latest information about nanomaterials and their applications. The nanomaterials include quantum dots, fullerene, carbon nanotube, graphene and molybdenum disulfide (MoS2). Their physical, chemical and optoelectronic properties will be comprehensively introduced. We expect to bring the knowledge of newest nanomaterials and technologies to students.

notes: 先教室；網路預選限 25 人 (研究所); 大三四化工所合

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並針對半導體材料的特性，實際操作拉曼及 FTIR 顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、x 光光電能譜、以及材料晶相、機械、電磁特性相關設備。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the Raman/FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, x-ray photoelectric spectrometer. Furthermore, instruments to measure crystalline, micro-mechanical, and electrical properties specifically for semiconductor materials will also be introduced.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 化工所和 EOMP 合開，網路預選限 15 人

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.X 光之本質 2. 晶体幾何及倒置晶格 3. 晶體立體投影 4.X 光繞射原理 5.X 光繞射實驗方法 (繞射儀，Laue 照相法，粉末法) 6.X 光繞射之應用 (包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 1. 電子光學簡介 2. 穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3. 電子繞射理論 4. 電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5. 掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 6. EDS 及 WDS 之 X 光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

description.zh: 內容包括材料彈塑性變形，差排，高溫變形，低溫拉伸破壞，高溫破壞及疲勞。
description.en: The contents include elastic and plastic deformation in materials，dislocations，high temperature deformation，tensile fracture at low temperature，high temperature fracture and fatigue。

description.zh: 課程綱要：1. 非晶質材料之組成和結構 2. 玻璃形成及相分離 3. 晶質化過程 4. 非晶質材料的特性─機械、熱、電、磁、光、抗蝕性質 5. 非晶質材料的應用
description.en: Course Outlines：1.Composition and Structure of Amorphous Materials2.Glass Formation and Immiscibility3.Devitrification of Glass4.Properties of Amorphous Materials─Mechanical, Thermal, Electrical, Magnetic, Optical, Chemical Properties5.Applications of Amorphous Materials

description.zh: 1. 合金製程簡介 2. 成份改變製程　a. 合金熔煉 - 感應電爐、真空感應電爐  b. 合金精煉 - 電弧爐、  c. 電渣重熔精煉、真空電弧精煉、電子束精煉、電漿精煉 3. 合金結構改變製程　a. 凝固控製與快速凝固　　b. 方向性凝固　　　　　c. 熱處理控制 - 均質化、強化處理　　d. 鍛造、晶粒控制　　　　　　　4. 合金形狀改重製程鍛造、軋壓、擠形、粉末冶金 5. 未來合金製程之發展及電腦之應用
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Processes of Structural Alloys.

description.zh: 介紹晶體的各種完美結構，缺陷結構的形成與各種物理特性的相互關係，電子的波動與粒子之性質，電子於自由電子能量井，固態中行為與能帶觀念之介紹，固態材料的鬆散行為，固態的介電性質。
description.en: An introduction to Solid-State Physics in materials science.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 材料所和 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 材料所。半導體和 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 本課程內容含有: (1) 簡介。(2) 貯氫合金種類 (3) 貯氫合金結構與性質 (4) 貯氫合金製程 --- 機械冶金 (5) 貯氫合金製程 --- 真空感應熔煉 (6) 貯氫材料之吸放氫測量方法 (7) 貯氫合金應用 (8) 鎳氫電池材料 (9) 奈米碳材之結構與性質 (10) 奈米碳材之製程 (11) 奈米碳材之應用 (12) 氫燃料電池 --- 質子交換膜材料 (13) 氫燃料電池 --- 膜電極組材料
description.en: The class includes :1.Course Introduction, 2.Classes of Hydrogen Storage Alloys (HSAs),3. Structure and Properties of HSAs,4. Production of HSAs ---Mechanical Alloying Process,5.,roduction of HSAs ---Vacuum Induction Melting (VIM) Process,6.. Method of Measuring Storage Capacity for Hydrogen Storage Materials,7. Application of HSAs,8. Materials of Nickel Hydride Battery Electrode,9. Structure and Properties of Carbon Nano Tubes (CNTs), 10. Production of CNTs, 11. Application of CNTs,12. Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Proton Exchange Membrane, 13 Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Membrane Electrode Assembly (MEA)

description.zh: 電化學工程特論的領域眾多，舉凡腐蝕現象與電泳作用的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了介紹基本的電化學原理外，另將著重於電化學分析方法在能源與生醫系統研究上的應用。
description.en: Special topics in the field of electrochemistry include many different phenomena (e.g., corrosion and electrophoresis, electro analytical sensors and batteries devices, and the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine technologies……). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electro-analytical methods to the study of energy and biomedical systems.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.X 光之本質 2. 晶体幾何及倒置晶格 3. 晶體立體投影 4.X 光繞射原理 5.X 光繞射實驗方法 (繞射儀，Laue 照相法，粉末法) 6.X 光繞射之應用 (包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 1. 電子光學簡介 2. 穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3. 電子擾繞射理論 4. 電子繞射圖行及缺陷分析方法 5. 掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2.The electron Microscope3.Scanning Electron Microscopy(SEM)　(1)Electron beam-specimen interaction　(2)Image formation in the SEM4.Transmission Electron Microscopy(TEM)　(1)Diffraction Theory  (2)Contrast Theory5.Specimen Preparation

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 資源所和 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 地質災害調查分析課程將介紹地震、山崩、滑坡、地破、地縫等災害的發生原因及其調查分析方法，包括地質調查、工程地質勘查、地球物理探測和遙感技術等方面。課程內容還包括地質災害預防與治理方法等方面。
description.en: This course will introduce the causes and investigation and analysis methods of geological disasters such as earthquakes, landslides, rockfalls, ground fissures, and soil subsidence. It includes geological survey, engineering geological exploration, geophysical exploration, and remote sensing technology. The course also covers prevention and control methods of geological hazards.

description.zh: 資源工程導論為資源工程的入門學科，其範圍包括天然的金屬、非金屬、礦物與石油、天然氣、建築用砂石、石材與水等原生資源，以及工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的可再生資源。期對初學者有一整體的基本概念。
description.en: This is a general introduction class to provide student basic knowledge about resources engineering which include metal, nonmetal, minerals, petroleum, natural gas, aggregates, dimension stone and water resources.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標為學習野外地質學之基本學理與觀察、記錄、思考與綜合分析之方法，並應用於其他地質分科中。野外觀察為地質學研究的最基本工作。在野外觀察時所用的方法與所依據的原則與理論，即是野外地質學學習的重點。本課程之內容在介紹野外地質學的一般觀念及基本原理，包括野外地質學導論，火成岩、沉積岩與變質岩地區的地質現象與地質調查的方法，地形圖與地質圖的製作與應用，地質調查的一般原理等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to learn the basic theory of field geology and the methods of observation, recording, thinking and comprehensive analysis, and apply it to other geological disciplines. Field observation is the most basic work of geological research. The methods and principles and theories used in field observation are the focus of field geology study. The content of this course is to introduce the general concepts and basic principles of field geology, including introduction to field geology, geological phenomena and geological survey methods in areas of igneous rocks, sedimentary rocks and metamorphic rocks, the making and application of topographic maps and geological maps, geological surveys general principles etc.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

description.zh: 本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和電子商務，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
description.en: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

description.zh: 資料和決策課程主要在介紹資訊和資料工程學，電腦推論的應用和企業決策管理等內容的設計的決策支援系統、資料抽離、資料採礦和智慧型的使用者－系統的合作系統。並利用電腦的使用來發現資料的型態，及其他任何類型的本文、影像或數字。其目的為幫助企業經理在不確定之情況下，瞭解資料和決策分析，作出較好的決定。
description.en: Data and Decision course focuses on information and data engineering, computational reasoning applied, and enterprise decision management to the design of decision support systems, information extraction, data mining, and intelligent, adaptive user-system collaboration. It implements the use of computers to discover patterns in data, of any kind, text, images or numbers.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹供應鏈管理中之相關問題及議題 。其中包含產業分析、e 化概念、需求及供應管理、長鞭效應、存貨管理、延遲理論、及供應鏈管理實務。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to offer student a sound introduction of supply chain management relative issues. It includes industry analysis, E-business concept, demand and supply management, bullwhip effect, inventory management, postponement, and supply chain management practice.

description.zh: 「企業領導力」是企業經營管理中非常重要元素和指標。我們將由學術理論和商業實務案例中，共同分析和探討企業領導力的管理策略；並著重於企業價值創新，以培育高教學生具有全球商業開發和經營管理的領導技能。
description.en: The course, Corporate leadership, is offered from a practitioner’s viewpoints on how to deploy the concepts, knowledge, theories and experiences for the development of business leadership practice and to achieve the corporate value creation. In the current market-lead and ubiquitous technology driven world, the Corporate Leadership role is not just the corporate internal management concerning but also needs a broad range of issues, such as cross-cultural knowledge and strategic thinking on business development, communication skills with innovative ideas, and management techniques for the long-term business goals. We will expand the scope and scale of the research related, review articles, complete class projects, and discuss real business cases.

description.zh: 教學目標課程目標：執行計劃的現金流量計劃，並通過提供的財務指標進行分析，從而可以就是否方便執行項目做出全面的決策。在本主題中，模型和項目評估標準為決策提供了必要的要素，尤其是在是否實施投資項目方面。學會識別和定義投資項目的主要成本效益參數”
description.en: Course Objectives：Execute a projected Cash flow planning, analyzing it by the Provided financial indicators that allow comprehensive decisions to be made on whether or not the execution of projects is convenient.In this subject the models and Project evaluation criteria that provide the necessary elements for decision-making, particularly on whether or not to implement investment projects. Learn to identify and define the main cost-benefit parameters of an investment project "

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 本課程講授如何使用 Westlaw International 資料庫進行 IP 研究。主要的專利資料庫的檢索方式也會展示。在每堂課前，學生必須要閱讀教材。課堂參與是必須的。其他資訊請見英文課程摘要。
description.en: This course is intended to expose students to various research skills for studying IP issues. Primarily, this course teaches how to use the Westlaw International database to do IP research. The framework of the database is based on the legal research methodology applied to American law. So, the basic knowledge of the American legal research methodology will be introduced. In addition, this course will demonstrate major patent databases to students. Students will be assgined to one research project. Students are required to study reading materials before each class. Class participation is also required.

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 本課程上學期將以智慧財產局頒佈之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程式後實體」原則先就「程式審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the procedure for patent application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Firstly, in the "formality examination" section, topics such as the constitution of a patent specification and drawings, the allowable subject matter for patents, utility, novelty, inventiveness and other patent elements, the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, and the priority of an patent application, will be sequentially discussed.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (I)

description.zh: 本課程將以案例研討為討論基礎，準備實際醫材產品或相關技術，讓同學模擬實際申請專利的過程，首先是進行專利檢索與分析，討論專利佈局的策略；接著讓同學進行專利說明書 (含申請專利範圍) 撰寫實習，模擬實際上申請各國專利之程序，然後討論之後專利答辯、領證繳費及後續維護事宜。
description.en: This course focuses on the procedural aspects of the patent prosecution in biomedical materials/devices. The topics cover patent search and analysis, write specification/drawings/claims, and office action response. In addition, the practical aspect of international patent prosecution is presented. The patent filing and maintenance strategies are also discussed in class.

name.en: Practice in biomedical materials/devices patent application

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法，培養學生撰寫論文的基本知識與能力。
description.en: This course will introduce research methods and provide students with fundamental knowledge and competence on writing thesis.

description.zh: 本課程探討環境變遷對歷史空間的影響，了解空間閒置情形，並且研究歷史空間如何與現今產業結合，使其獲得活化。
description.en: The aim of this course is to discuss how environmental changes effect historical space, realize the situation of disused historical space, and study on how to combine disused historical space and industries for reutilization.

name.zh: 歷史空間產業活化專題
name.en: Historical Space and Industry Reutilization Project

description.zh: 探索古代生活中重要的文化主題，尤其是恬適快意又發顯美感訊息的生活內容與活動模式，這滲透著義涵與美感的主題，歷經翻檢淘洗終被標舉揭櫫，即是本課程著意介述、體驗、評論的元素。「美學」是以對美的本質及其意義的研究為主題的科學，「文化學」研究文化現象或文化體系，「審美文化」則以其特有形態來彌補「道」、「器」間的距離，以實物印證觀念，用觀念史來概括和昇華物態。「文化生活美學」在相關的三者間另闢新徑，取材傾向生活行為方式及活動內容，探索理解與感受，結合「意義的貞定」、「美感領受的追求與實現」，以古典中國文士階層的開發為主力，擴及君王貴族及民間百姓的留存。本課程分為二部，前者宏觀文化變遷現象及其架構成因，其次，梳理古來時節風尚，人文藝術的脈絡，廣泛取材於文學、思想、器物、禮制、用香、茶藝等生活美學內容，回溯、體驗、評論，而體驗經濟模式的企劃，正是為「文化生活產業化」預做準備。
description.en: Life Aesthetics is the kernel of cultural life; it has become integral in the process toward cultural industrialization and industrial culturalization. In fact, "creative industries" may be connected to various sectors of developments and has become a prospect eagerly and aggressively pursued by visionary people, especially in the wake of Chinese economic expansion.This course will examine the important elements constituting cultural lives across different dynasties in Chinese history and investigate their patterns of presentations. The beauty of traditional behavioral culture, the significance of solar terms and seasonal festivals, and the implications of cultural concerns can serve as sources, based on which students' creativity be stimulated and further brought into full play.

name.zh: 文化生活美學發展專題
name.en: Seminars on the Aesthetics of Life

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 本課程主要闡述財務管理中最重要的投資決策、融資決策與短期資金管理決策之基本架構及企業經理人之財務決策，配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹財務管理之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務管理的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的融資與投資決策制定。課程內容涵蓋：金融市場與金融機構、財務報表與現金流量分析、財務規劃與預測、風險與報酬、債券與股票之評價、資金成本、資本預算決策、資本結構與財務槓桿、營運資金管理、股利政策… 等。本課程結合財務管理實務並融入財務決策研討，以培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之修習，期許學生能具備財務管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、獨立研究之能力、判斷性思考與決策能力，以及制訂並解決財務管理問題之能力。
description.en: The course focus on the three most important decisions of the financial management: the investment decisions, the financing decisions and short-term capital management and financial decisions of corporate managers, and various related topics with case studies. This course combines information and software tools to use; the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics including: Financial markets and financial institutions, the financial statements and cash flow analysis, financial planning and forecasting, risk and return, bond and stock pricing, the cost of capital, capital budgeting decisions, capital structure and financial leverage, working capital management, dividend policy, mergers and acquisitions, etc. This course combines b

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This seminar focuses on report writing of research, group study, and training of students' research ability.

description.zh: 本課程主要是在於介紹一些駭客常用的攻擊方法和可能使用工具，並藉由這些技術的解說讓學生瞭解實際駭客的攻擊行為與思維模式，進而習得如何保護所管理的網路或資訊系統免於被攻擊成功。課程中將輔以實機操作，教導您如何利用現有電腦資源掃描及測試系統的安全問題，藉以保護系統安全，課程中將加強實際的上機操作，藉由上課所模擬的網路環境中，讓同學能夠實際感受攻擊的可能實況
description.en: This course is mainly to introduce network and system attack methods and security assessment tools used by hackers, and to explain the attack behavior and thinking strategy of hackers through the explanation of these technologies. In addition, this course teaches students learn how to protect the managed network or information system to against from being compromised successfully. The course will be supplemented by practices, and teaching students how to use the existing tools to scan and test the security of the system. In order to protect the security of the system, the course will focus on the system and network practices, which can let the students feel the possible network and system attacks.

description.zh: 來自於內部與外部的攻擊使企業在系統及網路保護遭遇許多挑戰，為了有效控制企業風險，政府在內部控制相關法規明確要求資訊系統相關的內部控制，而電腦稽核為確保內部控制的關鍵角色。本課程內容以國際電腦稽核師 (CISA) 認證的各項領域內容為主。期望學生能夠對於瞭解資訊系統稽核及其風險管理相關概念有初步的瞭解，進而瞭解資訊安全及資訊系統稽核的機制與手法，作為協助學生順利考取國際電腦稽核師 (CISA) 認證碁石。
description.en: Internal and external attacks have caused enterprises to encounter many challenges in system and network protection. In order to effectively control enterprise risks, the government's accounting regulations explicitly require information system-related internal controls, and computer audit is a key role for ensuring internal control. The content of this course is based on the content of various fields of the International Computer Auditor (CISA) certification. Students are expected to have a preliminary understanding of the information system audit and its risk management related concepts, and then understand the mechanisms and techniques of information security and information system auditing. Finally, it is expected as a way to help students successfully obtain the CISA certification.

description.zh: 本門課程是財務、電腦、與數學的結合，其主要目標為啟發學生如何設計電腦演算法來解決財務或經濟上的問題。一開始，此課程會複習一些基本的知識，如利率期間結構、選擇權評價理論、隨機過程模型、數值方法、與寫程式時所需的資料結構。之後，會講到一些新奇選擇權的演算法，包括亞洲式選擇權，障礙選擇權、回顧選擇權、重設選擇權、彩虹選擇權、可轉換公司債。
description.en: The major goal of this course is to provide students with complete understanding of many financial markets and products. Topics such as forward and futures, swaps, and options will be fully covered. In addition, the basic pricing methods of these innovative products will be emphasized in this course. Finally, even to a MBA student, the knowledge mentioned in this course is sure to be helpful for his (or her) future career.

notes: 【全英語】/ 資財四甲乙、資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程將介紹數位金融理論以及介紹代表性的實務案例，課程中除了學習數位金融及人工智慧專業知識外，並結合實作來了解如何應用 APP 及聊天機器人於智慧金融及金融行銷等領域。在實作過程中，將鏈結進駐金融科技創新園區金融機構及新創公司所有業師資源，共同創建教學大綱和案例研究，並導入業師進行課程教學或講座或協同教學 (Co-teaching)，在授課過程中，學生不僅可以學習到 APP 的應用程式開發以及最有系統的方式學會如何設計並建立一支經過用戶體驗設計（介面設計與互動設計）的 Chatbot，同時教導學生如何透過實證場域驗證進行串接 API，發想創意，鼓勵金融創新實證之共創生態發展、降低金融科技創新實證門檻、同時兼顧創新風險控管與不影響市場運作機制，並將科技導入進行創新創業。課程內容包括：創業思維、設計思考、數位金融創新商業模式、無現金社會新興平台與行動支付的發展趨勢、保險科技 (InsurTech) 的應用及發展趨勢、籌資模式演進與 P2P 貸款、金融科技的新興資訊工具應用發展趨勢、虛擬貨幣與區塊鏈專題探討、及機器人理財與 AI 的創新應用等，並探討數位新科技與人工智慧發展對金融產業衝擊、新典範的反思與影響。
description.en: This course will provide students with the latest empowering and practical knowledge on Digital Finance enabling them to understand some of the FinTech changes taking place currently in the financial services industry and, most importantly, the trends that will impact the industry in the future. The course content will include peer to peer lending platforms and crowdfunding, internet finance, online finance, bitcoin, digital currencies, digital payments, big data, insurtech, machine learning and its applications in FinTech such as robo-advising. etc. and their practical impact on global banking and finance.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於如何應用計量方法來進行財金議題之研究，課程內容包括縱斷面資料分析、橫斷面資料分析、追蹤資料分析、以及多變量時間序列分析等，讓學生掌握有助於分析經濟和金融數據的計量經濟學學習方法的知識，培養同學具有應用計量軟體進行分析研究的能力。
description.en: The course is aimed to provide essential econometric methods and their application to research issues. Topics cover regression analysis using time-series data, cross-sectional data, and panel data. The multivariate time-series analysis is also introduced in the course. This course is designed to prepare students with knowledge of econometric methods that are useful for analyzing economic and financial data. Students will focus on learning econometric software skills in estimating and analyzing econometric models.

description.zh: 雲端 (Cloud) 與物聯網 (Internet of Things, IoT) 重塑了整個計算世界對於事物的運行方式。除了為各行業提出了新的前沿應用外，也衍生更多在兩者融合對於管理、資訊安全與隱私保護等不得不重視的課題。本課程主要討論雲端與物聯網相關的安全性問題，包括由物聯網衍生出來的新威脅、弱點及兩者融合的相關安全議題。引領學生具備發展雲端與物聯網安全的重要觀念與技術，進而可以分析、設計與規劃未來物聯網與雲端運算融合之應用、與安全管理。
description.en: Cloud and the Internet of Things (IoT) have reshaped the way things are performed across the computing world. In addition to proposing new cutting-edge applications for various industries, there are also more issues that must be paid attention to in the integration of the two, such as management, information security and privacy protection. This course mainly discusses the security issues related to cloud and the IoT, including new threats and weaknesses derived when the two technologies converge. To lead students to understand important concepts and technologies for cloud and IoT security, and then to able to analyze, design, plan application and implement security management of the integration of the cloud and IoT.

notes: 資財四甲乙、資財所合開

description.zh: 物聯網系統包含了感測器與感測網路，邊緣閘道，雲端服務與存取裝置，可建構眾多的端到端商業應用包含無人商店與智慧支付的場景金融，遠距醫療與照護，智慧製造與智慧家庭等。本課程將教授物聯網系統的設計包含裝置與服務的技術，並以各項商業應用場景做課題的探討。
description.en: The Internet of Things (IoT) system encompasses sensors and sensor networks, IoT gateways, cloud services, and mobile devices, enabling the development of numerous end-to-end business applications, including scenarios such as unmanned stores, and intelligent payment in the financial sector, remote healthcare and caregiving, smart manufacturing, and smart homes. This course will teach the design of IoT systems, including device and service technologies, and explore various business application scenarios as topics of discussion.

name.zh: 物聯網系統設計與商業應用
name.en: IoT System design and Business Application

notes: 【全英語】/ 資財四甲乙、資財所合開

description.zh: 金融科技包含兩個字，金融與科技，是近年來新興的產業趨勢，影響的層面非常廣泛，不只是金融方面，更牽涉到新興科技與物聯網。本課程將從不同的角度分析金融科技的技術內容、應用領域及商業模式，並藉智慧財產權與國內外重要公司發展的得失做一介紹，希望達到了解並運用此新興科技的目的。
description.en: FinTech includes two words: Finance and Technology. It is a new trend of industrial field. It has influence on lot of technical fields, not only finance, but also emerging technologies and IoT. This course will analyze FinTech from different angles, such as technology contents, application fields and business models. It also will utilize intellectual property and experience of FinTech leading companies to obtain decent knowledge of this new field.

notes: 【全英語】IMBA、資財所和管理博合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

notes: 排一般教室，限本系生修課，選課人數上限 24 人

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

notes: 排一般教室，限本系生修課，選課人數上限 24 人

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有全面性的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、理論與實務基礎、互動設計方法與技術、科技支援與應用、認知心理、情境設計以及電腦支援協同合作等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, interaction design methods and techniques, technical support and application, cognitive psychology, scenario design and CSCW. Course also incorporates case studies and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.

notes: 排一般教室，限本系生修課，選課人數上限 24 人

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生具備以下的能力：1. 使學生具備能夠把「抽象概念」轉換成實務設計的基本能力。2. 培養學生有美感欣賞與基本應用技巧的能力。3. 訓練學生具有獨立思考與解決問題的視覺構成能力。4. 具備認識感官資訊處理過程以及傳遞原理的基本能力。5. 能了解視覺、聽覺以及空間互動資訊如何運作以及應用的能力。6. 學習如何運用相關的方法、整合相關專業知識與技能於資訊設計上。
description.en: This course is expected to train students to be equipped with the following abilities: 1. Ability to transforming the abstract ideas into practical design. 2. Ability of aesthetic appreciation and basic application skills. 3. Visual construction ability of independent thinking and problem-solving. 4. Understanding of perceived information processing and communication principle. 5 Understanding of knowledge and application of visual, acoustic and spacial interaction information. 6. Learning how to apply relevant methods and integrate knowledge and techniques to practical information design.

notes: 限本系碩一生修 (24 人), 排光華 409

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機械與自動化科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case study, workshop, group discussion, seminars, mechanical engineering and automation in modern Industries.

notes: 機電博及博外生。機械自動外生。能源車輛外生合開

description.zh: 碩士學位論文研究與寫作。
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。

With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

notes: 限本系生修課，上限 15 人

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of the definition of the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.

notes: 限本系生修課，上限 15 人

description.zh: 每週以專題座談，討論專班師生各進行中的研究計畫。
description.en: A weekly seminar discusses the current progress of individual projects.

notes: 排一般教室，限本系生修課，上限 15 人

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論 Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

notes: 機電博及博外生。機械自動外生。能源車輛外生合開

description.zh: 碩士論文寫作
description.en: A Student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程探討太空任務的設計和實施，以實現太空任務目標。本課程涵蓋，太空任務的目標、設計流程、系統工程原理、燃料和動力系統、通訊和導航系統、太空運輸系統、生命維持系統、太空裝備和儀器、以及太空任務的管理和財務考慮因素。
description.en: This course discusses the design and implementation of space missions to achieve their goals. The course covers the goals of space missions, design processes, principles of systems engineering, fuel and propulsion systems, communication and navigation systems, space transportation systems, life support systems, space equipment and instruments, as well as management and financial considerations for space missions.

description.zh: 系統工程是一個專注於複雜系統設計、開發和管理的工程領域，通常涉及許多不同類型的元件。 系統工程結合了幾個不同領域的方面，包括機械工程、電氣工程、工業工程、生產工程、化學工程和電腦科學，以分析、設計和管理複雜的系統。 系統工程工作的例子可能包括分析流程和生產週期、最佳化製造或分銷系統，以及開發系統模型或改進現有系統等項目。本課程將包含：基礎系統工程概論、專案生命週期、系統設計流程、產品實現、技術管理等部分。
description.en: Systems engineering is a field of engineering that focuses on the design, development, and management of complex systems, often involving many different types of components. Systems engineering combines aspects of several different fields, including mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, industrial engineering, production engineering, chemical engineering, and computer science, to analyze, design, and manage complex systems. This course will include an introduction to system engineering, project life cycle, system design process, product realization, technical management.

description.zh: 主要可以分成建模與模擬兩部分。系統建模是基於系統理論設計的工具，主要用於描述、理解和預測系統中組成要素之間的關係，以及如何彼此影響系統行為的機制。模擬是基於建模的一種衍生技術，它可以通過模擬現實系統中可觀察到的行為，確定隱藏在系統中的規則、參數和交互作用，以為其制定一套有效的策略，用以預測未來可能的風險。課程中包含，系統建模簡介、功能建模、結構建模、物理建模與對應的模擬方法。
description.en: System modeling is a tool based on system theory designed to describe, understand, and predict the relationships among the components of a system and the mechanisms that influence each other's behavior. Simulation is a derivative technique based on modeling that identifies the rules, parameters, and interactions hidden in a system by simulating observable behavior in a real system in order to develop an effective strategy for predicting possible future risks. This course includes an introduction to system modeling, functional modeling, structural modeling, physical modeling and corresponding simulation methods.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解軌道車輛工程、冷凍空調工程及自動化科技之最新研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course provides important information with respect to the latest developments or applications on railway engineering, energy engineering and automation technology. The invited speakers include well-known scholars in the engineering field and project executors from National Taipei University of Technology.

description.zh: 「鐵道車輛設計分析」課程，乃為培養具有鐵路車輛分析設計能力之人員，本課程初期將從規範面瞭解車輛設計要求，進而從結構面進行車輛設計與分析，過程中將引導學生採用主流分析軟體進行車輛穩定性與行車舒適度探討。最後將探討與台灣既有鐵道系統的相容性，進行駕駛室與機電設備配置等設計。期望透過本課程，能培植鐵道車輛設計分析人才，厚植本土鐵道車輛設計能力。
description.en: This aim of the course of "Railway Vehicle Design and Analysis" is to cultivate personnel on railway vehicle field. At the beginning of this course, the design requirement and criteria will be given as basic knowledge. Then students will be ask to perform structural design and analysis for railway vehicles. Passenger comfortable index and vehicle dynamic response will be taken into consideration during the process of design and analysis. Finally, the compatibility of the new design with the existing railway system will be discussed.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Mechatronics in Modern Industries.

notes: 機電博及博外生。機械自動外生。能源車輛外生合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧，介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧及分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: The object of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 深耕趨勢學理論，以生活型態資訊為基礎，探討社會趨勢與科技發展趨勢，做為商品企畫的基礎。本課程旨在引導學習者運用學術研究的工具，以科學的方法定義市場需求，並以理性的思維進行商品企畫。
description.en: Current theories and practices of trend study are covered, including trends of living style, fashion and technology development followed by product planning practice. The aims of this course is to put emphasis on conducting research approach in the process of scientific marketing management and reasonable product planning.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray 等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 化工所和 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 生質能源 (bioenergy) 指的是儲存在現有 (活著或剛失去生命) 的動植物體的能量。生質能源的來源，主要是植物將太陽能經由光合作用轉換成葡萄糖，在進一步合生物高分子衍生物 (如多醣體 (polysaccharides)) 。新一代生質能源技術強調環保技術，整合跨領域之技術，包含應用分子生物技術所發展出之基因轉殖、醱酵控制及生物觸媒技術 - 利用生物酵素進行催化化學反應達成環保及高效率與節能之目的。本課程將介紹動植物的多醣體種類及如何運用新興生物系統學的技術開發生質能源。
description.en: Bioenergy is referred to the energy stored in living or recently living biological organisms, such as animals, plants and microbes. The source of bioenergy can be traced back from plants harvesting the sunlight and converting it to glucose, then to other biopolymers such as polysaccharides. The technologies for developing bioenergy, with an emphasis on environmentally compatible, consist of gene cloning technology from molecular biology and enzymatic control and catalytic chemistry (i.e. green chemistry).  The course is an introduction course on the types of polysaccharides in animals and plants, how scientist use system biology to develop bioengergy.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 研究生在第一年必須選定指導教授，以決定設計創作或論文寫作的方向，從事設計創作的研究生必須發展創作理念、創作過程與實作說明，最後彙整創作報告形同於研究論文；從事論文寫作的研究生針對互動媒體設計的相關主題進行研究，並將研究成果撰寫成為論文，其內容包含緒論、文獻探討、研究設計與實施、研究結果與討論、結論與建議等。本課程目的旨在培養獨立企劃研究能力，建構研究設計與研究寫作的能力，對設計創作組而言，過程中培養協同合作的能力是必須具備的要項。
description.en: In the first year graduate students are requested to determine design creation and research topic under the supervision of their advisor. Graduate students who are chosen the fields of design creation should be developed creation principle, design process and practical work. The results of design creation are considered as research thesis. Graduate students who are focus on the research of interactive media design should be undertaken the results of research as a thesis. The content of thesis includes introduction, literature review, research design and approaches, results and discussion, conclusion and suggestions. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. The course includes a training of developing research, writing up and references. To design creation groups. The collaborative capability is in need of the cultivation of ability during the process.

notes: 碩二生 上，下學期皆需選論文

description.zh: 此科目為取得碩士必修課程，修此課程需先經系所核可。
description.en: This course is a requirement for the master degree. Before taking this course, an approval from the department is required.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 1. 二極體電路分析與設計 2. 電晶體電路分析與設計 3. FET 電路分析與設計 4. 放大器頻率響應分析及頻率補償 5. 功率放大器分析與設計 6. 回授放大器分析與設計 7. 差動及運算放大器分析與設計 8. 震盪器分析與設計 9. 主動濾波器分析與設計
description.en: 1. Diode circuit Analysis and Design2. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design3. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design4. FET circuit Analysis and Design5. Amplifier Frequency response Analysis and Componstaion6. Power Amplifier Analysis and Design7. Feedback Amplifier Analysis and Design8. Differential and Operational Amplifier Analysis and Design9. Oscillator Analysis and Design10. Active Filter Analysis and Design

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義 2. 電壓降與停電 3. 電壓不平衡 4. 電力諧波 5. 頻率變動 6. 電壓閃爍 7. 暫態過壓 8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 1. 離散時間訊號與 Z - 轉換 2. 取樣原理 3. 離散傅式轉換與快速傅式轉換 4. 數位濾波器系統設計 5. 同位訊號處理 6. 時變訊號處理 - 短時域傅式轉換 7. 離散時間隨機程序 8. 離訊與訊號估測
description.en: 1. Discrete-time signal and Z-transform 2. Sampling theorem 3. Discrete Fourier Transformer(DFT) and Fast Fourier Transformer(FFT) 4. Digital Filter Design5. Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

description.zh: 1. 需求面管理與節約能源 2. 負載管理策略與成效評估 3. 負載監控與需量控制管理 4. 汽電共生及其他能源應用 5. 配電自動化與配電管理實務
description.en: 1.Demand-side Management and Energy Conservation2.Load Management Strategy and Impact Evaluation3.Load Control Technology and Demand Control Management4.Cogeneration and Other Energy Applications5.Distribution Automation and Distribution Management Technologies

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務有全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端運算發展近況及基本概念 2. 資源虛擬化之基本概念與技術，3. 雲端運算相關技術、效能與安全，4. 虛擬化資料中心建置 - 虛擬計算、儲存、網路與應用，6. 雲端服務規劃，7. 雲端之基礎設施服務、平台服務、軟體服務介紹，8. 專題討論。
description.en: Cloud Computing, either private, public or hybrid, is dramatically transforming every aspect of IT. Now it has become ubiquitous these days, and is the key foundation for developing technologies of Big Data and Internet of Things (IoT). Its deployment starts delivering applications with more benefits than the existing legacy infrastructure.Because the terms are broadly quoted and adopted, then by this course, the Cloud Computing core technologies and the associated below will be well introduced:1.Cloud Computing Basic Concept 2.Resources Virtualization & Software Defined Data Center (SDDC)3.Cloud Computing Security 4.Cloud Technologies5.Cloud Service Planning and Deployment 6.Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)7.Platform as a Service (PaaS)8.Software as a Services (SaaS)9.Cloud Service Operations 10.Case Studies and presentation

name.en: Principles and Practices of  Cloud Computing

description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 機構與機械元件設計基礎，古典動力學基礎，近代機械加工，電機機械，電機驅動與設計，光電及感測基本原理，機電系統匹配，專題實作及實驗等機電相關課題
description.en: Mechanisms and machine elements, classical dynamics, modern machining methods, electric machines and drivers, sensors, special topics and labs of machatrocics system.

description.en: Thesis for master degree's partially requirement.

description.en: (1)Basic Material Porperties-An Overview.(2)Coment Hydration and Microstructure.(3)Concrete Strength Development.(4)Creep and Shrinkage of Plain and Structural Concrete.(5)Durabiltiy.(6)High-Temmperature Effent:Design of Fire Resistance of    Concrete Structural Members.(7)Very Low Temperature Effects:Design of Concrete Vessels    for Cryogenic Liquids.(8)Linear Elastic Fracture Mechanics:tress Approach and    Energy Approach.(9)Special Type of Concrete Materials(High Performance    Concrete).(10)Micromecanics of Fibrous Composites-Elastic Modules and    Stress-Strain Relation Tensile Strength of Fiber    Reinforced Reinforced Composites.

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering
