description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，六 234，台北集中上課，USR 計畫，國際會議廳

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續統計學課程，探討論文寫作所需統計分析理論與方法。課程內容含：一因子與二因子變異數分析、實驗設計、多元迴歸分析、因素分析、集群分析、區別分析與結構方程式等。 1. Introduction to SPSS 2. Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) 3. Experimental Design 4. Nonparametric Test 5. Multiple Regression 6. Factor Analysis 7. Cluster Analysis 8. Discriminant Analysis 9. Structural Equation Model (SEM)
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course including ANOVA, Experimental Design, Nonparametric Test, Multiple Regression, Factor Analysis, Cluster Analysis, Discriminant Analysis and Structural Equation Model (SEM).

description.zh: 培養學生透過實證數據支持的方法來分析與解決設計問題。課程將以循證設計過程，包括如何收集、分析和應用研究數據以進行設計決策。學生將學習多種研究工具和方法及如何將這些方法應用於設計項目中。課程將通過講座、實務工作坊與研究調查使學生實際應用循證設計原則，並持續優化設計解決方案。課程學到的能力包括：1. 循證設計的基本原則：理解循證設計的理論基礎和實踐應用，依據不同的設計主題應用適合的研究方法來輔助制定設計決策。2. 研究方法和工具的運用：掌握使用各種研究工具和技術，包括質性和量化研究方法，以收集和分析數據。3. 洞察設計優化方向：培養批判性思考能力，評估研究數據並能夠基於數據提出合理的設計解決方案。
description.en: This course trains students in analyzing and solving design issues using data-backed methods, focusing on the evidence-based design process. It covers data collection, analysis, and application in design decisions, introducing various research tools and techniques. The curriculum emphasizes practical application through lectures, workshops, and research projects, aiming at continuously improving design solutions. Key skills include understanding evidence-based design principles, mastering research methods and tools for data analysis, and developing critical thinking to optimize design direction based on research findings.

description.zh: 本課程教授商品化實務概念並由學生實際操作，如何以一貫作業完成市場銷售商品。由消費者洞察開始，教導學生如何從消費者行為找到需求，進而思考產品設計動機。設計過程中涵蓋專利，製造與營運思維，最後以實際商品設計呈現。
description.en: The purpose of this course is study the concept of commercialization and how to sale the products to marketing through the consistent process.It’ll ask student to find the consumer's requirements from observation, then think and confirm the design purpose. The design process will include patent, manufacture, operating thinking, and commodity design.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹眼動追蹤技術在感性工學的理論和應用，透過文獻導讀，探索不同情境中視覺行為與人因設計的關聯，並用這些知識來提升人機系統的使用者體驗和效能。此外，學生將學習如何有效規劃實驗設計、數據分析、撰寫研究報告等技能。
description.en: This course introduces the theory and application of eye-tracking technology in Kansei engineering, including a literature review to explore the relationship between visual behavior and human factor design in various contexts. This knowledge will be applied to enhance the user experience and efficiency of human-machine systems. Additionally, students will learn skills such as experimental design planning, data analysis, and research report writing.

name.en: Human Factors and Kansei Engineering II

description.zh: 本課程通過理論介紹虛擬實境（Virtual Reality, VR）的概念與應用範圍，接續將 3D 環境建構的方法導入實踐操作，再透過專題設定進行內容創作，最終完成研究驗證的工作。課程目的是訓練學生在 VR 空間展示與設計研究端的流程，諸如 3D 環境設計、VR 空間與內容建構、VR 內容輸出與展示等能力。最終，學生可基於這些能力應用於各種虛擬空間的展示設計。
description.en: In this course, I will introduce the concept and scope of application of Virtual Reality (VR) via the theory, and then introduce the method of 3D environment construction into practical operation. Furthermore, this course will be showed how to creates content through a thematic setting, and finally completes the work of research and verification. The purpose of the course is to train students in the process of VR space display and design research, such as 3D environment design, VR space and content construction, VR content output, and display capabilities. Finally, students can apply these abilities to the display design of various virtual spaces.

name.zh: 虛擬空間展示與設計研究
name.en: Virtual Space Display and Design Research

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討生活環境設計之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所結合設計、藝術、人文、木工等各領域的學生，整合培育創新設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具各種專長的研究生，協同完成生活環境設計專題的研究，或是透過生活環境設計個案研討、生活環境設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: The objective of this course is to discuss research topics related to living environment design, focusing on literature study, thesis study and discussion and case studies, through intensive discussion, written report and research and practice of design topics, students can exchange opinions efficiently, gain more in-depth and extensive experience, and have the ability to research, analyze and practice. Therefore, another major learning objective of this course is to construct a multi-field interactive learning environment, which can be combined with graduate students with various specialties to collaborate on research on living environment design topics, or through case studies on living environment design. Teaching will focus on classroom lectures, thesis discussions and presentations, and thematic facts, and will be evaluated by reports, group discussions and presentations, and practical works.

name.en: Special Topics on Living Environment Design

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計創造力開發、創意設計手法與設計方法論等主題之碩士論文研究或實務專題設計，提供各種理論工具與個案演練。課程內容包括 (1) 人工智慧、心理學、人類學和語言學等導向之設計創造力研究，以及 (2) 規則式與案例式推理、基模類比與聯想、產品俗民誌、模式語言和體驗劇本等創意設計手法演練。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help the graduate students whose topics of master's theses or graduate projects are related to creativity development, creative design skills and methodology, to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case studies, and its contents contain (1) design creativity research based on artificial intelligence, psychology, anthropology and linguistics, as well as (2) exercises of creative design techniques: rule-based reasoning and case-based reasoning, schematic analogy and association, product ethnography, pattern language and experiential scenario.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods, Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization, Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Techniques, and Optimum Design of Precision Machine Components and Systems.

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術。本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題：1. 近代光電量測系統與技術 2. 量測統計原理 3. 量測信號處理 4. 三次元座標量測系統與技術 5. 雷射干涉系統與技術 6. 影像量測系統與技術 7. 微奈米量測系統與技術 - 干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術 8. 微奈米量測系統與技術 -- 掃瞄探針顯微鏡 (SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9. 奈米粉體量測系統與技術 10. 量測實驗 11. 小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹最佳控制之相關原理與應用，內容包括如下：最佳控制簡介，性能指標，動態規劃法，變分法，變分法在最佳控制之應用，最佳控制之數值解與個案研究等。
description.en: English Description:  This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and applications of optimal control. The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction of optimal control, performance measure, dynamic programming, calculus of variations, variational approach to optimal control problems, numerical solution of optimal control, and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1) 嵌入式系統介紹 (2) 嵌入式系統應用 (3) 嵌入式系統硬體 (4) 嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5) 中斷處理 (6) 記憶體管理 (7) 週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   真空工程，直流電源，射頻電源，微波，熱燈絲等各種能量方式之 CVD 化學氣相沉積法，PVD 物理氣相沉積法，電鍍技術，以及膜的特性觀察與實驗，包括 SEM，EDX，XRD 與金相顯微觀察，附著力測試等。1. 光電半導體 V-I 特性分析試驗 2. 接面型光電元件 C-V 量測實驗 3. 光導電及少數載體存活時間量測實驗 4. 邁克蓀干涉儀實驗 (3) 5. 雷射繞射實驗 (3) 6. 偏振實驗 (3) 7. 分光儀實驗 (3)
description.en: The practices in vacuum engineering, variety deposition methods such as CVD, PVD and electroplating, that include DC, RF, microwave hot filament etc are be performed. Tests of film properties and its characterizations such as SEM, EDX, XRD, and metallurgical microscope are also be examined.1.Experiment on V-I characteristics of photonic devices.2.C-V measurements of optoelectronic devices.3.Measurements of photoconductivity and minority-carrier lifetime of photonic materials.4.Lab on Michelson interferometer5.Lab Experiment on diffraction 6.Lab on polarization7.Lab on spectrometer

notes: 必選，大學時如已修過可申請改修其他專業選修抵學分

description.zh: 1. 機器學習簡介及基本概念 2. 用於分類、迴歸和分群的機器學習演算法 3. 機器學習模型訓練、評估與最佳化技術 4. 機器學習在光電系統的應用
description.en: 1.	Introduction and basic concepts of machine learning2.	Machine learning algorithms for classification, regression and clustering3.	Machine learning model training, evaluation, and optimization technology4.	Application of machine learning in optoelectronic systems

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒 (10-12) 之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類，尤其著重在光纖短脈衝雷產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝寬度與相位量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的各種應用包括光譜量測、泵 - 探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to relative short pulse below one picosecond, ultrafast lasers have been widely used in various fields including military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kinds of the ultrafast lases, especially on the principle of mode-locked fiber generation, pulse compression technique and the method of the ultrashort pulsewidth measurement as well as phase retrieval.  Various applications of ultrafast laser including fluorescence, pump-probe and nonlinear optical measurement have also been introduced in this course.

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。   由電磁學之理論推展光波之運行，並經由近代物理之量子論推導出之原子及分子能階與固態晶體之能帶理論，加以說明電磁波與物質間之作用。介紹共振腔、活化性介質及各種雷射之激發形式等雷射三個基本組成。並針對雷射光之種類、特性及其應用，加以說明。
description.en: Combining the propagation of optical wave been deduced from the electromagnetic theory and the quantum theory introduced by modern physics such as energy level of atom and molecular and the energy band of solid state, the interaction between electromagnetic wave and matter is introduced. The three fundamental components of laser: resonator, active medium, and pumping method are explained. Also the types, characteristics, and applications of various laser are introduced.

notes: 須具備 MATLAB 基礎，英語授課

description.zh: 1. 光纖感測介紹，2. 光纖感測元件，3. 光纖感測系統，4. 光纖感測多工技術，5. 光纖雷射感測系統，6. 長距離光纖感測系統，7. 大範圍多點光纖感測系統，8. 光纖感測網路。
description.en: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.

description.zh: 1. 深度學習介紹，2. 監督式學習，3. 無監督式學習，4. 物聯網，5. 感知層，6. 網路層，7. 應用層，8. 深度學習與物聯網應用實例。
description.en: 1. Introduction to Deep Learning, 2. Supervised Learning, 3. Unsupervised Learning, 4. Internet of Things, 5. Perception Layer, 6. Network Layer, 7. Application Layer, 8. Deep Learning and Internet of Things

name.zh: 深度學習與物聯網應用
name.en: Deep Learning and Internet of Things

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 限 21 人

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技，以及一些「環保」相關科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車等；「節能科技」包括節能住宅、變頻空調等；「環保科技」則包括碳回收主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. The environmental protesting technology includes carbon recapture etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機構的類型合成與數目合成。創造性機構合成。運動、路徑和函數產生器之尺寸合成。最佳化設計。球面機構及空間機構之介紹。
description.en: Type Synthesis and Number Synthesis of Mechanisms. Creative Mechanism Synthesis.  Dimensional Synthesis of Motion, Path, and Function Generators.  Optimal Design. Introduction of Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms.

notes: 機電所。製科所。半導體。機械自動化外生班合開，限 40 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

notes: 日碩，外碩，設計博所合開，排 PBL 教室，限 30 人修

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋半導體產業趨勢發展、超大型 (Giga) 半導體工廠廠務系統與先進自動化工廠運作、以及先進半導體製程技術和設備等三大部分。
description.en: This course mainly consists of development trend, Giga FAB, FAB automation, and processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing.

name.zh: 積體電路製程先進技術與設備
name.en: Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing

notes: 限 40 人 / 上課教室由教務處安排

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

description.zh: 於 2009 年，ASTM 定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: 機電所。製科所。機械自動化外生班合開，全英，限 30 人

description.zh: 原子結構、排列與運動、材料之顯微結構與相結構、材料之機械性質 - 疲勞、破裂、潛變、材料之電性 - 電傳導性與半導體性、材料之光性與介電性、材料之磁性、材料之熱學性質、材料在微電元件之應用、複合材料。9. 複合材料。
description.en: Contents:1.Fundamentals: Atomic scale structure, Crystal structure. 2.Microstructural development: Phase equilibriums and phase diagram. 3.Properties: Mechanical properties, Electrical properties, Dielectric properties, Magnetic properties, Thermal properties. 4.Composite materials.5.Applications on the Electrical-mechanical devices. Objectives: To improve the related knowledge of materials on the electrical-mechanical devices.

notes: 限 50 人，機電所和鐵道合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 超音波技術簡介 2. 基礎彈性力學 3. 彈性動力學 4. 平面波 5. 平面波的反射 6. 平面波的折射 7. 表面波 8. 藍姆波 (平板波) 9. 超音波於非破壞檢測之應用 10. 超音波於材料性質量測之應用 11. 超音波於醫學診斷與治療之應用 12. 超音波於感測器及通訊應用之應用 13. 超音波於加工應用之應用
description.en: 1.Introduction to ultrasonics 2.Basic elasticity for ultrasonics 3.Elastodynamics 4.Plane waves 5.Reflection of plane waves 6.Refraction of plane waves 7.Surface waves 8.Lamb waves 9.Ultrasonics in nondestructive testing  10.Application of ultrasonics to material characterizations 11.Application of ultrasonics in medical diagnostics and treatments 12.Application of ultrasonics to sensors and telecommunications 13.Application of ultrasonics to machining

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 限 25 人製科所。機械自動化外生班合

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS 及 WDS 之 X 光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microscope, the theories of image forming and diffraction, the applications of materials science.  The course contents include structure of the transmission electron microscope, the electromagnetic lens and theory of image formation, theory of electronic diffraction, analysis of diffraction pattern, and the preparation of test sample.  The structure and principle of forming image for a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS are also included in this course.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 限 30 人

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究。有關科技開發案之技術開發管理，人力責任管理及時間任務管理等 PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) 之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象，介面反應等與近代高科技技術，如鍍膜工程，表面處理，腐蝕，磨潤，微機電，感測器，半導體技術等息息相關，且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究，它包括振動，電子或離子頻譜分析，微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含，表面形貌觀察 (SEM, BSEM, AFM), 成份分析 ( 光譜分析，質譜分析，EDX ), 結構分析 ( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析 ( Raman 光譜，FTIR ), 表面粗糙度，膜厚，附著力，內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制、電氣控制、數值控制、幾何數據處理、驅動系統、適應控制系統、監視系統與診斷系統、機器人控制、電腦整合精密機械系統。
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, and Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意（1） 瞬時平面運動學：Hartman 構圖法，反曲點元，切線圓，Euer- Savary 方程式，Bobillier 構圖法，四連桿組耦桿之直線包絡線方程式，                      Higher Curvature（2） 平面連桿機構分析：Freudenstein 方程式，速度及加速度，傳遞角與機械利益，多迴路連桿組分析（3） 其它機構分析：凸輪，齒輪組，非圓形齒輪
description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

notes: 機電所。製科所。鐵道。機械自動化外生班合開

description.zh: 使學員瞭解 Python 程式語言於機器學習應用，以及機器學習的理論背景、評估如何使用適當的演算法於實際例子、內容包括回歸分析於資料預測、資料維度減少方法於資料特徵提取、資料分類方法包括支援向量機與類神經網路方法。課程主要配合 Python 例子增進學員了解機器學習的相關知識與提升在資訊處理時代之競爭力。
description.en: Students should be familiar with the basic concepts of machine learning (ML), probability theory, probability distribution, ML algorithms for classification, regression, and clustering taught in this class.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為依人力職能需求，參考國內外之先行經驗，整合智能化生產所需之知識與技能訓練，以淬鍊出一套務實之智能化生產課程。本課程將涵蓋工業 4.0 - 智能化生產所需相關基礎技術之教學與實作課程，包括物聯網基礎技術與應用實例、雲端服務系統與資訊安全技術、巨量資料管理、分析、及應用實例、智慧化企業與工廠管理系統與應用、自動化與機器人技術及應用等等。
description.en: The goal of this course is to meet the needs of the manpower function, with reference to the previous experiences from domestic and abroad groups. This course will cover the topics related to the basic technology required for intelligent production, including the basic technology and application examples of the Internet of Things, the cloud service system and information security technology, the huge amount of data management, Intelligent enterprise and factory management systems and applications, automation and robot technology and applications, and so on.

description.zh: 偏微分方程式、變分法、張量分析、工程統計及積分方程式等工程分析用工具知識。
description.en: Partial Differential equation, Variation Principle, Tensor Analysis, Engineering Statistics and Integral equation.

notes: 機電。製科。機械自動化外生班合開，限 25 人

description.zh: 奈微米工程於生物醫學之應用日趨重要，量測與操作工具的開發與實際的生醫應用對象的大小尺寸具有密切的相關性，對於生物系統的充份瞭解是工程表現的重要過程之一。在此課程中將配合本校實驗室目前之相關研究設備進行原理講解與應用討論，包括之項目將由分子、細胞到組織之感測、分析與操縱。選修學生須依下列重點：奈微米生醫感測系統、奈米生醫材料、奈米生醫光電以及實驗室晶片等領域選擇期中期末報告之題目與計畫內容，主要要求在尋求創新思考方向，以求在原理或應用上的突破，積極推動跨領域與技術先進之整合性研究。
description.en: Nano/micro engineering in bio-medicine applications has become increasingly important. The development and operation of measurement tool for biomedical applications has a close correlation to the actual size of the object. In this course we will explain the principles of devices and discuss the applications based on the school's research laboratories, including sensing, analysis and manipulation of molecules, cells, and tissues. Students will be required to do a project about Nano-micron biomedical sensor systems, nano-biomaterials and nano-biomedical areas such as optical and lab-chip. The interim and final report should devote to the topic and plans in the search for the direction of Creative Thinking with a view to the breakthrough of theory or application, and actively promote the integration of advanced interdisciplinary research and technology.

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數 I/O 控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

notes: 限 25 人 / 須具備 MATLAB 基礎並自備筆電

description.zh: 本課程由機械工程的角度出發，結合基礎電化學原理，介紹燃料電池的基本原理及種類，由最新市場發展現況導入，介紹燃料電池的發展歷史及最新現況，同時說明提升燃料電池效率及壽命的關鍵影響因素，結合實作方式深入了解燃料電池特性。
description.en: This course is based on the principle of mechanical engineering and electrochemical theory to introduce the basic principles and types of fuel cells. From the latest development in the global market, the course will introduce the fuel cell history and the latest products of fuel cells. The improvement of fuel cell efficiency and lifetime will be explained through   fundamental theory and experiments.

name.en: Principle and application of fuel cell

description.zh: 嵌入式系統目前愈來愈普遍。它將會大大地影響我們的生活方式。可攜式裝置如智慧型手機、掌上型電腦、以及所謂的 IA 裝置如家用網路閘道器、數位視訊錄影機、和常見的遊戲機都是屬於嵌入式系統的範疇。在本課程中，我們將會討論何謂嵌入式系統、嵌入式系統的形式、以及如何建構一個嵌入式系統。由於嵌入式系統包含硬體及軟體的議題，我們也會探討相關的主題。 本課程的先修課程包含計算機組織與結構、C 程式語言、資料結構、系統程式、以及作業系統。課程主要內容如下：嵌入式系統簡介與概論、嵌入式精簡指令集結構、ARM 指令集、嵌入式計算平台、嵌入式程式設計與分析、嵌入式作業系統、系統設計技術、裝置操作、網路。本課程亦包含實習與學期專題作業。
description.en: Embedded systems are more and more popular today. It will affect the human life greatly. Portable devices like smart phone, PDA, and MP3 player, and so-called IA devices such as home gateway, DVR, and game machine are all categorized as embedded systems. In this course, we will discuss what an embedded system is, what it looks like, and how to build an embedded device. Since an embedded system involves hardware and software issues, we will discuss the related subjects. The prerequisite courses for this class include computer organization and architecture, the C programming language, data structure, system programming, and operating system. The major topics of this course are listed as follows: Introduction and Basic Concepts, The RISC Embedded Architectures, The ARM instruction Set, The Embedded Computing Platforms, Program Design and Analysis, The Embedded Operating Systems, System Design Techniques, Device Manipulation, Networks.

notes: 資工四、資工所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 本課程將深入的討論材料之光電及表面性質，並經由實習實驗量測各種相關特性。尤其是在材料電子理論的應用方面。所涵蓋的主題包括有：電子理論、光學特性、繞射理論、表面科學、以及材料之磁性與熱力學性質。
description.en: After successfully completing this subject a student should be able to: (i) explain the fundamental aspects of electrical properties of materials, (ii) describe and understand energy method, (iii) describe and discuss nanoscale properties of materials, (iv) apply advanced properties of materials to engineering design problems, and (v) execute related measurements.

name.zh: 高等材料性質學與實習
name.en: Advanced Properties of Materials and Related Practice

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構，鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係，是一門實務性，基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性，塑性行為，差排理論，單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形，複合材料，高溫聚晶材料之變形，非晶質材料之永久變形，材料強化機構，材料破壞，潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 線性彈性力學 2. 變分法 3. 變分法應用到彈性力學 4. 結構力學 5. 扭力 6. 能量法 7. 彈性穩定 8. 材料選擇.
description.en: 1.Linear Elasticity 2.Variational Method 3.Variational Principles of Elasticity 4. Structural Mechanics 5.Torsion 6.Energy Method 7.Elastic Stability 8.Materials Selection

notes: 限 20 人，製科所和鐵道合開

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 微加工程序含 MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含 MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 先修課程：近代光學。   1. 基本分析工具介紹 (6) 2. 基本光學系統 --- 近軸光學 (6) 3. 光學系統元件介紹 (6) 4. 像差理論 (6) 5. 像質評估 (6) 6. 光學系統設計 (6) 7. 光學套裝軟體使用 (6) 8. 光電設計專題 (9)
description.en: 1.The tools 2.The basic optical systems 3.Basic optical devices 4.Seidel aberrations  5.Image evaluation 6.The design of optical systems 7.The use of Zemax 8.Project on optical design

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

notes: 日碩，外碩，設計博合開，排一般教室，限 30 人修

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1. 介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2. 訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3. 熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 日碩，外碩，設計博合開，預選開放 13 人，排光華 409

description.zh: 本課程探討人工智慧 (AI) 與工程應用相關議題，並討論其解決方案與技術發展趨勢。內容由淺入深，包含基礎 python 程式設計、資料預處理、資料探索、機器學習、深度學習、AI 工程應用介紹 (分子性質預測、設備預測性維護、混凝土強度預測，PM2.5 預測、房價預測等案例應用分析) 及專題製作。在本課程中，學生可了解 AI 之基本原理及 AI 在工程上的應用，本課程也藉由 AI 程式撰寫的實作實習，提昇工程背景學生撰寫與理解 AI 應用程式設計的技能，以幫助學生將人工智慧導入產業應用實務中。
description.en: This course will introduce artificial intelligence (AI) and its applications in engineering fields. Topics covered include basic python programming, data prepossessing, data exploration, machine learning, deep learning, AI applications in engineering fields (e.g. predicting molecular properties, predictive maintenance predicting compressive strength of concrete, prediction of PM2.5, and prediction of house price, etc.) and final project. Students can learn about the basic principles and engineering applications of AI. Coding will be required to improve their programming competence in AI. The course intends to help the students implement AI concepts in their industrial practices.

name.zh: 人工智慧與工程應用實作
name.en: Artificial Intelligence for Engineering Applications in Practice

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 本課程從礦物的化學成分、化學鍵及其晶體結構之理論詳細討論礦物的物理及化學性質。再就各項理化性質在選礦、冶煉、化工製造及其它物理加工等方面之應用分別舉例介紹。
description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of minerals, and relationships of properties with chemical  compositions, chemical bonding mechanisms and crystal  structures.  Application examples are introduced in the  fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical  industry, etc..

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1) 各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線 (2) 氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線 (3) 分子轉印技術 (4) 奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程相關之主要數值分析方法及其於大地工程之應用，如有限差分法及有限元素法。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來分析大地工程問題。
description.en: This course introduces two representative numerical methods, i.e.  finite difference method and finite element method, and their application to geotechnical engineering.  Practical engineering problem are illustrated and simulated by numerical methods in the courses.  It aims to train the students to be familiar with either the theorem of numerical analysis or the application to engineering practices.

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation engineering control        System framework of investigation engineering         control.        Investigation plan and period procedure arrange.        A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 1. 結構物劣化形態，介紹.2. 目視檢測與非破性檢測。3. 現況評估與分析。4. 維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 本課程探討電子材料性質、固態物理基礎、元件物理等相關內容，強化電子材料與半導體元件技術之關聯性，藉由剖析材料結構與元件電性，深入探討電子元件在實際應用時可能遭遇之材料議題。本課程將介紹多種半導體元件技術應用，內容包括 p-n 接面、發光二極體與太陽能電池等。
description.en: This course will introduce the material properties, the basics of solid-state physics, and semiconductor devices and physics to provide knowledge of electronic materials and modern semiconductor devices. To assess the material and device issues of electronics for practical use, analysis of the material structure and electrical performance are essential. The content will include various semiconductor device technologies, such as p-n junction, light emitted diodes (LEDs), and solar cells.

name.zh: 電子材料與元件技術特論
name.en: Special Topics in Electronic Materials and Devices

description.zh: 雷射乃 20 世紀三大發明之一，醫用雷射更已廣泛地應用在各個醫學領域。本課程將涵蓋的範圍包括：1. 雷射基本原理；2. 雷射安全標準；3. 雷射與組織的作用關係；4. 雷射在醫學的各種應用；5. 雷射於牙周病的應用；6. 雷射於口腔外科的應用；7. 雷射應用於牙齒美白；8. 低能量雷射的各種應用；9. 雷射實機操作與臨床示範。
description.en: The laser is one of the three major items invented in 20th century.  Medical laser applications have been widely used in many fields.  This lecture will cover: 1. Laser Physics; 2. Safety Standards; 3. Laser-Tissue-Interaction; 4. Laser in Medical Applications; 5. Laser in Periodontology; 6. Laser in Oral Surgery; 7. Laser Assisted Bleaching; 8. Low Level Laser Therapy; 9. Practical Hands-on and Live Patient Demonstration.

name.zh: 雷射醫學的基礎與臨床應用

notes: 機電。機械自動化外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括主動煞車控制系統介紹，將針對 ABS, TCS, ESP 及 SBC 煞車系統原理介紹，煞車系統及控制器之數學模式及設計等，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior/graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce active braking control system, such as ABS, TCS, ESP and SBC background. The mathematical model of the system and its applications for the controller design of braking system are also included.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

description.zh: 本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本有限差分法、流體力學與熱傳方程式的有限差分法應用、有限體積法、格點產生法。
description.en: This course comprises four parts. Part one is fundamentals of finite-difference methods. Part 2 is the application of finite-difference methods to the equations of fluid mechanics and heat transfer. Part 3 is finite-volume method. Part 4 is grid generation.

description.zh: 線性空間分析，狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性，穩定性分析，狀態回授及估測，控制器設計及應用，觀測器設計及應用，非線性系統，時變系統，控制理論的應用
description.en: Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Control theory

notes: 車輛所和能源車輛外生合開

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期程式交易課程內容 (限定修過上學期的同學才能選修)，我們將使用 R 語言進行更為精實的交易策略建構，包刮 K 棒分析、指標建構、訊號探勘、資金管理… 等。此外，我們下半學期將邀請業師教授 XQ 程式交易軟體，撰寫 XS 程式語法進行回測以及模擬下單
description.en: This course connects with the last semester courses “program trading” (limited to last semester students to join). We will use the R language for more sophisticated trading strategy construction, including K-bar analysis, index construction, trading signal exploration, money management, and so on. In addition, we will invite the instructor to teach XQ program trading software in the last half-semester, usingXS program grammar to back-testing trading strategies.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 這門課著重在探討奈米科技之基本原理與應用範疇，以及環境應用與安全相關主題，內容包含奈米之基本特性、各種量測方法、結構控制、以及 "納米" 對環境應用與安全問題。此外並包含奈米微粒之產生、收集、測量以及微粒動力學等主題。
description.en: This course will investigate the definition and theories of nanotechnology. Including basic properties, measuring methods, structural control, environmental, and safety issues of "Nano-". Topics about generation, collection, measurement and dynamics of nano-particle will also be covered.

name.en: Special Topics on Nano- Technology and Environment

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 許多現成的工程軟體並無法滿足所有客製化的需求，因此會開放作謂的「應用程式介面」（Application Programming Interfaces, API）供使用者進行二次開發，使其能自行拼湊、重組與創造需要的功能。本課程以建築資訊塑模（BIM）或人工智慧（AI）應用為主要示範案例，訓練學生有系統地理解 API 的規格說明文件，並且有效率地開發 API 應用程式，以達到各種工程應用軟體的客製化應用，並提升不同軟體間的交互操作性。
description.en: Many engineering software packages may not fully meet all customized requirements, thus they provide Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) for users to engage in secondary development. This course takes Building Information Modeling (BIM) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) applications as primary demonstration examples, and trains the enrolled students to systematically understand API documentations as well as efficiently develop API applications. It can help the enrolled students to customize their software for solving the engineering problems. In addition, it also enhances the  interoperability between different engineering software packages.

name.zh: 工程軟體 API 應用程式開發
name.en: API Development for Engineering Computer Software

description.zh: 1. 混凝土結構概述與支撐結構混凝土材料特性，2. 支撐結構設計載重與材料強度規定，3. 離岸風機地震載重設計，4. 離岸風機風載重設計，5. 離岸風機波浪載重設計，6. 支撐結構之疲勞設計，7. 支撐結構之鋼結構設計與案例，8. 支撐結構之混凝土結構設計與案例，9. 離岸風機基礎設計
description.en: 1. Concepts of concrete structures and concrete material properties, 2. Loads and material strength required for designing supporting structures, 3. Seismic design of offshore wind turbines, 4. Wind resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 5. Wave resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 6. Fatigue design of supporting structures, 7. Case studies of steel structure design for supporting structures, 8. Case studies of concrete structure design for supporting structures, 9. Footing design of offshore wind turbines

name.en: Introduction to Theory and Applications in Wind Engineering

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1. 坡地災害防治的重要性 2. 坡地災害的全球性原因 3. 台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4. 台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5. 台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6. 坡地災害的人為因素 7. 坡地破壞之前兆 8. 坡地災害防治一般性原則 9. 坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10. 坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11. 坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12 坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

description.zh: 本課程將以 BIM 之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討 BIM 之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解 BIM 建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而實際開發一個 BIM 相關資訊系統，其內容包括：建築資訊模型營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型實務應用，國內外建築資訊模型案例探討，建築資訊模型元件分析與設計，BIM 程式撰寫，BIM 系統之設計與實作等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for engineering and management applications, functions and decision-making. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, and development of BIM-related application in the lifecycle of construction projects. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments and a project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related application suitable to their own research or professional inteests.

name.zh: 建築資訊模型理論與應用
name.en: Building Information Modeling: Theory and Applications

description.zh: 1. 政府採購法簡介 2. 標準作業模式 3. 特別採購模式 4. 建築師及工程顧問之甄選及聘用 5. 公平合約之訂定 6. 異議申訴制度 7. 其他
description.en: the management of financial affairs1.	the introduction of government purchasing law2.	standard working model3.	specific purchasing model4.	the choose and employ of architect and engineering consultant5.	the making of fair restrict6.	the making of reporting objection 7.	others

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時，大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 近年發生之福島核災、印度新德里爆炸案等各種天然及人為災害已顯著影響到人類的生活品質與安全。本課程目標有三：(1) 了解各種災害形成原因及環境背景因素；(2) 評估災害對社會、環境及人類之影響及因應措施；(3) 新穎技術可擴大環境監測尺度並預警災害。較為代表性之災害會於課堂中案例講述，加深同學學習印象。工程背景較為薄弱之學生，亦適合選修此課程。學習成效：學生可獲得：(1)	災害管理內涵與重要觀念。(2)	評估災害風險與危機管理。(3)	研擬災前的災後復原重建計畫。
description.en: The recurrent occurrences of various natural and manmade disasters like the December 2004 Tsunami, the bomb blasts in the cinema halls of Delhi and many such incidences have diverted our focus towards safety of one’s own life. The goals of this course are three-fold: (1) To educate students about the underlying natural process that give rise to hazards. (2) To emphasize how society evaluates and confronts the dangers posed by these natural processes from a political, social, and ethical perspective. (3) Expose students to the technological innovations that are allowing an increasing large human population to monitor, predict, and warn society about natural hazards and impending disasters. Case studies of recent and past natural disasters will be discussed. This course is designed for students without an extensive background in science or math and can be used to partly satisfy minor programs in Environmental Geosciences.Learning Outcomes: Upon completion of this course, students will

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 本課程將探討明渠中穩定流、非穩定流、均勻流、非均勻流之流體特性。
description.en: Open channel hydraulics treats the motion of water in conduits that have a free surface, that is, in which the flow of water is not completely bounded by the channel perimeter and one surface is exposed to atmospheric pressure.  The flows can be steady (time-invariant) or unsteady, uniform (space-invariant) or non-uniform (gradually, rapidly, or spatially varied).  For engineers, open channels are very common for the conveyance of natural waters, storm discharges, sewage collection systems, and aqueducts for water distribution systems. Knowledge of the mechanics of open-channel flow, then, is important for the proper design of these facilities.

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2. 電力電子元件特性 3. 元件與電路佈局 4. 元件特性與雜訊 5. 元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: 1. 二極體電路分析與設計 2. 電晶體電路分析與設計 3. FET 電路分析與設計 4. 放大器頻率響應分析及頻率補償 5. 功率放大器分析與設計 6. 回授放大器分析與設計 7. 差動及運算放大器分析與設計 8. 震盪器分析與設計 9. 主動濾波器分析與設計
description.en: 1. Diode circuit Analysis and Design2. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design3. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design4. FET circuit Analysis and Design5. Amplifier Frequency response Analysis and Componstaion6. Power Amplifier Analysis and Design7. Feedback Amplifier Analysis and Design8. Differential and Operational Amplifier Analysis and Design9. Oscillator Analysis and Design10. Active Filter Analysis and Design

notes: 電機所、半導體和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

notes: 電機所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 類神經網路（ANN）應用 2-1 ANN 基礎 2-2 類神經網路 3. 模糊邏輯基礎 3-1 模糊邏輯基礎 3-2 模糊控制應用 4. 基因演算法 4-1 概述 4-2 基因演算法在控制器調制之應用
description.en: 1 Introduction2 Application of artificial neural networks (ANN)2-1 ANN fundamentals2-2 Neur-control3 Fuzzy logic control3-1 Fuzzy logic basics3-2 Application of Fuzzy Control4 Genetic algorithms4-1 Preliminarg    4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms

description.zh: 1. 永磁電機理論 2. 控制法則分析與模擬 3. 動態特性分析 4. 近代應用介紹
description.en: 1.Basic theory of operation 2. Control strategies analysis and simulation 3. Dynamic performance analysis 4. Introduction to recent applications of the PMSM.

name.zh: 永磁同步電動機之理論與控制
name.en: Theory and Control of Permanent-Magnet Synchronous Motor

description.zh: 電容切換式電路、振盪器、濾波器、鎖相迴路、非線性與匹配效應、短通道效應與元件模型、類比電路佈局與包裝
description.en: Switched-capacitor circuits, Oscillators, Continuous-time filters, Phase-locked loop, Nonlinearity and mismatch, Short-channel effects and device models, Layout and packaging for analog IC.

name.zh: 高等類比積體電路設計

notes: 電機所和半導體班合開

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 線性區段碼 3. 循環碼 4. 迴旋碼 5. 編碼調變
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Linear Block Codes3.Cyclic Codes4.Convolutional Codes5.Coded Modulation

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督 / 非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論，Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習，K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function 多分類器，Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類，分類正確率評估 (Accuracy Assessments) 及其他重要的應用，例如：文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

notes: 電機所、電資外生班和 AI 學位學程合開

description.zh: 此課程主要是含蓋無線通訊基頻訊號處理的理論基礎與系統架構，探討無線通道所能提供的通道容量以及可靠通訊。而大部分的課程內容會以目前熱門的多輸入多輸出 (MIMO) 傳輸為背景而進行探討。課程綱要如下：1. 無線通道模型 2. 多樣性 3. 通道容量 4.MIMO I: 空間多工 5.MIMO II: 通道容量與多工架構 6.MIMO III: 多樣性與多工間取捨 7.MIMO IV: 多使用者通訊
description.en: This course provides thefundamental theories and architectures for baseband wireless communications. It is concerned that how reliable communication can be achieved and what is the capacity a channel can provide. Much attention will be focused on the newly developed technology, referred to as multiple-inputmultiple-output (MIMO) transmission.Course outline:1.The Wireless Channel 2.Diversity3.Capacity of Wireless Channels4.MIMO I: Spatial Multiplexing 5.MIMO II: Capacity and Multiplexing Architectures6.MIMO III: Diversity-Multiplexing Tradeoff7.MIMO IV: Multiuser Communication

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. Bayesian， Minimax 原裡分析和測試 3. 古典的假說測試和混合式假說測試 4. 離散時間信號的偵測 5. 連續時間信號的偵測 6. 循序性的假說測試 7. 參數估測
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Bayesian, Minimax analysis and testing 3. Classical hypothesis testing and composite hypothesis testing 4. Signal detection in discrete time 5. Signal detection in continuous time 6. Sequential hypothesis testing 7. Parameter estimation

notes: 電機所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 隨著電力網路的日趨複雜，以及智慧型電網的發展，傳統的電力保護系統漸漸無法滿足未來電力系統的需求。本課程主要目標旨在教導學生學習電腦電驛系統，並了解電力數位訊號處理之基礎，主要內容包括：1. 電腦電驛系統簡介 2. 電腦電驛的數位訊號處理 3. 離散傅葉轉換技術 4. 離散小波轉換技術 5. 遞迴式最小平方差與卡門濾波器技術 6. 微分方程技術 7. 輸電線保護電驛 8. 相量計算技術 9. 多端點輸電線保護 10. 風力發電場保護 11. 適應性電驛理論 12. 電驛與控制
description.en: 1.Introduction to computer relaying system2.Digital Signal Processing for Computer Relaying3.Numerical Analysis for Computer Relaying4.Discrete Fourier Transform techniques5.Discrete Wavelet Transform based technique.6.Recursive Least squares (RLS) and Kalman filter based techniques7.Differential equation based technique8.Transmission lines relaying9.Phasor calculation techniques10.Wind farms protection11.Principles of adaptive relay12.Relaying and Control

notes: 綜科 514, 限職電機所學生修讀。

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程以論文研討方式學習 "機器學習" 理論之基本概念與應用及各種演算法。課程內容包含概念式學習、決策樹、圖型理論、神經網路、貝氏網路、案例式學習及支持向量機等方法。經由這門課，學生能對現代機器學習技術及其應用有基本的了解。
description.en: This is a graduate seminar-based course that provides an overview of many algorithms in machine learning and its applications. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at current research topics in machine learning covering Concept Learning, Decision Tree, Graphical Model, Neural Network, Bayesian Network, Instance-based Learning, and Support Vector Machine. Through the course, students can have the basic ideas and intuition behind modern machine learning methods.

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究 ，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis.

description.zh: 電控技術在現代工業應用中扮演著不可或缺的角色。因此，本課程的目的在使學生了解電控技術，其內容包括 Matlab/Simulink 軟體平台介紹、電控系統建模、分析與設計。
description.en: Electrical control technology plays an important role in modern industrial applications. Therefore, the purpose of this course is to introduce the technology to the students. The content includes Matlab/Simulink software platform, and electrical control system modeling, analysis and design.

name.zh: 計算機在電控技術之應用
name.en: Computer Methods for Electrical Control Technology

description.zh: 循環經濟是一種與傳統線性經濟（開採 - 製造 - 丟棄）不同的產業經濟模式，循環經濟就像自然生態循環一樣，是封閉且循環的經濟系統，透過重新設計產品和商業模式，促進更好的能源與資源使用效率、消除廢棄物及避免污染自然環境。內容將包括發展及應用物質流分析及循環經濟的相關技術，全球性的循環經濟議題及案例分析，不同領域的企業生態，及跨學科創造永續的解決辦法。
description.en: A circular economy is a regenerative system in which resource input and waste, emission, and energy leakage are minimised by slowing, closing, and narrowing material and energy loops. This can be achieved through long-lasting design, maintenance, repair, reuse, remanufacturing, refurbishing, and recycling. This is contrast to a linear economy which is a 'take, make, dispose' model of production. This course, further, contributes to the optimising systems rather than components, or the notion of ‘design for fit’. As a generic notion it draws from a number of more specific approaches including cradle to cradle, biomimicry, industrial ecology, and the 'blue economy. Additional benefit to students is learning of English language as medium of instruction is in English.

name.en: Circular Economy: theoretical approach and practical applications

notes: 本課程為國際講座教授 Prof. Peter Heck 授課，上課時間

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: (1) 基本理論 (2) 光學薄膜設計之圖示法 (3) 分光鏡 (4) 高反射鏡 (5)	截止濾光片 (6) 帶通濾光片 (7) 斜向入射薄膜
description.en: (1)Basic theory (2)Admittance diagrams for optical coating design(3)Beam splitter(4)High reflection coating(5)Edge filter(6)Band-pass filter(7)Tilted coatings

name.en: Design and application of optical coating

description.zh: 永續規劃設計是格外需要跨學術領域訓練的過程，因此本課程將提供下列設計專業者必須學習的訓練：1.	成長與浪費的觀念 2.	生態解法的設計 3.	永續文化與景觀的設計 4.	以設計體現與強化價值的規劃 5.	複合化社會系統的設計 6.	社區營造與健康的設計 7.	省能、輕量、減廢的設計 8.	生產力、土地與交通效能 9.	營建與環境法規 10.	規劃、設計與方案評估
description.en: Sustainable planning and design is an exceptionally transdisciplinary process. Therefore, This course will provide the following trainings which design professionals must learned:1.	The concepts of growth and waste2.	Designing for eco-solutions3.	Permaculture and landscape design4.	Values embodied in and reinforces by design5.	Design within complex social systems6.	Design for community building and health7.	Design with less energy, materials and waste8.	Productivity, land and transport efficiency9.	Construction and environmental regulation10.	Planning, design and project assessment

name.zh: 永續規劃設計理論研究
name.en: Theoretical Research on Sustainable Planning and Design

notes: 設計博核心選修，建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 英語語用學的研究關乎了解英語在各種情境下的使用。本課程首先回顧一些最常用於理解「言外之音」的重要觀念，例如「暗示」、「預設」、及「言談行為」。下個階段則是介紹一些重要語用學的議題，例如「禮貌理論」、「修辭語」、「言語幽默」、和「機構性談話」，並概述用於研究這些語用學議題的一些方法，包含「會話分析」、「言談分析」、甚或「批判性言談分析」。本課程旨在透過充足的英文例子來提升學生的語用學意識，從而鼓勵他們發揮語用學的知識來應對各種 (英文) 語言的實務操作。
description.en: The study of English pragmatics is about understanding the use of English in different types of context. The course begins by revisiting the ideas most commonly embraced to understand meaning beyond the linguistic code (e.g. implicature, presupposition, speech act). The next step is an overview of the key issues in pragmatics (e.g. politeness theory, figure of speech, verbal humor, institutional talk) as well as the various approaches to these issues (e.g. conversation analysis, discourse analysis, and critical discourse analysis). This course aims to raise students’ pragmatic awareness with ample English examples, and encourage them to apply pragmatic knowledge in various aspects of (English) language practices.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉專業筆譯的重要概念與原則。學生將習得翻譯學領域中各種跨學科的理論觀點（例如語言學與功能主義取向、言談與語域分析、翻譯規範、文化轉向、翻譯社會學以及翻譯科技等），並將理論知識運用於中英／英中翻譯實務上。學生將深入探討各種翻譯論點，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of professional translation. Students will acquire a solid grounding in a range of ideas within translation studies (e.g. linguistic and functionalist approaches, discourse and register analysis, translation norms, cultural turn, sociology of translation, and translation technologies) and apply the theoretical knowledge to various English and Chinese translation activities. This course will also enable students to critically discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 西方文化的交流是建立在故事上的。即使這些故事相當久遠，但每個人卻都非常熟悉，又或者是因為這些故事相當久遠，所以每個人都非常熟悉。本課程將探討近代主要西方作家 — 喬瑟及莎士比亞 — 作品中的核心主題及文化的意象。研讀這些近代西方主要作家的作品是發展西方文學素養及思想的基石，同時，也為任何概括了以西方文化為主體的研究提供了不可或缺的背景知識。
description.en: Conversation in Western culture is built on stories. Everybody knows the stories even though the stories are very old, or rather everybody knows them because they are very old stories. This course introduces students to some of the stories that have been most influential in the English-speaking world. Knowing these stories provides essential background knowledge for understanding Western culture in general.

description.zh: 應用語言學屬於邊緣交叉學科，與其他學科如語言學、心理學、教育學、人類學與社會學之間存在密切的關係。本課程著重在介紹第二語言與外語習得、第二語言與外語教學法、言談分析與社會語用學及社會文化學理論的研究，並探討這些領域與語言教學與學習之間的關連。本課程涵蓋各種不同觀點的理論與應用，回顧方法論的演進歷史，尤其強調現今廣受認同的方法論。
description.en: Applied linguistics is a large interdisciplinary field of study related to a range of academic fields, including linguistics, psychology, education, anthropology, and sociology. This course focuses primarily on research in the areas of second/foreign language acquisition, second/foreign language pedagogy, discourse analysis, and sociopragmatic and sociocultural theory, as well as their relevance to language teaching and learning. We will cover theories and applications from a variety of perspectives, tracing the history of methodologies with special emphasis on those currently in widespread use.

description.zh: 醫學基礎、藥物學概論、預防醫學概論、醫療倫理與醫療效益概論、永續照護概論 、感染與傳染病防治概論、精神照護概論、一般醫學概論、急重症醫學概論、醫療與生活科技技術概論
description.en: 1. General principle  2. Pharmacology 3. Prophylaxis  4. Ethics and medical effects   5. Perpetual care  6. Infections management and prevention  7. Spiritual Care  8. General medicine 9. emergency medical care 10. LOHAS (Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability) technology

description.zh: 這門課程主要是介紹資料庫系統的理論與應用，內容包含有： 1. 資料庫系統的介紹與架構 2. ER 資料模式 3. 檔案儲存結構 4. 關連式資料模式 5. SQL 查詢語言 6. ER 資料模式與關連式資料模式之間的轉換 7. 資料庫正規化 8. 最佳化查詢 9. 交易處理
description.en: This course provides introduction to both database system theory and application. These are the following : o 1. Database System Concepts and Architecture -2. Data Modeling Using the Entity-Relationship Model --3. Record Storage and Primary File Organizations -4. -The Relational Data Model -5. SQL -6. ER- and ERR-to Relational Mapping -7. Functional Dependencies and Normalization for Relational Databases -8. Query Processing and Optimization -9. Transaction Processing Concepts

notes: 電機所和 AI、資安學位學程合開

description.zh: 中文課程概述：本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization

description.zh: 1. 智慧電網概述 2. 智慧電錶 3. 智慧電網應用 4. 再生能源整合 5. 智慧電網標準 6. 智慧電網監控、通訊、及保護系統 7. 智慧電網元件 8. 智慧電網電力系統分析 9. 案例研究
description.en: 1. Introduction to smart grid.2. Advanced metering infrastructure (AMI)3. Application of smart grid4. Integration of renewable energy resources in smart grid 5. Smart grid standards6. Smart grid control, communication and protection7. Electrical components in smart grid8. Power system analysis in smart grid9. Case study

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2. 探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3. 進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4. 學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

description.zh: 1.MOS 元件工作模式及 MOSFET 原理 2. 微小 MOSFET 的額外考慮 3. 矽晶圓的生長 4. 擴 散 5. 離子植入 6. 氧化處理 7.CVD 技術 8. 微影術 9. 蒸鍍與濺鍍 10. 光罩製作 11.CMOS IC 製程
description.en: 1. Operating modes and theory of MOS devices. 2. Small-geometry effects. 3. Wafer growth. 4. Diffusion. 5. Ion implantation. 6. Oxidation. 7. CVD techniques. 8. Lithography. 9. Sputtering and evaporation. 10. Photo masking. 11. CMOS IC fabrication processing.

description.zh: 1. 微波傳輸線 2. 微波元件 3. 微波材料 4. 微波量測 5. 微波傳輸轉換 6. 微波耦合 7. 微波濾波器 8. 微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能 “簡單” 理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用 Python 深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：? 車牌與門牌數字辨識？人臉辨識？1000 種影像分類？辨識 9000 種物件？自動駕駛模擬？嵌入式深度學習演算法？空虛，寂寞，覺得冷？讓深度學習來幫助你:? 遞迴式神經網路 (RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人？對抗生成網路 (GAN)：用 GAN 產生自己的夢中情人？深度強化學習 (DRL)：訓練 AI 跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning

name.zh: 深度學習應用開發實務

notes: 電子所、電資外生班和 AI 學位學程合開

description.zh: 1. 嵌入式計算系統簡介 2. 即時系統核心之介紹與設計 3. 中央處理器 4. 嵌入式平台簡介 5. 硬體加速器 6. 驅動器的設計 7. 網路與分散式嵌入式系統 8. 嵌入式網路基礎架構系統設計與實作。
description.en: 1.An Introduction to Embedded Computing System 2.Introduction and Implementation to the Kernel of Real-time System 3.CPUs 4.Introducion to the Embedded Computing Platform 5.Hardware Acce;eratprs 6.Design of the Drivers 9.Networks and Distributed Embedded Systems 10.Embeddeed Web-based Design and Implementation.

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5. 分散式同作控制 6. 電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1.Process synchronization2.Concurrency Mechanisms3.Virtual memory4.Distributed Systems5.Distributed Concurrency Control6.Queuing Models

description.zh: 深度學習探討如何能利用深層類神經網路，由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能有效進行預測，分類，偵測，辨認與決策，以建立人工智慧。本課程為進階的機器學習課程，將會花相當多的時間深入探討各種不同的訓練方法不同結構的類神經網路。包括深層類神經網路，卷積類神經網路，遞迴類神經網路等等網路架構，與監督式學習，非監督式學習，強化式學習，對抗式學習等等訓練方法。本課程並會要求學生實現各種不同類型的類神經網路，將其著應用在解決多種人本人工智慧服務設計問題。包時間序列預測，物體偵測與辨認，語音訊號處理、影像訊號處理、自然語言處理，音訊訊號處理等多種人本資訊處理。
description.en: Deep learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that focuses on how to use deep neural networks to self-learn and self-evolve from observed data, as well as to effectively predict, classify, detect patterns and make decisions.This course is an advanced machine learning course that delves into different neural network structures and training methods. Students will be asked to implement different neural networks to solve various human-centered artificial intelligent service design problems (e.g., time series prediction, object detection, image recognition, speech signal processing, video signal processing, natural language processing, audio signal processing, etc.).

name.zh: 深度學習與類神經網路

description.zh: 可穿戴式應用已成了全球科技產業的新寵兒之一。因此，漸漸地，穿戴式裝置已成為人們生活用品的一部分。本課程討論可穿戴式系統導論、無線感測網路導論、生醫資訊模組設計、可穿戴式教學平台之設計、情境感知遠距監控與定位救援手仗之設計、非視覺型之不穩步態偵測分析設計、自行車玩家生醫資訊守護神設計、遠距醫療照護系統設計、與客製化谷歌智慧型眼鏡設計。本課程主要達成跨領域的高度整合應用訓練課程。
description.en: Wearable applications have been become one new darling of the global technology industries. Hence, gradually, the wearable devices have become part of people's daily necessities. This course will discuss the topics of “Introduction of wearable system, Introduction of wireless sensor network, Design of Bio-information module, Design of wearable teaching platform, Design of Context-Aware Tele-monitor and Position-rescue Staff, Detection Analysis and Design for Unstable Gait with Non-vision Base, Bicycler-Player Bio-information Guardian, Design of Tele-Medicine care system, and Design of customized Google Smart-glass”. This course is highly integrated applications to achieve interdisciplinary training.

description.zh: 本課程為線性代數的深化與廣化。以理論的深化而言，本課程由高斯消去法談起，解釋四個向量空間，進而說明矩陣的正交性與投影。接著，本課程闡述行列式、特徵值與特徵向量、矩陣的乘冪與指數、頻譜分解，最終收尾於奇異值分解，以此定理統整這一學期的所有內容。以應用的廣化而言，本課程在上述理論說明之外，還會特別介紹科學、工程的應用實例，例如迴歸分析、線性規劃、圖論與網路、主成份分析。
description.en: 1. Introduction - Importance of Linear Algebra2. Ax=b, Matrix, Gaussian Elimination and Application3. Vector Spaces and Linear Equation4. Applications: Graphs and Networks5. Orthogonality and Least Squares6. Applications: Multiple Regression7. Application: Linear Programming 8. Determinant and its Applications9. Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors10. Ak and Difference Equations11. eA and Differential Equations12. Similarity Transformation and Spectral Theorem13. Positive Definite Matrices and Minimum Principles14. Applications: Multivariate Analysis and Principal Component Analysis15. Singular Value Decomposition and its Applications

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 建築四與日職建都所合開

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 建築四與日職建都所合開

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習通訊與訊號處理工程領域之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technology in the area of Communications and Signal Processing Engineering. Renowned researchers and scholars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

name.zh: 研究討論 - 通訊與訊號處理工程
name.en: Graduate seminar – Communications and Signal Processing Engineering

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習計算機科學領域之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technology in Computer Science. Renowned researchers and scholars are invited to share their research results and experiences through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

name.zh: 研究討論 - 計算機科學

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡：包括物質本性，化學熱力學，化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化：包括化學反應速率與動力學，分子反應動力學，表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹 (2) 完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N 比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b) 直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c) 變異分析。(3) 應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 1 設計的基本概念 2 架構、資料型別與運算子 3 組合與循序邏輯 4 函式 / 程序與屬性 / 組態 5 階層式設計 6 功能與時序模擬 7 設計合成 8 狀態機設計 9 管線式處理 10. 記憶體設計 11. 特殊應用積體電路設計與實作
description.en: This course both provides the digital logical concepts and trains the student how to use the computer-aided design tools to simulate and to implement the advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

name.zh: 高等 FPGA 系統設計

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
