description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 隨著電腦速度的提升，應用電腦模擬來做各種預測或與實驗結果比較，已經成為各領域發展的一種趨勢。因此，在化學上，計算化學也成為當代化學發展的一個領域。本課程以講述當代計算化學領域中的基本物理化學觀念，包含化學鍵結、分子力學、量子化學與分子動力學等。課程進行以使用費的計算軟體來進行實作為主。內容涵蓋：分子、高分子與固態結構的設計建構以及結構最佳化，能階計算，與光譜模擬比較。
description.en: Computer simulation for prediction or comparison with experimental results becomes very popular in many fields due to the progress of computer performance. Thus, computational chemistry also become one of important fields in modern science. This course is designed to include some basic concepts in computational chemistry and mainly focuses on practical. The basic concepts of physical chemistry will be illustrated such as chemical bonding, molecular mechanics, quantum chemistry and molecular dynamics. In practical, the molecular design from small molecules to polymers and even solid state will be included first. Then, the energy levels calculations, simulations of spectroscopy will be done in some free quantum chemistry packages.

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: The material in this course covers implantable, nonimplantable, and extracorporeal materials. Implantables include sutures, vascular grafts, artificial heart, artificial bones and ligaments, drug delivery device, artificial tissues, artificial liver,etc. Nonimplantable materials are : cloths in medical uses,  surgical dressings and gauze, injection device, diagonsis materials, etc. Extracorporeal materials are : dialysis fibers, artificial lung, catheters, etc.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 染顏料 (色料) 雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research.This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩大部分，其一為理論和議題的探究，自文化資產概念出發，探究文資保存範疇下的各項議題，包含有形無形文化保存的真實性、文化價值的差異與認定、詮釋與再現、資源管理和應用；其二為講授文化資產資源應用所需的研究方法和工具－田野調查；同時透過國內外文化資產的案例作分析與討論，深度檢視文化資產的多元面貌。
description.en: This course aims to understand the concept of heritage from the context of Taiwan and UNESCO. Different issues related to heritage preservation are discussed in this course, include the value and authenticity of tangible and intangible heritage, the representation and interpretation of culture and history, and reuse and management of cultural spaces. Moreover, fieldwork, the research methods of doing heritage preservation and resource management is also taught in this course. Finally, international case studies of heritage reuse and management are examined, to understand different ways of heritage practice.

name.zh: 文化資產保存理論與資源應用

description.zh: 隨著各類型博物館廣泛使用動態影像，本課程聚焦在動態影像的歷史、理論與實踐。探究博物館內的動態影像如何以當代藝術實踐手法，重塑空間敘事，挑戰展示傳統。課程主題包含：美術館的當代影像實踐、以物為中心的博物館的展示策略、動態影像技術、策展策略和數位媒體的影響。課程預計分析藝術作品、探索展覽空間，並探討科技技術、觀眾參與和藝術表達之間，彼此交互不斷演變的關係。
description.en: With various types of museums widely incorporating moving images, this course focuses on the history, theory, and experiential aspects of such imagery. It delves into how moving images within museums, employing contemporary artistic practices, reshapes spatial narratives and challenges traditional displays. Topics include contemporary image practices in fine art museums, object-centred museum display strategies, technology, curatorial strategies, and the impact of digital media. The course entails analyzing artworks, exploring exhibition spaces, and discussing the evolving relationship between technological advancements, audience engagements, and artistic expression to cultivate critical skills in curation and interpretation.

name.en: Exhibitions and the Intervention of Moving Images

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X 光電子光譜儀 (XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀 (LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀 (STM)、表面振動光譜儀 (surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法 (TPD) 及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號 CMOS 積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1. 混合訊號設計概述 2. 連續時間濾波器 3. 交換電容濾波器 4. 交換電流濾波器 5. 數位類比轉換器 6. 類比數位轉換器 7. 超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8. 管線式類比數位轉換器 9. 混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

name.zh: 混合訊號積體電路設計

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介 2. 隨機程序 3. 數位調變與多工技術 4. 最佳接收器 5. 載波與符碼同步 6. 消息理論 7. 訊源編碼 8. 通道編碼 9. 展頻通訊系統 10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 在本課程中，藉由資料蒐集、活動設計、課堂討論與經驗分享等過程，使學生對學習生產力及其特性有所省思與瞭解，掌握正確有效的學習方法，學習如何主動組合、整理、解釋知識，進而培養推廣該專業領域新知的能力。
description.en: By collecting the information, activity planned, discussion in the lessons and sharing the experiences etc. in order to make the students understand this course and it's characteristic, moreover, exactly know well the effective mothod of learning, studying how to make up automatically, arrangement, explain the knowledge, in the meantime, to train and spread their professional ability in the new territory

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis.

description.zh: 使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、理解及辨識的能力、及視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、並有學習、認知、分析理解等能力。
description.en: Made computer the power of problem solving, intelligent behavior and storage type, comprehension and distinguish abilities. The abilities of vision, hearing, touching, learning, identifying, analyzing are also the target of the course.

description.zh: 本課程針對幼稚園、國小、與國中階段的英語師資而設計，在教材與教法的搭配上提供學理的引介與實務上的訓練。本課程設計考量這些階段學生之身心發展程度與興趣，將屬於兒童與青少年文學範疇的文本（例如：希臘神話、哈利波特系列、波西傑克森系列等等）作創意運用，幫助老師們擷取並改編合宜的教材，經由活潑的教學活動（包括：改編戲劇演出、繪本製作、歌唱舞蹈等等），提高學生的英語能力，也在培養他們體察文化差異的深層素養。
description.en: Designed for kindergarten, elementary school, and junior high school English teacher, this course aims to provide practical training and theories in teaching materials and pedagogy. Students of this course will also learn to adapt children and teenager literary works such as Greek mythology, the Harry Potter series, and the Posey Jackson series into materials suitable for students at the above-specified age groups. Possible learning activities such as role-play, picture books, dancing/singing will also be explored as methods to both develop students' English proficiency and cultural awareness.

name.zh: 兒童文學融入英語教學
name.en: Children's Literature and English Language Teaching

description.zh: 本課程主要包括下列主題：1. 全球企業發展的外在環境、2. 全球技術突破與創新產業、3. 各國研發創新及品牌智財策略、4.IP 產業建置、5. 全球品牌智財市場、6. 全球企業及其智財管理的規劃與移轉、7. 創新研發的保護方式、8. 協同合作與獨立作業的比較、9. 兼顧節稅的智慧財產權開發模式、10. 跨國視野下的法律議題、11. 企業智財部門規劃、12. 併購與智財授權管理、13. 品牌智財的財務價值、14. 著名全球企業智財管理模式。
description.en: This course will focus on the following topics: 1.external environments for corporate developments, 2.new technologies and innovative enterprises, 3. R&D and branding polices of major countries, 4. the establishment of IP industries, 5. global branding markets, 6. the plan and transfer of global enterprises & IP location, 7. the protection of R&D, 8.the choice between joint and individual R&D, 9. tax plan for IP development, 10.IP plan for international industries, 11, the establishment of IP department, 12.M&A and IP, 13.the evaluation of brands & IP, 14.the IP management of well-known global enterprises,

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

description.zh: 公平交易法是經濟憲法，也是維持市場交易秩序的根本大法。當現代企業與市場的結構愈趨複雜，公平交易法的角色也愈顯重要。本課程將以案例分析，帶領學生了解公平交易法的基本原則。最後，本課程將規劃呈現科技發展下的新興壟斷議題，帶領學生一起探討。
description.en: The Fair Trade Act is often considered as the economic constitution also a set of fundamental rules to maintain the order of market. This Act is getting more and more important in the modern economy while the market is getting more and more chaotic and complicated. This course is designed for students who intend to understand the principles of the Fair Trade Act by case studies, and who is interested to learn about emerging technology monopoly issues.

name.zh: 科技壟斷與公平交易法
name.en: Technology monopoly and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程所定義的文化產業包括音樂產業、電視產業、電影產業、劇場產業和其他表演藝術有關的產業。這些產業區塊都存在相關的智慧財產權議題，例如所有權、權利轉讓、合理使用、侵權行為、契約爭議等等。本課程將透過法院判決的選讀與產業案例研究來讓學生認識文化產業的智慧財產權議題。學生將被要求參與討論。評分方式包括課堂參與和報告。
description.en: The scope of the cultural industry covered by this course includes the music industry, film industry, television industry, theatre industry, and other industries related to performing arts. Intellectual property issues do exist in these industrial sectors. The issues include ownership, title transfer, fair use, infringement, contract dispute, and so on. This course is intended to expose students to various IP issues in the cultural industry through studying court decisions and discussing industrial case studies. Students are required to participate in discussion. The grading policy is based on class participation and essay paper.

name.zh: 文化產業與智慧財產權
name.en: Cultural Industry and Intellectual Property Rights

description.zh: 本課程將探討 (1) 智財商業模式與智財交易 (2) 英美契約法 (3) 智財授權契約規範 (4) 授權程序與稽核 (5) 技術合作契約 (6) 智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題 (二)
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence(II)

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略：案例研析二
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study(II)

description.zh: 為保障商標權及消費者利益，維護市場公平競爭，促進工商企業正常發展，國家特制定商標法，本課程以介紹我國商標法為重點，主要內容包括商標規範之基本原理、商標之構成要素、商標之分類方式及各類型商標之特性與功能、申請商標註冊之程序、商標註冊之審查及核准、商標權之取得及行使、異議程序及紛爭處理、權利侵害之救濟等。
description.en: Trademark Act is formulated to safeguard trademark rights and the consumers' interest, maintain fair competition of markets, and facilitate normal development of industries and commerce. This course is focusing on the introduction of Trademark Act. Topics will mainly include the basic principle of trademark standard, the integrant part of trademark, the characteristic and the function of trademark, the application procedures, examination and approval, acquisition of the trademark rights and exercises, the procedure of opposition and the dispute processes, remedies for right infringement and so on.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

description.zh: 本課程將探討 (1) 智財商業模式與智財交易 (2) 英美契約法 (3) 智財授權契約規範 (4) 授權程序與稽核 (5) 技術合作契約 (6) 智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

notes: 先鋒 1401 教室，日職合開

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下： 1. 專利權利項解讀 2. 專利侵權分析流程 3. 專利迴避設計要件 4. 專利策略分析 5. 專利佈局實務 6. 案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

name.zh: 專利佈局與專利策略專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Portfolio and Patent Strategy

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

description.zh: 本課程主要敘述數位語音訊號的處理技術及語音相關應用。討論的課題主要包括語音分析的基本聲學原理如發音模型與語音特徵分析，以及語音編碼、語音合成、語音辨認等重要應用。
description.en: This course is intended to introduce the fundamentals of speech signal processing and related applications. The topics it will address include speech production model, extraction and evaluation of speech features, basic principles of speech analysis and synthesis, speech coding, and speech recognition, etc.

description.zh: 講授並整合高齡者產品設計之基本理論、設計方法。分析並研討高齡者因身心機能退化所面臨的處境，包括居家、行動及使用產品時可能面對的困難。訓練學生以工業設計的理論、方法與分析，深入瞭解高齡族群對設計之需求，進而達成產品創新之決策。
description.en: Lecture on theory and design practice of senile product design. To study age-related changes in health and physical functioning which affect older people's access to facilities and use of products that they need in every day life. Practice of exploring older adults' experience and needs in using products and their attitude toward product design improvement.

description.zh: 講授並整合高齡者產品設計之基本理論、設計方法。分析並研討高齡者因身心機能退化所面臨的處境，包括居家、行動及使用產品時可能面對的困難。訓練學生以工業設計的理論、方法與分析，深入瞭解高齡族群對設計之需求，進而達成產品創新之決策。
description.en: Lecture on theory and design practice of senile product design. To study age-related changes in health and physical functioning which affect older people's access to facilities and use of products that they need in every day life. Practice of exploring older adults' experience and needs in using products and their attitude toward product design improvement.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Product Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

description.zh: 本課程探討的主題包括：電子商務的定義與架構、市場商機分析與風險評估、電子商務的經營模式及其對傳統經營模式造成的衝擊、顧客界面規劃設計、網路行銷與品牌塑造、實作導入、線上交易機制與資訊安全以及電子商務發展趨勢等相關議題，作深入淺出的探討。並以案例研討方式，加強學生理解，以達到最佳的學習效果。
description.en: This course mainly includes the following topics: 1.Overview of EC; 2.The opportunity and risk evaluation; 3.The business models of EC and impact on traditional businesses. 4. User interface planning; 5.The marketing strategies of EC; 6.How to install an EC; 7.Online transaction mechanisms and information security etc. Some real-world cases will also be discussed to enhance students' understanding and obtain the best learning effects.

description.zh: 面對各種數位化革新技術浪潮的衝擊，零售業者必須置入各項智能科技進行數位行銷與商業模式的開發，例如零售業者使用無人商店、智能支付系統、擴增 / 虛擬實境、元宇宙、物聯網 (IoT)、消費數據分析、人工智慧 (AI)、機器學習等先進技術，將傳統零售環境轉變為更智慧、更便捷、更個性化的消費體驗。甚至利用這些新興數位科技與和數據資源實踐零售業態的升級和轉型，進而不斷涌現出新型業態和新型商業模式的品牌體驗與管理。據此，本課程將以介紹當代智慧零售個案為主軸，介紹智慧零售實務的同時，也帶出其背後運作的主要理論基礎，藉此以促進實務與理論並重的學習效益。
description.en: Faced with the impact of various digital innovation waves, retailers must integrate various smart technologies to develop digital marketing and business models. For example, retailers use advanced technologies such as unmanned retail stores, smart payment systems, augmented/virtual reality, the metaverse, the Internet of Things (IoT), consumption data analysis, artificial intelligence (AI), and machine learning to transform the traditional retail environment into more intelligent, more convenient and more personalized consumption experience. Retailers use these emerging digital technologies and data resources to implement retail upgrading and transformation and then emerge with new business models for brand experience and management. Accordingly, this course will focus on introducing contemporary smart retail cases. Introducing smart retail cases will also bring out the main theoretical foundations, resulting in learning benefits that emphasize practice and theory.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
description.en: This course introduces principles and techniques of thermal management and cooling design of electronic equipments.  Subjects of this course include: thermal and physical properties of electronic components, thermo-fluid phenomena and principles of thermal management for electronic devices, and the evolution of cooling devices such as heat pipes and micro fans, discussion of analysis methodologies and computer software of thermal management problems including thermal resistances, temperature gradient, and thermal stress.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題 1. 空氣清淨機構理論。2. 無塵室構造、建造及確效。3. 空氣過濾理論。4. 無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。膜披覆製程是近年來高科技產業技術一項前途被看好的製程技術之一，廣用於刀具、模具、光學元件、感測器及半導體工業等等。此門課程將提供此項技術之介紹、相關配備、原理與能量提供方式、將包括：沉積技術與應用、化學氣相沉積法、物理氣相沉積法、電鍍技術、真空工程、直流電源、射頻電源、微波、熱燈絲等各種能量介紹、以及膜的成核與生長理論。
description.en: The technology of films coating has advanced dramatically. This advancement was driven primarily by the need for new products and devices in the electronics and optical industries etc.. The rapid progress in various devices would not have been possible without the development of new files coating technology, improved film characteristic and superior file qualities. This course is intended to serve us a guide for the student or practitioner in the field, as a review and overview of this rapidly evolving technology for the graduate students in several branches of science and engineering.

notes: 機電。製科。半導體。鐵道。機械自動化外生班合開，/ 限 40 人

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

notes: 機電所。製科所合開 / 限 20 人

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬 - 陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

notes: 機電所。製科所合開 / 限 25 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。類神經網路介紹：演算法，應用，與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合，近似推理理論，模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 2. Design and simulation of neural network controller3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller5. Introduction to genetic algorithm6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹有效研發 / 創新管理的概念、原則、與標準，這些概念、原則與標準將成為知識密集型的組織與企業的關鍵競爭優勢。本課程將介紹一些相關企業個案和練習活動，用以連結國家、產業和企業的研發或創新活動，並選定方法和工具進行有效的整合功能、企業業務、研發和創新活動。
description.en: This course is intended to introduce the concepts, principles, and standards for effective R&D/innovation management that is becoming the critical competitive advantages for the knowledge-intensive organizations and firms. The course will introduce a number of related cases and exercises with a view to bridge the national, industrial and corporate R&D/innovation activities, along with the presentation of selected approaches, methods and tools to effectively integrate functional, business and corporate R&D and innovation activities as a whole.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究 ，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor(s). The results should be written as a thesis.

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究 ，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor(s). The results should be written as a thesis.

description.zh: 本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).

name.zh: 數位轉型與創新商業模式
name.en: Digital Transformation and Innovative Business Models

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究 ，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor(s). The results should be written as a thesis.

notes: 博士班二年級以上修讀

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹如何應用數值分析理論求解工程問題。1. 數值方法基本觀念及其領域 2. 數值方法之誤差及穩定性 3. 非線性代數方程式之數值解法 4. 聯立代數方程式之數值解法 5. 矩陣特徵值求法 6. 非線性聯立方程式之數值解法 7. 多項式插值法及曲線配湊 8. 數值微分與積分 9. 常微分方程式之數值解法 10. 偏微分方程式之數值解法
description.en: To introduce  the numerical analysis techniques for solving engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the numerical analysis2. The errors and stability of the numerical methods3. Numerical methods of solving nonlinear algebraic equations4. Numerical methods of solving systems of linear equations.5. Algebraic eigen-value problems6. Numerical methods of solving systems of nonlinear equations7. Numerical interpolation and curve fitting8. Numerical differentiation and integration9. Numerical solution of ordinary differential equations10. Numerical solution of partial differential equation

description.zh: 自由度、(平面與空間) 運動幾何分析、彈簧、避震器、力傳遞分析、撓性、電腦輔助懸吊系統分析與設計。
description.en: Degree of Freedom, (2D and 3D) Kinematic Analysis, Springs, Dampers, Force Analysis, Compliance, Computer Aided Analysis and Design of Suspension Systems.

description.zh: UX（User Experience）使用者經驗設計師，是一種特別需要橫向與縱向技能的設計師。本課程從物件 (objects) 、流程 (processes)、體驗 (experiences)、敘事 (narratives) 四個不同的脈絡切面，讓學生了解使用者經驗設計師的必備知識、技能與工具。學生將學會結合使用者研究的質性和量化方法及其工具來塑造實體與數位產品或服務的資訊架構。另一方面，本課程也深入探討 UX 於學術研究上的趨勢，讓學術與實務層面兼備。此外，學生將掌握如何利用簡報和視覺化溝通來促進組織內的設計決策，並學習 Prototype 設計規劃與實施易用性測試，使用實體與遠端工具。課程中也將介紹如何運用生成式 AI 輔助 UX 研究與設計。
description.en: User experience designers are designers who particularly require horizontal and vertical skills. This course allows students to understand the necessary knowledge, skills, and tools of user experience designers from four different aspects: objects, processes, experiences, and narratives. Students will learn to combine qualitative and quantitative methods and tools of user research to shape the information architecture of physical and digital products or services. In addition, students will master how to use briefings and visual communication to promote design decisions within the organization and learn to prototype design planning and implement usability testing using physical and remote tools. The course will also introduce how to use generative AI to assist UX research and design. On the other hand, this course also profoundly explores the trends of UX in academic research, integrating both academic and practical aspects.

name.zh: 使用者經驗研究與實務

description.zh: 本課程以實踐機器人和人工智慧應用為核心，採用美國麻省理工學院（MIT）的專案任務導向學習模式。透過結合講授、討論、實際應用和案例分析，課程將會幫助學生深入理解人工智慧和機器人技術。學生有機會積極參與小組項目，透過情境思考實際應用所學知識，並親自操作機器學習工具和機器人平台，以培養實際技能。
description.en: This course is designed for the practical application of robotics and artificial intelligence (AI). It adopts the project-based learning model inspired by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). The course combines lectures, discussions, and case studies to give students an in-depth understanding of AI technology and robotic applications. Students can engage in group projects, apply their knowledge in real-world scenarios, and gain hands-on experience with machine learning tools and mobile robot platforms.

name.zh: AI 探索者: AI 與高階機器人控制
name.en: Application of AI and Advanced robot control systems

description.zh: 當代都市議題經常為跨領域、開放性的複雜問題，在資料蒐集與分析上，需要整合地理空間、時間的維度；在分析與對策上，須平衡公部門、私部門、民眾等多重利害關係者的，是一門相當複雜但重要的學問。本課程從真實的都市議題出發，教導學生掌握地理空間資訊、資料分析、資料建模、資訊視覺化、策略論述等綜合能力，培養學生對於都市複雜議題的觀察與剖析，進而對真實環境提出洞見與創意。
description.en: Contemporary urban issues are complex, requiring the integration of geographical, and temporal dimensions in data collection and analysis. Balancing the interests of stakeholders like the public, and private sectors is crucial. This course focuses on real urban issues, teaching skills in geographical information, data analysis, modeling, visualization, and strategic discourse. It aims to cultivate students' ability to observe, analyze urban issues, and propose insights for real environments. It's an advanced course, requiring basic programming and GIS concepts. Through group projects, students learn API usage, geographic computation, model building, and data visualization. The course includes one midterm report and one final project report.

name.zh: 都市數據進階分析與模型應用
name.en: Advanced Urban Data Analytics and Modeling

description.zh: 本課程旨在探索人工智能機器人對城市發展的正面影響。學生將掌握機器人技術的基礎，並通過實作、實驗與團隊合作，定義都市所面臨的挑戰並設計出解決方案的機器人原型，並學會如何運用所學知識解決實際問題。
description.en: This course is designed to delve into the transformative role of artificial intelligence (AI) robots in shaping the future of urban development. Participants will gain foundational knowledge in robotics, engaging in hands-on projects, experiments, and collaborative efforts to pinpoint and tackle urban challenges. Through the creation of robotic prototypes, students will not only devise innovative solutions but also learn the practical application of their theoretical knowledge to real-world problems. This curriculum encourages a deep understanding of how AI can contribute positively to urban environments, equipping students with the skills to make impactful changes in the field of urban development.

description.zh: 使用 Unity 3D 建立專業的  VR/AR/MR   應用程序，Unity 3D 是一款功能強大的跨平台 3D 引擎，可提供用戶友好的開發環境。 在本課程中，學生將學習如何從頭開始建立 VR 引擎，以便學生充分了解從 3D 模型到 VR 顯示器中的像素的整個 3 D 圖形顯現管道。 學生還將學習如何在 Unity 中實現最重要的 VR 互動概念，例如選擇、操作、旅行、尋路、選單和文字輸入。學生在本課程中學到的  VR/AR/MR   程式設計知識將有助於學生編寫  VR/AR/MR   遊戲、建築演練、工程模擬、3D 數據檢視器、醫療培訓應用程式等。
description.en: Build professional VR/AR/MR apps using Unity 3D, a powerful cross-platform 3D engine that provides a user-friendly development environment. In this course, students will learn how to build a VR engine from the ground up, so students fully understand the entire rendering pipeline from 3D model to pixels in the VR display. Students will also learn how to implement the most important VR interaction concepts such as selection, manipulation, travel, wayfinding, menus, and text input in Unity.What students learn about  VR/AR/MR   programming in this course will help students write  VR/AR/MR   games, architectural walkthroughs, engineering simulations, 3D data viewers, medical training applications, and many more.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與計算生物學及醫學資訊學相關之重要主題。 學生能夠了解如何正確分析生物和醫學數據所衍伸的問題及應用。 希望透過課程協助同學了解和學習如何組裝基因體資料和醫學數據分析中經常使用的演算法技術內容，閱讀最新相關生醫技術論文及使用開放工具，增進實際操作之經驗或自行建構分析生醫相關資料之應用系統。
description.en: This course is designed to provide important topics in computational biology and medical informatics. Students are able to learn about problems involved in the generation and analysis of biological and medical data. The course intends to provide good understanding of the commonly used algorithms and public tools in the analysis of genomic and medical data, to read updated scientific reports, and to increase hands-on experiences with accessing and using relevant databases.

name.zh: 計算生物學及醫學資訊

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念 2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式 3. 形狀函數及等參數元素 4. 一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等 5. 二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題：一般實體 7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理 8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用 9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究 ，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor(s). The results should be written as a thesis.

notes: 博士班二年級以上修讀

description.zh: 各式數位科技已被廣泛應用在各產業，本課程主要是介紹數位轉型、智慧製造與永續生產相關之課題及其相關技術。
description.en: Many digital technologies have been widely used in various industries. This course mainly introduces topics related to digital transformation, smart manufacturing and sustainable production, as well as related technologies.

description.zh: 銲接冶金課程深入研究金屬銲接技術與冶金過程，培養學生在材料處理和銲接技術方面的專業能力。課程包括銲接方法、銲材選擇、熱影響、金屬結構與性能及銲接缺陷等內容，並結合實際案例，使學生能理解並應用於工程實務。
description.en: The welding metallurgy course in the graduate program delves into metal welding techniques and metallurgical processes, cultivating students' expertise in material handling and welding technologies. The curriculum covers welding methods, selection of welding materials, heat-affected zones, metal structures and properties, welding defects, and incorporates real-world cases to enable students to comprehend and apply them in engineering practice.

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略：案例研析二
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study(II)

description.zh: 本課程討論細胞培養與基因工程技術之原理與應用，課程內容包涵下列主題：(1) 微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之特性 (2) 細胞於生物反應器的培養，包括各式生物反應器介紹、生物反應器動力學、生物反應器之操作與控制 (3) 基因重組蛋白之表現，將包涵不同的細胞載体表現系統 (4) 實例探討，如單株抗體、生物高分子材料、基因治療載体等之生產。
description.en: This course discusses the principle and applications of cell culture and molecular biology.  The course covers the following topics: (1) characteristics of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells; (2) cell culture in bioreactors, including descriptions of bioreactor types, operation modes, bioreactor kinetics, and instrumentation and control; (3) expression of foreign genes in various cell systems; (4) case studies, such as production of monoclonal antibody, biopolymers, and gene therapy vectors.

name.en: Special Topics in Molecular Cell Biology

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題 01. 霍夫曼編碼 02. 算數編碼 03. 純量量化與向量量化 04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST 以及 Walsh-Hadamard 轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法 09. 跑長編碼法 10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解？水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的 96 家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解？可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 「太空軟體系統設計」課程旨在培養學生在太空任務中設計、開發和操作軟體系統的專業能力。學生將深入了解太空環境對軟體系統的特殊要求，包括真空、輻射、溫度等因素對系統性能的影響。課程將探討飛行軟體的設計和架構，學生將學習如何設計出能夠在極端條件下穩定運行的飛行軟體系統，確保太空任務的順利執行。此外，課程將涵蓋軟體驗證和確認技術，學生將學習如何確保軟體系統的功能性和安全性，並掌握各種測試方法和工具的應用。課程還將關注容錯和自我修復能力的設計，學生將學習如何設計具有容錯和自我修復功能的軟體系統，以應對可能的故障情況。最後，課程將介紹太空軟體系統的專案管理和實施，學生將學習如何有效地管理軟體開發專案，確保項目按時交付並符合品質標準。此外，課程還將包括深度學習在太空軟體系統中的應用，學生將探索如何利用深度學習技術來改進太空任務中的軟體系統設計和性能，以及酬載資料處理軟體的設計和開發，以支援太空任務中的資料收集和分析。通過本課程的學習，學生將具備設計和開發太空軟體系統所需的技能和知識，為未來在太空工程或相關領域的工作做好準備。
description.en: The course "Space Software System Design" aims to cultivate students' professional abilities in designing, developing, and operating software systems for space missions. Students will gain in-depth understanding of the special requirements that the space environment imposes on software systems, including the impact of factors such as vacuum, radiation, and temperature on system performance. The course will explore the design and architecture of flight software, teaching students how to design flight software systems that can operate stably under extreme conditions, ensuring the smooth execution of space missions. Additionally, the course will cover software verification and validation techniques, enabling students to ensure the functionality and safety of software systems and master various testing methods and tools.

notes: 英語授課，新聘教師開課

description.zh: 太空科技應用課程旨在探討太空技術在各種應用領域的應用，與太空科技如何影響人類生活和科學研究。課程涵蓋的主題包括：太空探索，地球觀測，通訊和衛星導航，太空工程和材料科學，太空生物學和醫學，太空經濟和商業。通過這些主題的專題演講與小組討論，學生將了解太空科技在各個領域的應用和未來發展方向，並能夠掌握相關技術和知識。
description.en: The aim of the Space Science & Technology Seminar is to enable students to understand and master practical skills and knowledge in the field of space engineering, as well as to cultivate their teamwork, problem-solving, and innovative thinking abilities. Students will undertake a practical space engineering design project to understand the design, testing, implementation, and management processes of space engineering through practice, and demonstrate project outcomes through reports, presentations, and assessments. Through this course, students can understand the latest developments in the field of space engineering, master relevant skills and knowledge, and enhance their teamwork and project management abilities. This course can also provide practical exercises through industry-academia collaboration.

description.zh: 太空科技應用課程旨在介紹太空技術在各種應用領域的應用，並探討太空科技如何影響人類生活和科學研究。課程涵蓋的主題包括：太空探索，地球觀測，通訊和衛星導航，太空工程和材料科學，太空生物學和醫學，太空經濟和商業。通過這些主題的介紹，學生將了解太空科技在各個領域的應用和未來發展方向，並能夠掌握相關技術和知識。
description.en: The Space Technology Application Course aims to introduce the application of space technology in various fields, and explore how space technology impacts human life and scientific research. The course covers topics including space exploration, Earth observation, communication and satellite navigation, space engineering and materials science, space biology and medicine, and space economy and business. Through the introduction of these topics, students will understand the application of space technology in various fields and future development directions, and be able to master relevant technologies and knowledge.

name.zh: 深度學習與太空科技應用

notes: 英語授課，新聘教師開課

description.zh: 衛星科技與工程導論的課程將介紹衛星系統及次系統基礎知識，以培養具有從事衛星任務設計之基礎能力。課程內容包括：衛星基本原理，衛星設計與製造，衛星運行與維護，衛星通訊與遙測應用，衛星發展趨勢。
description.en: The course "Introduction to Satellite Technology and Engineering" will introduce the basic knowledge of satellite systems and subsystems to cultivate the fundamental abilities needed for designing satellite missions. The course content includes: the basic principles of satellites, satellite design and manufacturing, satellite operation and maintenance, satellite communication and remote sensing applications, and satellite development trends.

name.en: Introduction to Satellite Technology and Engineering

description.zh: 這門課程著重於對立方衛星設計系統工程與實作的知識傳授，以全面了解整個系統整合與發展的過程。在這門課程中，學生將學習如何依衛星規格需求將系統分解為不同的子系統，如何將這些不同的子系統整合到一個完全功能的系統中，以及組裝整合完成後，如何進行測試與太空環境驗證流程。本課程由立方衛星 EDM 工程發展平台學習步驟組成，配備立方衛星課堂使用的衛星套件、元件講解。主要配備了六個主要子系統 – 衛星電力供應管理 (EPS)、衛星命令和數據處理 (C&DH)、衛星通訊次系統 (TT&C)、衛星飛行軟體 (F.S.W)、衛星姿態控制感測器 (ADCS) 和衛星結構 (SMS)。通過體驗立方衛星組裝、整合（包括軟體編程和系統組裝）和測試的過程，學生可以了解每個衛星組件和次系統的功能，以及如何將各次系統整合到衛星系統中，最後進入衛星太空環境驗測，透過實務學習加深學生對衛星設計和開發的理解，以獲得寶貴的技能與知識。
description.en: This course puts it focus on establishing the knowledge of cubeSAT systems engineering by going through the whole process of system integration. During the course student will learn how the system is broken down into different subsystem (requirement), how to integrate those different subsystem (requirement) into a fully functioning system, and how to test/debug it once it has been integrated.The course consists of a EDM learning steps with CubeSat type classroom satellite kit. It is equipped with six primary subsystems – Electrical Power Supply, Command and Data Handling, Communication, Ground station, Sensor and Structure.You can learn how each component and subsystem functions and how to integrate components and subsystems into a satellite system through experiencing the process of assembly, integration including programing & system implementation and test.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

notes: 限 111 學年度 (含) 以前博士生修課，非博士班英文門檻補救

description.zh: 本所與美國新罕布夏大學富蘭克林皮爾斯法學院，已於 112 年 5 月 10 日簽署國際學術交流 MOU，而本所為響應學校推動國際化之政策，特別增開 1 門 1 學分之國際雙師課程。本課程乃由美國新罕布夏大學富蘭克林皮爾斯法學院院長 Megan Carpenter 教授、該學院智慧財產權中心主任 Micky Minhas 教授親自來台密集授課，主要提供給欲深入了解美國法律制度、美國智慧財產權法律體系之本所學生、校外實務界人士或欲對赴美留學有興趣人士來選修。而本課程之內容，共分成兩個部分，前半部將以美國法律 (包括法院、普通法、各部門法律等) 之介紹為主，至於後半部則詳細介紹美國智慧財產權各部門法律 (包含著作權法、專利法、營業秘密法、資料保護、商標法等)。而本課程之開課時間，以每學年度上學期之 10 月上旬，並為期 1 週為原則。當然，本課程開設之目的，乃以增強學生實際應用英語之能力，並以加強學生美國智慧財產權法律之知能為主，除了強化本所與美國新罕布夏大學富蘭克林皮爾斯法學院之學術交流關係外，更能夠擴展休課學生之國際人脈及視野。
description.en: Graduate Institute of Intellectual Property, National Taipei University of Technology (hereafter called this institute) had made a MOU of international academic cooperation with Franklin Pierce School of Law, University of New Hampshire on May 10, 2023. This institute wants to promote the international policy from the University, so this institute will open a one unit course for international double professional teachers. This course is personally and intensively taught by Professor/Dean Megan Carpenter and Professor/Director Micky Minhas of Franklin Pierce School of Law, University of New Hampshire, and it is mainly provided for this institute’s students, legal practitioners, or someone who are interested in studying in the U.S. for further understanding the U.S. legal and intellectual property law systems. Moreover, contents of this course are divided into two parts: the former part is introductions of the U.S. laws, including courts, common laws, and all aspects of laws, etc. But,

name.zh: 美國智慧財產權法律專題
name.en: Seminar on the U.S. Intellectual Property Law

notes: 國際雙師選修英文授課，預定 113/11/04-11/09 進行密集課

description.zh: 本所與美國新罕布夏大學富蘭克林皮爾斯法學院，已於 112 年 5 月 10 日簽署國際學術交流 MOU，而本所為響應學校推動國際化之政策，特別增開 1 門 1 學分之國際雙師課程。本課程乃由美國新罕布夏大學富蘭克林皮爾斯法學院院長 Megan Carpenter 教授、該學院智慧財產權中心主任 Micky Minhas 教授親自來台密集授課，主要提供給欲深入了解美國法律制度、美國智慧財產權法律體系之本所學生、校外實務界人士或欲對赴美留學有興趣人士來選修。而本課程之內容，共分成兩個部分，前半部將以美國法律 (包括法院、普通法、各部門法律等) 之介紹為主，至於後半部則詳細介紹美國智慧財產權各部門法律 (包含著作權法、專利法、營業秘密法、資料保護、商標法等)。而本課程之開課時間，以每學年度上學期之 10 月上旬，並為期 1 週為原則。當然，本課程開設之目的，乃以增強學生實際應用英語之能力，並以加強學生美國智慧財產權法律之知能為主，除了強化本所與美國新罕布夏大學富蘭克林皮爾斯法學院之學術交流關係外，更能夠擴展休課學生之國際人脈及視野。
description.en: Graduate Institute of Intellectual Property, National Taipei University of Technology (hereafter called this institute) had made a MOU of international academic cooperation with Franklin Pierce School of Law, University of New Hampshire on May 10, 2023. This institute wants to promote the international policy from the University, so this institute will open a one unit course for international double professional teachers. This course is personally and intensively taught by Professor/Dean Megan Carpenter and Professor/Director Micky Minhas of Franklin Pierce School of Law, University of New Hampshire, and it is mainly provided for this institute’s students, legal practitioners, or someone who are interested in studying in the U.S. for further understanding the U.S. legal and intellectual property law systems. Moreover, contents of this course are divided into two parts: the former part is introductions of the U.S. laws, including courts, common laws, and all aspects of laws, etc. But,

name.zh: 美國智慧財產權法律專題
name.en: Seminar on the U.S. Intellectual Property Law

notes: 先鋒 1401 教室；國際雙師英文授課，預定 113/11/04-11/09

description.zh: 資訊都市主義（informatical urbanism 或 informational urbanism）為一跨領域學科，旨在透過資訊環境與流程之輔助，推動政策、規劃、發展、策略行動、設計之都市與社區進程。本課程主要在協助學生，以都市與社區問題為基本導向，建立資訊環境與流程之規劃能力。授課主要涵蓋面向：1. 資訊與知識基礎設施 2. 經濟面向 3. 都市治理與公共行政 4. 都市空間之資訊化 5. 地點因子 6. 使用者行為 7. 特殊議題 8. 研究認識論。
description.en: Informatical urbanism (or informational urbanism) is an interdisciplinary area of knowledge, and it mainly utilize the facilitation of informatical environments and procedures for the progression of policy, planning, development, strategic initiative, and design within cities and communities.During this course, student will acquire the planning capability of establish such applicable informatical environments and procedures, based upon explorations of urban and community issues.Main contents of this course: 1. Information and knowledge infrastructures, 2. Economic aspects, 3. Urban governance and administration, 4. Informaticalization of urban space, 5. Location factors, 6. User behavior, 7. Focus area of problem, 8. Problematic of the research of informatical urbanism.

description.zh: 本課程使學生熟悉混凝土之材料組成、物理及力學性質，以及混凝土之配比及其近代發展。課程中亦包含混凝土之非線性分析，如潛變、乾縮及斷裂行為等。
description.en: This course provides students with material composition, physical and mechanical properties of concrete proportion and its modern development. Courses will also be included in the nonlinear analysis of concrete, creep, shrinkage and the failure theory and so  on.

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills.  Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

description.zh: 自由度、(平面與空間) 運動幾何分析、彈簧、避震器、力傳遞分析、撓性、電腦輔助懸吊系統分析與設計。
description.en: Degree of Freedom, (2D and 3D) Kinematic Analysis, Springs, Dampers, Force Analysis, Compliance, Computer Aided Analysis and Design of Suspension Systems.

description.zh: 本課程深入探討人工智慧領域的基礎知識和最新技術，包括機器學習、深度學習、自然語言處理、生成對抗網絡等領域。學員將從人工智慧的概述和歷史開始，逐步深入了解機器學習和深度學習的基礎概念和演算法，並探討其在不同領域的應用。課程還介紹了最新的 AI 技術趨勢，包括注意力機制、自監督學習、大型 AI 通用模型和元學習等。課程運作模式：每週講授一個主題，包括理論授課和實習操作。學員將參與課堂討論和小組活動，以促進想法交流和知識分享。
description.en: This course delves into the fundamentals and latest advancements in the field of artificial intelligence, covering topics such as machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, and generative adversarial networks. Participants will begin with an overview of artificial intelligence and its historical development, progressively delving into the foundational concepts and algorithms of machine learning and deep learning, along with their applications across various domains. The course also introduces the latest trends in AI technology, including attention mechanisms, self-supervised learning, large-scale AI models, and meta-learning.Course Execution: Each week covers a specific topic, including theoretical lectures and practical exercises. Participants will engage in classroom discussions and group activities to facilitate idea exchange and knowledge sharing.

name.zh: 人工智慧的基礎與創新 (一)
name.en: Foundations and Advances in Artificial Intelligence I

description.zh: 1. 微波傳輸線 2. 微波元件 3. 微波材料 4. 微波量測 5. 微波傳輸轉換 6. 微波耦合 7. 微波濾波器 8. 微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 此門課程的主要目標，將以介紹高等積體電路設計為主，讓學生了解高等積體電路設計的理論、概念、流程及方法。課程將理論與實際並重，讓學生具有實際的高等積體電路設計能力。
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Advanced VLSI System and Architecture Design 3. Advanced VLSI Design Technique and Concept4. Still Image/Video Compression VLSI Design5. Digital Television VLSI Design6. Digital Camera VLSI Design7. Digital Watermarking VLSI Design

description.zh: 1. 幾何光學 2. 波動光學 3. 光束光學 4. 傅氏光學 5. 光電磁學 6. 偏極光學與晶體光學
description.en: 1. Ray Optics2. Wave Optics3. Beam Optics4. Fourier Optics5. Electromagnetic Optics6. Polarization and Crystal Optics

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

notes: 博班課程，碩士不計學分，須面談加簽

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理 (關聯群 7)

description.zh: 資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
description.en: Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以 R 語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

name.zh: 創業 0 到 2 的思維與實作

description.zh: 隨著高齡化社會的來臨與國家對於身心障礙者生活福祉的重視，輔助科技相關資源與人才需求日益倍增，各類輔具產品使用已成為這些族群在醫療照護上與生活品質提升上不可或缺的一環。本門課程為「生醫輔助科技跨域微學程」之入門基礎課程，建立學生對輔助科技有基本的通盤認識，期許未來具備相關能力投入輔助創新產品研發。若未來有志投入輔助科技相關產業工作，建議微學程可由此門課程開始選修。由於輔助科技涵蓋醫學與工程相關領域專業知識技術的整合，故由本校與臺北醫學大學攜手合作，兩校多位教師一同共授，提供兩校各 20 位學生選修，以促進學生或教師間的交流合作，本課程上課地點除了在本校，將有部分週次於北醫校園上課。
description.en: With the advent of aging society and the country's emphasis on the well-being of people with physical and mental disabilities, the demand of assistive technology resources and manpower is getting increased. The use of various assistive products has become an indispensable part for these people in medical care and quality of life. Assistive technology covers and integrates expertise in medicine and engineering related fields. The aims of this course are to let students have the comprehensive understanding of the current status and future trends of assistive technology. This course is the basic course for the “Assistive Technology Interdisciplinary Program”. If students consider to involve assistive technology-related industries in the future, we encourage students to enroll this course.

description.zh: 課程將以體驗式教學訓練，提升學員表達技巧、舞台技巧、臨場反應。本課程主要目的在教授學生以設計思考思維與策略，運用主題式課程實戰小組簡報及個人簡報，快速釐清簡報製作及表達過程中重點，提升修課學員個人簡報製作能力及表達能力，幫助學生在未來創業及就業上以出色之個人簡報能力獲得面試者及投資者的青睞，領先於起跑點取得優勢。
description.en: The course will use experiential teaching training to improve students' expression skills, stage skills, and on-the-spot reactions. The main purpose of this course is to teach students establishing design thinking strategies. During the course practice group presentations and personal presentations training students to quickly clarify the key points in the process of presentation production and presentation, to improve the students' personal presentation production and presentation skills. Furthermore, assist students' entrepreneurship and employment in the future. Students who finished this course will be favored by interviewers and investors with his excellent personal presentation skills. And he will gain an advantage over the starting point.

name.zh: 企業最愛：高質感簡報溝通力
name.en: Corporate's Favorite: High-quality Communication and Presentation Ability

description.zh: 隨著科技的發展與產值快速成長，網路、電商、商業新模式等各式創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

name.zh: 創業講座 — 創業是一場馬拉松
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures- The persistance that makes the great entrepreneur

notes: 前六週密集授課、科技大樓國際會議廳

description.zh: 氣膠為懸浮在空氣中的微小固體或液體粒子。本課程深入探討氣膠科學（微塵學）及其工程上之應用。．氣膠理化特性，粒徑分布．氣膠運動學：擴散和布朗運動，過濾機制，荷電性質，熱泳等．光學特性及其應用．氣膠的測量原理與方法．大氣氣膠及生物氣膠
description.en: ．Indroduction:characterization of aerosols,shape and size distributions．Particle transport:Brownian motion and diffusion, centrifugation, intertia and filtration, convective diffusion,extermal forcr fields, thermal force．Optical properties:visibility, light scattering．Aerosol dynamics:coagulation, formation and growth．Atmospheric Aerosois and Bioaerosols．Measurement of aerosol

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含：社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 校務研究（Institutional Research，以下簡稱 IR）可說是針對校務所進行的各項研究，透過資料蒐集、分析、報告，以及教職員行動，以促進高等教育機構的運作與決定。同時 IR 的發展和大學評鑑的發展脈絡息息相關，最終的目的就是要提升學校辦學品質，促進學校良善發展。本課程主要希望加強同學對 IR 的了解及發展實作能力。
description.en: Institutional research is a broad category of work done at schools, colleges and universities to inform campus decision-making and planning in areas such as admissions, financial aid, curriculum, enrollment management, staffing, student life, finance, facilities, athletics, and alumni relations. Its mission is to foster a culture of evidence by facilitating the management, analysis, and reporting of institutional data and information in support of planning and decision-making. This curriculum is expected to provide all students understand the theory and practice of IR.

description.zh: 本課程希望讓學生了解如何正確選擇與使用多變項統計方法，並能閱讀、呈現與解釋多變項統計報告或結果。課程包括因子設計、實驗設計、共變數分析、複迴歸等主題，以探討教育研究中多重且同時的影響因素。
description.en: This curriculum lets students understand how to choose and use multi-variance statistics methods exactly.  It also includes that reading, presenting and explaining the report or result of multi-variance statistics analysis exactly.  The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 管理心理學係運用行為科學的方法，事實及歷程，以處理人們在工作中的行為及心理的一門科學。本課程希望讓學生了解管理心理學如何影響他們的生活與工作，並能有效地運用管理技巧來處理企業中的人與事。
description.en: Administrative psychology is a science, which makes use of the method, fact, and process of the behavior science to handle people's behavior and minds in their work. This curriculum is expected to make students understand how administrative psychology affect their life and work, and how to use the management skill to effectively deal with the personnel and matter in the enterprise.

description.zh: 1. 學習診斷輔導方法 2. 培養學生現場診斷與輔導 3. 提升學生企業經營管理改善能力
description.en: 1. Learn diagnostic counseling methods2. Train students on-site diagnosis and counseling3. Enhance students' ability to improve business management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理 (聯輔會) 修畢企業管理 & 經營策略實務

description.zh: 玄奘之路商學院戈壁挑戰賽緣起於 2006 年，秉承「玄奘之路」精神，倡導「理想、行動、堅持、超越」之理念，通過浸入式的身心體驗和團隊協作來達成個人心靈突破，並鼓勵參賽戈友相互扶持、共同進退，弘揚團隊合作、永不放棄的正向能量。
description.en: The Business Schools Xuanzang Road Gobi Challenge originated in 2006.This event adheres to the spirit of "Xuan Zang Road", advocates the concept of "idealism, action, persistence, and transcendence" to achieve personal spiritual breakthrough through immersive physical and mental experience and teamwork; Gobi challenge also promotes teamwork by encouraging all participants to support each other, to advance and retreat together, and be positive, never give up!

name.zh: 運動與休閒管理 - 戈壁挑戰賽
name.en: Sports and Leisure activity Management -Gobi Challenge

notes: (群組 8) 社會人文藝術與其他領域

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 這門課程將深入探討 ESG 概念及其在國際趨勢中的地位，包括 CBAM、CCA、TCFD 等法規，亦將闡述國際評比、CSRD、IFRS S1/S2 等要求，以及國內主管機關的法規，尤其關於公司治理藍圖的要求。透過工作坊形式，我們將聚焦氣候變遷和財務相關揭露的重點，並以案例分享產業實務。從國際法規如 SB253、CBAM 到國際標準 ISO 20400，我們也將討論供應鏈管理和永續採購的趨勢。此外，將涵蓋人權相關議題，如 TIFD 和 DEI，以及永續報告書撰寫注意事項。最後，我們將介紹永續金融和責任投融資，並討論金融業永續法規對企業的影響。
description.en: This course explores ESG concepts and global trends like CBAM, CCA, and TCFD. We'll cover international ratings, CSRD, IFRS S1/S2, and domestic regulatory requirements, focusing on corporate governance. Through workshops and case studies, we'll highlight climate change and financial disclosures. We'll discuss supply chain management trends, ISO 20400, and human rights issues like TIFD and DEI. Additionally, we'll cover sustainability reporting guidelines and introduce sustainable finance and responsible investment, examining their impact on businesses and financial regulations.

name.zh: 永續發展與綠色金融管理
name.en: Sustainable Development and Green Banking Management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理，台北上課 ( 溫紹)

description.zh: 本課程名稱為「運動追求卓越與個人健康管理」，是一門結合理論與實踐的課程，將透過探討運動科學與健康管理的基礎與實務參與，建構修課學生對運動在個人健康應用的實際體悟，並提升自我健康與體能管理，促進長期健康。課程內容涵蓋運動對健康的重要性、運動智能 APP、運動訓練安排、運動與營養、水分補充、傷害防護、運動與恢復等主題。透過本課程的學習，修課學生不僅能增進個人體能與相關運動知能， 並能由實務運動參與的過程，達到個人健康管理的益處。
description.en: This course “Exercise for excellent and health fitness management” combines theory and practice. By exploring the fundamentals of exercise science and health management, and through practical participation, it aims to build students' practical understanding of how exercise applies to personal health, and to enhance their self-health and physical fitness management to promote long-term health.The course covers topics such as the importance of exercise for health, exercise smart apps, training plan, exercise and nutrition, hydration, injury prevention, and recovery.Through this course, students will not only improve their physical fitness and sports-related knowledge but will also experience the benefits of personal health management through practical exercise participation.

name.zh: 運動追求卓越與個人健康管理
name.en: Exercise for excellent and health fitness management

notes: (群組 8) 社會人文藝術與其他領域，台北上課

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹資料探勘與大數據分析的理論方法與應用，課程內容涵蓋資料探勘的基本概念，如資料準備、資料探勘的方法與實證、資料探勘的進一步運用，並加入商業等各領域的實務案例介紹，具體說明如何應用資料探勘與大數據分析技術以解決真實問題。 另外在工具方面則透過相關分析軟體操作與實作範例輔以說明，讓學生學習資料的準備、工具的應用及分析判斷，透過實作課程，使學生能容易應用資料探勘方法，進而提升大數據分析和數位決策能力。
description.en: This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for the efficiency of decision making in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which are including: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business Analytics, and data analytic project. The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic to add value to business, etc. Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.

description.zh: 本課程將深入探討比特幣作為一種加密貨幣的獨特經濟特性。我們將從貨幣的基礎概念開始，接著介紹比特幣，探討其背後的區塊鏈技術以及去中心化的運作方式。然後，我們將探討比特幣的價值形成機制、供需動態、市場波動等相關議題，並探討其對傳統金融體系的影響，以及可能的未來發展趨勢。此外，再針對比特幣逐漸成為全球大南方新興市場國家的普惠金融方案之一的現象探討其原因與未來發展。
description.en: This course delves into the unique economic characteristics of Bitcoin as a cryptocurrency. We Start from the fundamental concepts of money, fiat currency, and then discuss the Bitcoin. We explore the underlying blockchain technology and decentralized operations. We then examine Bitcoin's value proposition, supply-demand dynamics, market volatility, and its impact on traditional financial systems, along with potential future trends. On top of that, Bitcoin is also gaining traction to become one of the financial inclusion solution in global south emerging countries, we also examine the reasoning and future development of this phenomena.

description.zh: 因應全球淨零碳排趨勢，能源管理與碳管理為國家各產業提升競爭力的重要環節。本課程將從 ISO50001 能源管理與 ISO14064 碳管理制度出發，講授能源管理、能源績效評估、碳管理、和績效提升 / 減碳計算之量測與驗證方法學。講授內容涵蓋：關鍵觀念、節能 / 減碳技術、績效 / 減碳量測與驗證方法、節能 / 減碳統計分析方法學、和案例 EXCEL 操作與討論。
description.en: In response to the global trend of net-zero carbon emissions, energy management and carbon management are important links in improving the competitiveness of various industries in the country. This course will start from the ISO50001 energy management and ISO14064 carbon management systems and teach the measurement and verification methodologies of energy management, energy performance assessment, carbon management, and performance improvement/carbon reduction calculations. The teaching contents cover: key concepts, energy saving/carbon reduction technology, performance/carbon reduction measurement and verification methods, energy saving/carbon reduction statistical analysis methodology, and EXCEL case practice and discussion.

name.zh: 能源績效量測驗證與碳管理
name.en: Energy Performance Measurement and Verification and Carbon Management

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 1.	衛星軌道與軌跡 2.	數位通訊，多工技術 3.	衛星通訊 - 衛星本體 4.	衛星通訊 - 地面站 5.	衛星鏈路分析與設計 6.	衛星通訊應用
description.en: 1.	Satellite Orbits and Trajectories2.	Digital Communications, Multiple Access3.	Communication Satellite - Space segment4.	Communication Satellite - Earth segment5.	Satellite Link Analysis and Design6.	Applications of Satellite Communication

description.zh: 本門授課之目的在於介紹奈米材料及其製程 (包括化學法及物理法奈米材料法)，並探討奈米材料的未來發展及應用。所包括的課程主題如下：1. 奈米材料與奈米化學簡介。2. 奈米材料與結構分析 3. 量子力學；4. 奈米材料自我組成 5. 奈米材料模擬 6. 碳化奈米材料 7 奈米材料製成 8. 奈米材料的應用；9. 奈米材料的遠景與未來發展。
description.en: The course introduces nanomaterials and their preparation processes (including chemical method and physical methods). Future development and applications are also discussed. This course will cover the following topics:1. Introduction of nanomaterials and Nano-chemistry; 2. Nanomaterials: structure and analysis; 3. Quantum mechanics; 4. Nanomaterials: self-assembly; 5. Nanomaterials: simulation; 6. Carbon-based nanomaterials; 7. Synthesis and processing 8. Growth and application of semiconductor nanoparticles; 9. Prospective future of nanomaterials.

description.zh: 1. 靜電場理論：庫倫定律、高斯定律、電位能、電場能量與功、拉普勒斯方程式、邊界值間題、電容；  2. 靜磁場理論：直流電流、安培定律； 3. 電磁感應：法拉第定律、電機原理；4. 靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特、安培定律、磁位能、磁場能量與功、強 磁性材料特性電感  5. 馬克思威爾方程式。
description.en: This is an introductory course of electromagnetics base on its Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts :1.Static electric field  2.Steady electric current  3.Static magnetic field  4.Stationary electromagnetic field   5.Maxwell equations and their applications.  6.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，星期六 234，台北集中上課，USR 計畫

description.zh: 光電材料具備將光轉換為電能的能力，因此在當前的再生能源研究中中引起了廣泛與極大的關注。本課程著重介紹光電材料應用在光伏元件、發光二極體、光電感測器和薄膜電晶體。課程內容也包括半導體物理基礎知識、材料的分子結構、光吸收能力、載流子遷移率以及元件的穩定性和衰退的探討。
description.en: Optoelectronic materials have attracted much attention on a wide range of applications in renewable energy systems due to their ability to convert light into electricity. This course focus on introducing optoelectronic materials utilized in such kind of devices, photovoltaics, light-emitting diodes, photodetectors, and thin-film-transistors. This course also includes the fundamentals of semiconductor physics, materials’ molecular structures, light absorption capacity, carrier mobility and device’s stability and degradation.

name.zh: 光電材料於再生能源之應用
name.en: Optoelectronic Materials in Renewable Energy Applications

description.zh: 本課程將對公司治理做系統性的介紹。公司治理係指公司可以透過一系列的內部和外部公司治理機制設計來降低公司代理問題、提升公司價值。修課同學可以藉由閱讀指定參考文獻及教材並且在課堂上進行口頭報告，可以培養同學撰寫碩士論文及口頭報告的能力。
description.en: This course aims to present the concept of corporate governance. Corporate governance involves a series of mechanisms designed to mitigate agency problems within a corporation and enhance its value. We will cover both internal and external aspects of corporate governance. Students in the class are required to present a journal article and other assigned readings. All the training is intended to help students learn how to conduct their master thesis and improve their confidence in oral presentations.

notes: 【全英語】/ 陳鴻崑老師 / 科研 823

description.zh: 本課程在使學生了解各種不同的資訊科技 (Information Technology) 與管理資訊系統間的關連性，並結合金融企業導入產業議題，實際應用所教授的 IT 技術進行學術研究。藉由 IT 技術的應用演練，讓學生將實際進行問題分析、模型發展、系統開發、模擬實驗及最後的研究結論與模型驗證。提升學生獨立思考與解決問題之能力，培養科學的態度與學術研究的知識。
description.en: This course is to enable students to understand the relationship between various Information Technology and management information systems, and cooperate with financial companies to introduce industrial topics, and actually apply the IT technology taught for academic research. Through the application and exercise of IT technology, students will actually carry out problem analysis, model development, system development, and simulation experiments. At last, students can summarize research conclusions and model validation. Thus, students can improve their independent thinking and problem-solving ability, and further cultivate their scientific attitude and academic research knowledge.

name.zh: 金融數據分析邏輯思維
name.en: Financial Data Analytics and Logical Thinking

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹六標準差方法。六標準差 (Six Sigma) 是一套管理系統，它是透過聆聽顧客的聲音 (Voice of Customer)，經由關鍵品質 (Critical to Quality) 的分析，利用專案的方式，以流程改善工具解決有問題的企業流程。本課程著重了解 “Six Sigma” 理論、分析工具及統計應用軟體 (Minitab) 之運用，針對六標準差綠帶、黑帶專業培訓課程，藉由理論分析與實際操作使用的說明，協助學生將”Six Sigma” 導入企業，以獲得關鍵流程的改進。
description.en: This course primarily introduces the Six Sigma methodology. Six Sigma is a management system that listens to the Voice of Customer, analyzes Critical to Quality factors, and utilizes project-based approaches with process improvement tools to address problematic business processes. The course focuses on understanding the theory of Six Sigma, analysis tools, and the application of statistical software (Minitab). It is designed for Green Belt and Black Belt professional training in Six Sigma. Through theoretical analysis and practical exercises, the course assists students in implementing Six Sigma in enterprises to achieve improvements in key processes.

notes: 新聘教師 / 預計英語授課

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
description.en: This course introduces principles and techniques of thermal management and cooling design of electronic equipments.  Subjects of this course include: thermal and physical properties of electronic components, thermo-fluid phenomena and principles of thermal management for electronic devices, and the evolution of cooling devices such as heat pipes and micro fans, discussion of analysis methodologies and computer software of thermal management problems including thermal resistances, temperature gradient, and thermal stress.

description.zh: 本課程大量的個案來說明企業管理的理論觀念以及分析方法，讓學生對企業管理有一定程度的了解，課程內容將以國內與國外著名案例為基礎，主題包括策略管理，行銷管理，組織領導，科技管理等。課程將採用參與式個案為教學方法，個案來源為哈佛商學院以及光華管理個案資料庫。
description.en: This course uses Harvard style case method to enhance MBA students' business concepts and theories. The topics include: strategy management, marketing management, leadership, and technology management. The case materials will be adapted from Harvard Business School and KMCC center.
